column2: Bagaimana dengan kaitan AML, apakah produk smarttravel internasional ini juga terdapat pengecualian negara2 yang tidak bisa dikunjungi atau dijamin?
column3:
Ya, terkait dengan kepatuhan terhadap peraturan, Asuransi SmartTravel Internasional memiliki pengecualian untuk negara-negara yang dikenai sanksi. AXA tidak menjamin perjalanan ke negara-negara yang dikenai sanksi oleh PBB. Negara-negara tersebut meliputi:

*   Afganistan [308d0e01-602a-4fd7-b855-b702ee2e6dab, 11:12, "Afganistan"]
*   Republik Demokratik Kongo [308d0e01-602a-4fd7-b855-b702ee2e6dab, 11:12, "Republik Demokratis Kongo"]
*   Eritrea [308d0e01-602a-4fd7-b855-b702ee2e6dab, 11:12, "Eritrea"]
*   Guinea Bissau [308d0e01-602a-4fd7-b855-b702ee2e6dab, 11:12, "Guinea Bissau"]
*   Haiti [308d0e01-602a-4fd7-b855-b702ee2e6dab, 11:12, "Haiti"]
*   Iran [308d0e01-602a-4fd7-b855-b702ee2e6dab, 11:12, "Iran"]
*   Irak [308d0e01-602a-4fd7-b855-b702ee2e6dab, 11:12, "Irak"]
*   Kenya [308d0e01-602a-4fd7-b855-b702ee2e6dab, 11:12, "Kenya"]
*   Lebanon [308d0e01-602a-4fd7-b855-b702ee2e6dab, 11:12, "Lebanon"]
*   Liberia [308d0e01-602a-4fd7-b855-b702ee2e6dab, 11:12, "Liberia"]
*   Libya [308d0e01-602a-4fd7-b855-b702ee2e6dab, 11:12, "Libya"]
*   Nigeria [308d0e01-602a-4fd7-b855-b702ee2e6dab, 11:12, "Nigeria"]
*   Korea Utara [308d0e01-602a-4fd7-b855-b702ee2e6dab, 11:12, "Korea Utara"]
*   Rwanda [308d0e01-602a-4fd7-b855-b702ee2e6dab, 11:12, "Rwanda"]
*   Sierra Leone [308d0e01-602a-4fd7-b855-b702ee2e6dab, 11:12, "Sierra Leone"]
*   Somalia [308d0e01-602a-4fd7-b855-b702ee2e6dab, 11:12, "Somalia"]
*   Sudan [308d0e01-602a-4fd7-b855-b702ee2e6dab, 11:12, "Sudan"]
*   Sudan Selatan [308d0e01-602a-4fd7-b855-b702ee2e6dab, 11:12, "Sudan Selatan"]
*   Suriah [308d0e01-602a-4fd7-b855-b702ee2e6dab, 11:12, "Suriah"]
*   Zimbabwe [308d0e01-602a-4fd7-b855-b702ee2e6dab, 11:12, "Zimbabwe"]
*   Angola [308d0e01-602a-4fd7-b855-b702ee2e6dab, 11:12, "Angola"]
*   Palestina [308d0e01-602a-4fd7-b855-b702ee2e6dab, 11:12, "Palestina"]

Daftar ini juga mencakup negara-negara lain yang diperbarui oleh PBB [308d0e01-602a-4fd7-b855-b702ee2e6dab, 11:12, "dan negara-negara lainnya yang diperbaharui oleh PBB."]. Pengecualian ini sejalan dengan klausul sanksi ekonomi internasional yang menyatakan bahwa AXA tidak akan memberikan jaminan atau membayar klaim jika hal itu akan menyebabkan pelanggaran sanksi ekonomi internasional, hukum, atau peraturan, termasuk yang ditetapkan oleh PBB, Uni Eropa, Inggris, atau Amerika Serikat [e25f6b86-7e02-4f53-ba75-4416af2532c2, 21:22, "Asuransi ini tidak berlaku apabila sanksi perdagangan atau ekonomi atau undang-undang atau peraturan lain melarang Kami menyediakan asuransi, termasuk, namun tidak terbatas pada, pembayaran klaim."].

Follow-up Question(s):
*   ["ask", "Apa saja pengecualian umum lainnya dalam polis SmartTravel Internasional?"]
*   ["ask", "Bagaimana cara mengajukan klaim untuk SmartTravel Internasional?"]
*   ["ask", "Apakah ada produk AXA lain yang mencakup perjalanan ke negara-negara ini?"]

column25: What about AML? Does this international smarttravel product also have exceptions for countries that cannot be visited or are covered?
column26:
Yes, due to regulatory compliance, SmartTravel International Insurance has an exclusion for sanctioned countries. AXA does not cover travel to countries subject to UN sanctions. These countries include:

* Afghanistan [308d0e01-602a-4fd7-b855-b702ee2e6dab, 11:12, "Afghanistan"]
* Democratic Republic of the Congo [308d0e01-602a-4fd7-b855-b702ee2e6dab, 11:12, "Democratic Republic of the Congo"]
* Eritrea [308d0e01-602a-4fd7-b855-b702ee2e6dab, 11:12, "Eritrea"]
* Guinea Bissau [308d0e01-602a-4fd7-b855-b702ee2e6dab, 11:12, "Guinea Bissau"]
* Haiti [308d0e01-602a-4fd7-b855-b702ee2e6dab, 11:12, "Haiti"]
* Iran [308d0e01-602a-4fd7-b855-b702ee2e6dab, 11:12, "Iran"]
* Iraq [308d0e01-602a-4fd7-b855-b702ee2e6dab, 11:12, "Iraq"]
* Kenya [308d0e01-602a-4fd7-b855-b702ee2e6dab, 11:12, "Kenya"]
* Lebanon [308d0e01-602a-4fd7-b855-b702ee2e6dab, 11:12, "Lebanon"]
* Liberia [308d0e01-602a-4fd7-b855-b702ee2e6dab, 11:12, "Liberia"]
* Libya [308d0e01-602a-4fd7-b855-b702ee2e6dab, 11:12, "Libya"]
* Nigeria [308d0e01-602a-4fd7-b855-b702ee2e6dab, 11:12, "Nigeria"]
* North Korea [308d0e01-602a-4fd7-b855-b702ee2e6dab, 11:12, "North Korea"]
* Rwanda [308d0e01-602a-4fd7-b855-b702ee2e6dab, 11:12, "Rwanda"]
* Sierra Leone [308d0e01-602a-4fd7-b855-b702ee2e6dab, 11:12, "Sierra Leone"]
* Somalia [308d0e01-602a-4fd7-b855-b702ee2e6dab, 11:12, "Somalia"]
* Sudan [308d0e01-602a-4fd7-b855-b702ee2e6dab, 11:12, "Sudan"]
* South Sudan [308d0e01-602a-4fd7-b855-b702ee2e6dab, 11:12, "South Sudan"]
* Syria [308d0e01-602a-4fd7-b855-b702ee2e6dab, 11:12, "Syria"]
* Zimbabwe [308d0e01-602a-4fd7-b855-b702ee2e6dab, 11:12, "Zimbabwe"]
* Angola [308d0e01-602a-4fd7-b855-b702ee2e6dab, 11:12, "Angola"]
* Palestine [308d0e01-602a-4fd7-b855-b702ee2e6dab, 11:12, "Palestine"]

This list also includes other countries updated by the United Nations [308d0e01-602a-4fd7-b855-b702ee2e6dab, 11:12, "and other countries updated by the United Nations."]. This exclusion aligns with the international economic sanctions clause, which states that AXA will not provide coverage or pay claims if doing so would result in a violation of international economic sanctions, laws, or regulations, including those imposed by the United Nations, the European Union, the United Kingdom, or the United States [e25f6b86-7e02-4f53-ba75-4416af2532c2, 21:22, "This insurance does not apply where trade or economic sanctions or other laws or regulations prohibit us from providing insurance, including, but not limited to, paying claims."].

Follow-up Question(s):
* ["ask", "What are the other common exclusions in SmartTravel International policies?"]
* ["ask", "How do I file a claim for SmartTravel International?"]
* ["ask", "Are there other AXA products that cover travel to these countries?"]

column2: What are the exclusions for SmartDrive insurance?
column3:
SmartDrive insurance does not cover losses, damages, or expenses for the motor vehicle and/or third-party legal liability caused by:

*   **Vehicle Usage**:
    *   Being used for towing or pushing other vehicles/objects, or for driving lessons [7a90405a-d05f-4e91-8711-f1a3d682d512, 100:106, "1.1.1. towing or pushing other vehicles or objects, giving driving lesson;"].
    *   Participating in contests, training, skill or speed hobbies, carnivals, parades, campaigns, or demonstrations [7a90405a-d05f-4e91-8711-f1a3d682d512, 107:115, "1.1.2. participating in contests, trainings, channeling of skill or speed hobby, carnivals, parades, campaigns, demonstrations;"].
    *   Committing crimes [7a90405a-d05f-4e91-8711-f1a3d682d512, 116:119, "1.1.3. committing crimes;"].
    *   Usage other than what is stated in the policy [7a90405a-d05f-4e91-8711-f1a3d682d512, 120:124, "1.1.4. use other than those mentioned in this Policy;"].
*   **Fraudulent Acts**: Embezzlement, fraud, hypnotism, and similar acts [7a90405a-d05f-4e91-8711-f1a3d682d512, 125:129, "1.2. embezzlement, fraud, hypnotic and the like;"].
*   **Theft and Malicious Acts by Related Parties**: Theft and/or malicious acts committed by spouses, children, parents, or siblings of the Insured; people working for or with the knowledge/consent of the Insured; people living with the Insured; management, shareholders, commissioners, or employees (if the Insured is a legal entity); or people under the supervision of the Insured [7a90405a-d05f-4e91-8711-f1a3d682d512, 130:167, "1.3. theft and/or malicious acts committed by:\n1.3.1. spouses, children, parents or siblings of the Insured;\n1.3.2. people working for the Insured, people with the knowledge or with the consent of the Insured;\n1.3.3. people living with the Insured;\n1.3.4. management, share holders, commissioners or employees, if the Insured is a legal entity;\n1.3.5. people under supervision of the Insured"].
*   **Overloading**: Overload of vehicle capacity as set by the manufacturer, if not regulated by the authority [7a90405a-d05f-4e91-8711-f1a3d682d512, 168:177, "1.4. overload of vehicle capacity set out by the manufacturer if such provisions not regulated by the authority."].
*   **Contents of Vehicle**: Goods and/or animals inside, loaded to, piled in, unloaded from, or transported by the motor vehicle [7a90405a-d05f-4e91-8711-f1a3d682d512, 183:193, "2.1. goods and/or animals inside, loaded to, piled in, unloaded from or transported by Motor Vehicle;"].
*   **Chemicals/Liquids**: Chemicals, water, or other liquids inside the motor vehicle, unless a consequence of a covered risk [7a90405a-d05f-4e91-8711-f1a3d682d512, 194:204, "2.2. chemicals, water or other liquids; residing inside the Motor Vehicle;\nunless as a consequence of the risk covered by the Policy;"].
*   **Catastrophic Events**: Riot, strike, lock-out, brawling, civil commotion, insurrection, usurped power, revolution, rebellion, military power, invasion, civil war, war and hostilities, subversive act, terrorism, sabotage, looting [7a90405a-d05f-4e91-8711-f1a3d682d512, 210:229, "3.1. riot, strike, lock-out, brawling, civil commotion, insurrection, usurped power, revolution, rebellion, military power, invasion, civil war, war and hostilities, subversive act, terrorism, sabotage, looting;"].
*   **Natural Disasters**: Earthquake, volcanic eruption, windstorm, tempest, tsunami, hail, flood, inundation, landslide, or other geological or meteorological symptoms [7a90405a-d05f-4e91-8711-f1a3d682d512, 230:241, "3.2. earthquake, volcanic eruption, windstorm, tempest, tsunami, hail, flood, inundation, landslide or other geological or meteorological symptoms;"].
*   **Nuclear Events**: Nuclear reaction, including but not limited to nuclear radiation, ionization, fusion, fission, or radioactive contamination [7a90405a-d05f-4e91-8711-f1a3d682d512, 242:255, "3.3. nuclear reaction, including but not limited to nuclear radiation, ionization, fusion, fission or radioactive contamination, irrespective of whether it occurs inside or outside the Motor Vehicle and/or interest insured."].
*   **Deliberate Acts/Improper Driving**:
    *   Caused by deliberate action of the Insured and/or driver and/or people working for or instructed by the Insured [7a90405a-d05f-4e91-8711-f1a3d682d512, 261:268, "4.1. cause by deliberate action of the Insured and/or driver and/or people working for and/or people instructed by the Insured:"].
    *   Driven by someone without a valid and proper driving license (SIM) [7a90405a-d05f-4e91-8711-f1a3d682d512, 269:282, "4.2. in the event of any loss or damage, Motor Vehicle is driven by a person who has no valid and proper Driving License (SIM) as regulated in prevailing laws and regulations concerning road traffic; This exlcusion does not apply in the case of loss for parked vehicle"].
    *   Driven by someone under the influence of alcohol, illegal drugs, or other hazardous substances [7a90405a-d05f-4e91-8711-f1a3d682d512, 283:289, "4.3. driven by someone under the influence of alcohol, drugs or any some other hazardous substances;"].
    *   Driven forcibly even if the vehicle is technically damaged or not roadworthy [7a90405a-d05f-4e91-8711-f1a3d682d512, 290:295, "4.4. driven forcibly even though the condition of vehicle is technically out of order or not roadworthy;"].
    *   Entering or crossing closed, forbidden roads, roads not intended for motor vehicles, or violating traffic rules [7a90405a-d05f-4e91-8711-f1a3d682d512, 296:303, "4.5. entering or going across roads that are closed, forbidden, not allocated for Motor Vehicle or violating traffic rules."].
*   **Specific Parts/Documents**:
    *   Non-standard equipment not mentioned in the policy [7a90405a-d05f-4e91-8711-f1a3d682d512, 309:312, "5.1. non standard equipments which are not mentioned in the Policy:"].
    *   Tires, rims, rim covers not accompanied by damage to other parts of the motor vehicle, unless caused by covered risks (malicious act, theft, fire) [7a90405a-d05f-4e91-8711-f1a3d682d512, 313:323, "5.2. tires, rims, rim cover not accompanied by damage to other parts of Motor Vehicle except for those caused by risks covered in Article 1 paragraph (1) items 1.2, 1.3, 1.4 of this policy;"].
    *   Keys and/or other parts of the motor vehicle when not attached to or inside the vehicle [7a90405a-d05f-4e91-8711-f1a3d682d512, 324:329, "5.3. keys and/or other parts of Motor Vehicle when not attached or inside the vehicle;"].
    *   Parts or materials worn out due to use, inherent material defects, or improper use [7a90405a-d05f-4e91-8711-f1a3d682d512, 330:335, "5.4. parts or materials of Motor Vehicle worn out due to wear and tear, inherent vice or its improper use;"].
    *   Vehicle registration (STNK), Certificate of Ownership (BPKB), and/or other vehicle documents [7a90405a-d05f-4e91-8711-f1a3d682d512, 336:341, "5.5. Motor Vehicle License (STNK), Certificate of Ownership of Motor Vehicle (BPKB) and/or other Motor Vehicle documents."].
*   **Third-Party Legal Liability (TPL) for**:
    *   Damage to or loss of property transported, loaded, or unloaded from the motor vehicle [7a90405a-d05f-4e91-8711-f1a3d682d512, 347:352, "6.1. damage to or loss of property transported, loaded or unloaded from Motor Vehicle;"].
    *   Damage to roads, bridges, viaducts, or structures due to vibration or weight of the motor vehicle or its load [7a90405a-d05f-4e91-8711-f1a3d682d512, 353:361, "6.2. damage to roads, bridges, viaducts, structures located under, above, alongside the roads in consequence of vibration, weight of Motor Vehicle or its load."].
*   **Financial Losses**: Loss of profit, wages, decrease in price, or other financial losses suffered by the Insured [7a90405a-d05f-4e91-8711-f1a3d682d512, 362:367, "7. This insurance shall not cover any loss of profit, wage, decrease in price or other financial losses suffered by the Insured."].

Follow-up Question(s):
*   ["ask", "What are the premium rates for SmartDrive insurance?"]
*   ["ask", "How do I file a claim for SmartDrive insurance?"]
*   ["ask", "What is the deductible for SmartDrive insurance?"]

column2: What are the premium rates for SmartDrive insurance?
column3:
The premium rates for SmartDrive insurance vary based on the type of coverage, the sum insured, and the vehicle's registration region. **Comprehensive Coverage Premium Rates (Non-Bus, Non-Truck Vehicles):** The rates are applied as a percentage of the sum insured. | Sum Insured Band (IDR) | Region 1 (Sumatera and surrounding islands) | Region 2 (DKI Jakarta, West Java, and Banten) | Region 3 (Other regions) | |---|---|---|---| | 0 - 125,000,000 | 3.82% - 4.20% | 3.26% - 3.59% | 2.53% - 2.78% | | 125,000,001 - 200,000,000 | 2.67% - 2.94% | 2.47% - 2.72% | 2.69% - 2.96% | | 200,000,001 - 400,000,000 | 2.18% - 2.40% | 2.08% - 2.29% | 1.79% - 1.97% | | 400,000,001 - 800,000,000 | 1.20% - 1.32% | 1.20% - 1.32% | 1.14% - 1.25% | | Above 800,000,000 | 1.05% - 1.16% | 1.05% - 1.16% | 1.05% - 1.16% | [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 10:20, "A. All makes of car in Papua are using maximum rate from OJK"]. column2: What is the deductible for SmartDrive insurance?
column3:
The deductible for SmartDrive insurance varies depending on the type of claim:

*   **Partial Loss**: IDR 300,000 per event [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 124:127, "Kerugian Sebagian : IDR 300,000 / Kejadian"].
*   **Total Loss**: IDR 300,000 per event [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 128:130, "Kerugian Total : IDR 300,000 / Kejadian"].
*   **Typhoon, Storm, Hail, Flood, Landslide & Water Hammer**: 10% of the loss value, with a minimum of IDR 500,000 per event [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 131:135, "Angin Topan, Badai, Hujan Es, Banjir dan/atau Tanah Longsor : 10% dari Nilai Kerugian, Minimal IDR 500,000 / Kejadian"].
*   **Earthquake, Tsunami, & Volcanic Eruption**: 10% of the loss value, with a minimum of IDR 500,000 per event [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 136:139, "Gempa Bumi, Tsunami dan/atau Letusan Gunung Berapi : 10% dari Nilai Kerugian, Minimal IDR 500,000 / Kejadian"].
*   **Riot**: 10% of the loss value, with a minimum of IDR 500,000 per event [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 140:142, "Huru Hara : 10% dari Nilai Kerugian, Minimal IDR 500,000 / Kejadian"].
*   **Terrorism and Sabotage**: 10% of the loss value, with a minimum of IDR 500,000 per event [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 143:145, "Terorisme dan Sabotase : 10% dari Nilai Kerugian, Minimal IDR 500,000 / Kejadian"].
*   **Personal Accident, Third Party Legal Liability, Passenger Legal Liability, Claim Preparation Allowance, New for Old, Towing Expense, and Ambulance Fee**: Nil (no deductible) [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 146:154, "Kecelakaan Diri: Nihil\nTanggung Jawab Hukum Terhadap Pihak Ketiga : Nihil\nTanggung Jawab Hukum Terhadap Penumpang : Nihil\nSantunan Biaya Klaim : Nihil\nKehilangan Kunci Kendaraan : 10% dari Nilai Kerugian, Minimal IDR 300,000\nPencurian Oleh Supir : 15% dari Nilai Kerugian\nBengkel Resmi : Nihil\nBiaya Taksi : 2 hari Franchise (Untuk pengerjaan di bengkel sampai dengan 2 hari tidak mendapat penggantian)\nNew for Old, Biaya Derek, Biaya Ambulance : Nihil"].
*   **Loss of Vehicle Key**: 10% of the loss value, with a minimum of IDR 300,000 [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 149:151, "Kehilangan Kunci Kendaraan : 10% dari Nilai Kerugian, Minimal IDR 300,000"].
*   **Theft by Driver**: 15% of the loss value [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 152:153, "Pencurian Oleh Supir : 15% dari Nilai Kerugian"].
*   **Taxi Fare Allowance**: 2 days franchise (no reimbursement for repairs up to 2 days) [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 154:156, "Biaya Taksi : 2 hari Franchise (Untuk pengerjaan di bengkel sampai dengan 2 hari tidak mendapat penggantian)"].

column25: What is the deductible for SmartDrive insurance?
column26:
The deductible for SmartDrive insurance varies depending on the type of claim:

* **Partial Loss**: IDR 300,000 per event [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 124:127, "Partial Loss: IDR 300,000 / Event"].
* **Total Loss**: IDR 300,000 per event [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 128:130, "Total Loss: IDR 300,000 / Event"].
* **Typhoon, Storm, Hail, Flood, Landslide & Water Hammer**: 10% of the loss value, with a minimum of IDR 500,000 per event [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 131:135, "Typhoon, Storm, Hail, Flood and/or Landslide: 10% of the Loss Value, Minimum IDR 500,000 / Event"].
* **Earthquake, Tsunami, & Volcanic Eruption**: 10% of the loss value, with a minimum of IDR 500,000 per event [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 136:139, "Earthquake, Tsunami, and/or Volcanic Eruption: 10% of the Loss Value, Minimum IDR 500,000 / Event"].
* **Riot**: 10% of the loss value, with a minimum of IDR 500,000 per event [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 140:142, "Riot: 10% of the Loss Value, Minimum IDR 500,000 / Event"].
* **Terrorism and Sabotage**: 10% of the loss value, with a minimum of IDR 500,000 per event [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 143:145, "Terrorism and Sabotage: 10% of the Loss Value, Minimum IDR 500,000 / Event"].
* **Personal Accident, Third Party Legal Liability, Passenger Legal Liability, Claim Preparation Allowance, New for Old, Towing Expense, and Ambulance Fee**: Nil (no deductible) [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 146:154, "Personal Accident: Nil\nLegal Liability to Third Parties: Nil\nLegal Liability to Passengers: Nil\nClaim Cost Compensation: Nil\nLoss of Vehicle Keys: 10% of the Loss Value, Minimum IDR 300,000\nTheft by Driver: 15% of the Loss Value\nAuthorized Workshop: Nil\nTaxi Fee: 2 days Franchise (For work at the workshop up to 2 days no reimbursement)\nNew for Old, Towing Fee, Ambulance Fee: Nil"].

* **Loss of Vehicle Key**: 10% of the loss value, with a minimum of IDR 300,000 [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 149:151, "Loss of Vehicle Key : 10% of Loss Value, Minimum IDR 300,000"].
* **Theft by Driver**: 15% of the loss value [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 152:153, "Theft by Driver: 15% of the Loss Value"].
* **Taxi Fare Allowance**: 2-day franchise (no reimbursement for repairs up to 2 days) [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 154:156, "Taxi Fare Allowance: 2-day franchise (Work at the repair shop for up to 2 days will not be reimbursed)"].

column2: Ok then, so kalau mau melakukan perjalanan ke Palestina bisa gak untuk smarttravel internasional?
column3:
Berdasarkan dokumen yang tersedia, perjalanan ke Palestina tidak dijamin oleh Asuransi SmartTravel Internasional karena Palestina termasuk dalam daftar negara yang dikecualikan karena sanksi PBB [308d0e01-602a-4fd7-b855-b702ee2e6dab, 11:12, "Seluruh dunia, semua negara di bawah Area A & B, Eropa, area Tibet, Mongol dan Laos kecuali negara-negara yang dikenai sanksi oleh PBB yaitu, Afganistan, Republik Demokratis Kongo, Eritrea, Guinea Bissau Haiti, Iran, Irak, Kenya, Lebanon, Liberia, Libya, Nigeria, Korea Utara, Rwanda, Sierra Leone, Somalia, Sudan, Sudan Selatan, Suriah, Zimbabwe, Angola, Palestina dan negara-negara lainnya yang diperbaharui oleh PBB."].

column25: Okay then, so if you want to travel to Palestine, can you use SmartTravel International?
column26:
Based on available documents, travel to Palestine is not covered by SmartTravel International Insurance because Palestine is included in the list of countries excluded due to UN sanctions [308d0e01-602a-4fd7-b855-b702ee2e6dab, 11:12, "Worldwide, all countries under Areas A & B, Europe, Tibet, Mongolia, and Laos except countries subject to UN sanctions, namely, Afghanistan, Democratic Republic of Congo, Eritrea, Guinea Bissau, Haiti, Iran, Iraq, Kenya, Lebanon, Liberia, Libya, Nigeria, North Korea, Rwanda, Sierra Leone, Somalia, Sudan, South Sudan, Syria, Zimbabwe, Angola, Palestine, and other countries updated by the UN."].

* ["ask", "Are there other AXA products that cover travel to Palestine?"]

column2: saya mau mengasuransikan mobil tahun 2011 masih bisa atau tidak?
column3:
Yes, a car from 2011 can still be insured.

For AXA SmartDrive and Allianz Mobilku, your car can be covered under the Total Loss Only (TLO) plan, as the maximum age for TLO coverage is 15 years [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 515:528, "Maksimal 15 Tahun untuk TLO"] [f571e0bc-cd8d-45f1-ac56-8a8c66684e48, 285:300, "Total Loss Only (TLO) usia sampai dengan 15 tahun"].

For Zurich Autocillin, your car can also be covered under the Total Loss Only (TLO) plan, with a maximum age of 20 years [daf8f90b-3a31-4d97-abdf-9cf6b47dee74, 1025:1040, "untuk jaminan Total Loss Only adalah 20 (dua puluh) tahun"].

However, for Comprehensive coverage, your 2011 car (which is 13 years old) would exceed the maximum age limits for these products:
*   **AXA SmartDrive**: Maximum 10 years for Comprehensive coverage [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 480:505, "Maksimal 10 Tahun untuk Comprehensive"].
*   **Allianz Mobilku**: Maximum 10 years for Comprehensive coverage [f571e0bc-cd8d-45f1-ac56-8a8c66684e48, 270:284, "Untuk Jaminan Gabungan (Comprehensive) usia sampai dengan 10 Tahun"].
*   **Zurich Autocillin**: Maximum 12 years for Comprehensive coverage [daf8f90b-3a31-4d97-abdf-9cf6b47dee74, 1000:1016, "Batas usia mobil yang dapat dijamin untuk jaminan Comprehensive adalah 12 (dua belas) tahun"].

Follow-up Question(s):
*   ["ask", "What is the difference between Comprehensive and Total Loss Only (TLO) coverage?"]
*   ["ask", "Can I get a premium calculation for SmartDrive TLO coverage for my 2011 car?"]
*   ["ask", "What are the benefits of SmartDrive TLO coverage?"]
column25: I want to insure a 2011 car. Is that still possible or not?
column26:
Yes, a car from 2011 can still be insured.

For AXA SmartDrive and Allianz Mobilku, your car can be covered under the Total Loss Only (TLO) plan, as the maximum age for TLO coverage is 15 years [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 515:528, "Maksimal 15 Tahun untuk TLO"] [f571e0bc-cd8d-45f1-ac56-8a8c66684e48, 285:300, "Total Loss Only (TLO) usia sampai dengan 15 tahun"].

For Zurich Autocillin, your car can also be covered under the Total Loss Only (TLO) plan, with a maximum age of 20 years [daf8f90b-3a31-4d97-abdf-9cf6b47dee74, 1025:1040, "untuk jaminan Total Loss Only adalah 20 (dua puluh) tahun"].

However, for Comprehensive coverage, your 2011 car (which is 13 years old) would exceed the maximum age limits for these products:
*   **AXA SmartDrive**: Maximum 10 years for Comprehensive coverage [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 480:505, "Maksimal 10 Tahun untuk Comprehensive"].
*   **Allianz Mobilku**: Maximum 10 years for Comprehensive coverage [f571e0bc-cd8d-45f1-ac56-8a8c66684e48, 270:284, "Untuk Jaminan Gabungan (Comprehensive) usia sampai dengan 10 Tahun"].
*   **Zurich Autocillin**: Maximum 12 years for Comprehensive coverage [daf8f90b-3a31-4d97-abdf-9cf6b47dee74, 1000:1016, "Batas usia mobil yang dapat dijamin untuk jaminan Comprehensive adalah 12 (dua belas) tahun"].

column2: Tadi ada kecelakaan diri dan tpl, berapa limitnya?
column3:
Baik, untuk premi Komprehensif dasar yang saya hitung sebelumnya, manfaat Kecelakaan Diri (Personal Accident) dan Tanggung Jawab Hukum Pihak Ketiga (TPL) memiliki limit sebagai berikut:

*   **Kecelakaan Diri (Personal Accident):** Pertanggungan atas cedera badan/atau kematian dan/atau biaya pengobatan baik untuk pengemudi dan/atau penumpang [8515c65f-2f8b-4ea3-9caa-88ad530f083d]. Limit spesifik untuk pengemudi dan penumpang tidak disebutkan dalam dokumen ini, namun secara umum akan ada batasan per orang.
*   **Tanggung Jawab Hukum Pihak Ketiga (TPL):** Ganti rugi atas tanggung jawab hukum Tertanggung terhadap kerugian yang diderita pihak ketiga (harta benda, biaya pengobatan, cedera badan, dan/atau kematian) yang disebabkan langsung oleh kendaraan akibat risiko yang dijamin polis [8515c65f-2f8b-4ea3-9caa-88ad530f083d]. Limit spesifik untuk TPL tidak disebutkan dalam dokumen ini, namun secara umum akan ada batasan per kejadian.

Untuk mengetahui limit pasti dari Kecelakaan Diri dan TPL, Anda perlu merujuk pada Ikhtisar Polis atau Sertifikat Asuransi Anda, atau menghubungi AXA Insurance Indonesia secara langsung.
column25: Earlier there was a personal accident and TPL, what is the limit?
column26:
Okay, for the basic Comprehensive premium I calculated earlier, the Personal Accident and Third Party Liability (TPL) benefits have the following limits:

* **Personal Accident:** Coverage for bodily injury/or death and/or medical expenses for both the driver and/or passengers [8515c65f-2f8b-4ea3-9caa-88ad530f083d]. Specific limits for the driver and passengers are not stated in this document, but generally there will be a limit per person.
* **Third Party Liability (TPL):** Compensation for the Insured's legal liability for losses suffered by third parties (property, medical expenses, bodily injury, and/or death) caused directly by the vehicle due to a risk covered by the policy [8515c65f-2f8b-4ea3-9caa-88ad530f083d]. The specific limits for Personal Accident and TPL coverage are not stated in this document, but generally there will be a limit per incident.

To find out the exact limits for Personal Accident and TPL coverage, you should refer to your Policy Summary or Certificate of Insurance, or contact AXA Insurance Indonesia directly.

column2: Kalau dari premi tadi itu limitnya berapa?
column3:
Mohon maaf, dengan informasi yang tersedia dalam dokumen, saya tidak dapat memberikan angka pasti untuk limit Kecelakaan Diri dan Tanggung Jawab Hukum Pihak Ketiga (TPL) yang termasuk dalam premi dasar Komprehensif yang saya hitung sebelumnya.

Dokumen hanya menyatakan bahwa manfaat tersebut **disediakan**, tetapi tidak merinci batasan nominalnya untuk premi dasar Komprehensif tanpa perluasan jaminan spesifik.

Untuk mendapatkan informasi mengenai limit pasti dari Kecelakaan Diri dan TPL yang sesuai dengan premi yang Anda bayarkan, Anda perlu:
*   Melihat **Ikhtisar Polis** atau **Sertifikat Asuransi** Anda.
*   Menghubungi **Customer Care Centre AXA Insurance Indonesia** di 1500 733 atau email customer.general@axa.co.id.
column25: What is the limit for the premium?
column26:
Unfortunately, with the information provided in the document, I cannot provide exact figures for the Personal Accident and Third Party Liability (TPL) limits included in the basic Comprehensive premium I calculated earlier.

The document only states that these benefits are provided, but does not specify the nominal limits for the basic Comprehensive premium without specific coverage extensions.

To obtain information about the exact Personal Accident and TPL limits that correspond to your premium, you need to:
* View your **Policy Summary** or **Certificate of Insurance**.
* Contact the **AXA Insurance Indonesia Customer Care Center** at 1500 733 or email customer.general@axa.co.id.

column2: Berapa preminya untuk mobil hyundai creta a/t tahun 2023?
column3:
Untuk menghitung premi asuransi mobil Hyundai Creta A/T tahun 2023, saya memerlukan beberapa informasi tambahan:

1.  **Nilai Pertanggungan (Harga Mobil):** Berapa perkiraan harga mobil Anda saat ini?
2.  **Wilayah Registrasi Plat Nomor:** Apakah plat nomor kendaraan Anda terdaftar di Wilayah 1 (Sumatera dan Kepulauan sekitarnya), Wilayah 2 (DKI Jakarta, Jawa Barat, dan Banten), atau Wilayah 3 (Selain Wilayah 1 dan 2)?
3.  **Jenis Jaminan Utama:** Apakah Anda menginginkan jaminan **Komprehensif** (menjamin kerugian sebagian & total) atau **Total Loss Only (TLO)** (menjamin kerugian total)?

Mohon berikan informasi ini agar saya dapat membantu menghitung perkiraan premi Anda.
column25: How much is the premium for a 2023 Hyundai Creta A/T?
column26:
To calculate the insurance premium for a 2023 Hyundai Creta A/T, I need some additional information:

1. **Insured Value (Car Price):** What is the estimated current value of your car?
2. **License Plate Registration Area:** Is your vehicle's license plate registered in Region 1 (Sumatra and the surrounding islands), Region 2 (DKI Jakarta, West Java, and Banten), or Region 3 (other than Regions 1 and 2)?
3. **Main Coverage Type:** Do you want **Comprehensive** coverage (covers partial and total losses) or **Total Loss Only (TLO)** (covers total losses)?

Please provide this information so I can help calculate your estimated premium.

column2: Saya beli 2 tahun lalu harganya 400juta berarti saya tulis berapa harga saat ini?
column3:
Untuk menentukan harga saat ini, Anda bisa mencari harga pasar mobil Hyundai Creta A/T tahun 2023 bekas di situs jual beli mobil atau bertanya kepada dealer mobil bekas.

Namun, untuk tujuan perhitungan premi asuransi, saya akan menggunakan harga perkiraan saat ini yang mendekati harga pasar. Mengingat Anda membeli 2 tahun lalu seharga Rp 400 juta, dan mobil baru tahun 2023, saya akan mengasumsikan harga saat ini masih berada dalam kategori yang sama untuk perhitungan premi.

Sekarang, saya memerlukan informasi berikut untuk melanjutkan perhitungan premi:

1.  **Wilayah Registrasi Plat Nomor:** Apakah plat nomor kendaraan Anda terdaftar di Wilayah 1 (Sumatera dan Kepulauan sekitarnya), Wilayah 2 (DKI Jakarta, Jawa Barat, dan Banten), atau Wilayah 3 (Selain Wilayah 1 dan 2)?
2.  **Jenis Jaminan Utama:** Apakah Anda menginginkan jaminan **Komprehensif** (menjamin kerugian sebagian & total) atau **Total Loss Only (TLO)** (menjamin kerugian total)?
column25: I bought it 2 years ago for 400 million, so what is the current price I wrote?
column26:
To determine the current price, you can search the market price of a used 2023 Hyundai Creta A/T on car buying and selling websites or ask a used car dealer.

However, for the purposes of calculating the insurance premium, I will use the current estimated price, which is close to the market price. Considering you bought the car two years ago for IDR 400 million, and the car is new in 2023, I will assume the current price is still in the same range for premium calculation.

Now, I need the following information to continue calculating the premium:

1. **License Plate Registration Region:** Is your vehicle's license plate registered in Region 1 (Sumatra and the surrounding islands), Region 2 (DKI Jakarta, West Java, and Banten), or Region 3 (other than Regions 1 and 2)?
2. **Main Coverage Type:** Do you want **Comprehensive** coverage (covers partial and total losses) or **Total Loss Only (TLO)** (covers total losses)?

column2: Plat jakarta dan mau perlindungan all risk
column3:
Untuk menghitung premi asuransi Komprehensif (All Risk) untuk mobil Hyundai Creta A/T tahun 2023 Anda dengan plat nomor Jakarta, saya memerlukan informasi berikut:

*   **Usia Pemegang Polis:** Berapa usia Anda saat ini?
*   **Merek Kendaraan:** Apakah Hyundai Creta A/T termasuk dalam kategori merek "upper" atau "lower"? (Ini mengacu pada segmentasi kendaraan untuk perhitungan premi).
column25: Jakarta plate and want all risk protection
column26:
To calculate the Comprehensive (All Risk) insurance premium for your 2023 Hyundai Creta A/T with a Jakarta license plate, I need the following information:

* **Policyholder Age:** How old are you?
* **Vehicle Make:** Is the Hyundai Creta A/T a "higher" or "lower" brand? (This refers to the vehicle segmentation for premium calculation.)

column2: Plat jakarta dan mau perlindungan all risk
column3:
Untuk menghitung premi asuransi Komprehensif (All Risk) untuk mobil Hyundai Creta A/T tahun 2023 Anda dengan plat nomor Jakarta, saya memerlukan informasi berikut:

*   **Usia Pemegang Polis**: Berapa usia Anda saat ini?
*   **Merek Kendaraan**: Apakah Hyundai Creta A/T termasuk dalam kategori merek "upper" (BMW, Mercedes-Benz, Audi, VW, Land Rover, Jaguar, dll.) dan Mazda atau "lower" (Merek lainnya)?
column25: Jakarta plate and want all risk protection
column26:
To calculate the Comprehensive (All Risk) insurance premium for your 2023 Hyundai Creta A/T with a Jakarta license plate, I need the following information:

* **Policyholder Age**: How old are you currently?
* **Vehicle Make**: Is the Hyundai Creta A/T a "higher" brand (BMW, Mercedes-Benz, Audi, VW, Land Rover, Jaguar, etc.) and Mazda, or a "lower" brand (other brands)?

column2: Kalau rusak karena banjir juga termasuk?
column3:
Ya, kerusakan karena banjir termasuk dalam perlindungan AXA SmartDrive Komprehensif Anda, asalkan Anda telah memilih perluasan jaminan untuk "Angin Topan, Badai, Hujan Es, Banjir dan/atau Tanah Longsor" [8515c65f-2f8b-4ea3-9caa-88ad530f083d].

Perluasan jaminan ini akan menanggung kerugian dan/atau kerusakan pada kendaraan bermotor yang dipertanggungkan, yang disebabkan secara langsung oleh angin topan, badai, hujan es, banjir, genangan air, dan/atau tanah longsor [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9].

Namun, perlu diingat bahwa untuk klaim yang disebabkan oleh banjir, akan ada risiko sendiri sebesar 10% dari nilai kerugian, dengan minimum Rp 500.000 per kejadian [8515c65f-2f8b-4ea3-9caa-88ad530f083d].
column25: Is it also included if it is damaged by flooding?
column26:
Yes, flood damage is included in your AXA SmartDrive Comprehensive coverage, provided you have selected the coverage extension for "Typhoon, Storm, Hail, Flood, and/or Landslide" [8515c65f-2f8b-4ea3-9caa-88ad530f083d].

This coverage extension will cover loss and/or damage to the insured motor vehicle caused directly by typhoons, storms, hail, floods, waterlogging, and/or landslides [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9].

However, please note that for claims caused by flooding, there will be a deductible of 10% of the loss value, with a minimum of IDR 500,000 per incident [8515c65f-2f8b-4ea3-9caa-88ad530f083d].

column2: Kalau premi di atas termasuk atau gak?
column3:
Mohon maaf, premi yang saya hitungkan sebelumnya sebesar 9.170.000 IDR **belum termasuk** perluasan jaminan untuk "Angin Topan, Badai, Hujan Es, Banjir dan/atau Tanah Longsor".

Perhitungan premi awal hanya mencakup jaminan Komprehensif dasar. Untuk menambahkan perlindungan terhadap banjir, perlu ada tambahan premi.
column25: Is the above premium included or not?
column26:
Sorry, the premium I calculated previously was IDR 9,170,000 **not including** the coverage extension for "Typhoon, Storm, Hail, Flood and/or Landslide".

The initial premium calculation only includes the basic Comprehensive coverage. To add flood protection, an additional premium is required.

column25: What about international SmartTravel? Can the above case be done?
column26:

column2: Periode 1 thn. Wilayah 2, buatkan opsi semua jaminan
column3:
Untuk menghitung premi SmartDrive untuk kendaraan listrik Wuling Air tahun 2025 seharga Rp 279.000.000 di Wilayah 2 dengan periode 1 tahun dan semua jaminan, saya memerlukan usia pemegang polis.

Mohon informasikan usia Anda (pemegang polis) agar saya dapat melanjutkan perhitungan.

Setelah itu, saya akan mengonfirmasi pilihan jaminan utama (Komprehensif) dan semua perluasan jaminan yang berlaku, yaitu:
*   Angin Topan, Badai, Hujan Es, Banjir atau Tanah Longsor
*   Gempa Bumi, Tsunami atau Letusan Gunung Berapi
*   Huru hara dan Kerusuhan
*   Terorisme dan Sabotase
*   Tanggung Jawab Hukum Pihak ketiga maksimal Rp. 50 juta
*   Kecelakaan Diri maksimal Rp. 50 juta per orang (Untuk Pengemudi dan Penumpang)
*   Tanggung Jawab Hukum terhadap Penumpang maksimal Rp. 50 juta
*   Santunan Biaya Klaim (Rp10,000,000)
*   Kehilangan Kunci Kendaraan (up to Rp5,000,000)
*   Pencurian oleh Supir (Hanya Wilayah 2)
*   Manfaat Khusus (New For Old, Penggantian Biaya Taksi, Mobil Derek, Ambulance)

Perlu diperhatikan bahwa perluasan jaminan "Bengkel Resmi" tidak akan termasuk dalam perhitungan karena harga kendaraan Anda (Rp 279.000.000) di bawah batas minimum Rp 400.000.000 yang disyaratkan.
column25: Period 1 year. Region 2, make all guarantees option
column26:
To calculate the SmartDrive premium for a Wuling Air electric vehicle in 2025 for IDR 279,000,000 in Region 2 with a 1-year term and all coverages, I need the policyholder's age.

Please provide your (the policyholder's) age so I can proceed with the calculation.

After that, I will confirm the primary coverage (Comprehensive) and all applicable coverage extensions, namely:
* Hurricane, Storm, Hail, Flood, or Landslide
* Earthquake, Tsunami, or Volcanic Eruption
* Riots and Civil Commotion
* Terrorism and Sabotage
* Third Party Liability up to IDR 50 million
* Personal Accident up to IDR 50 million per person (for Driver and Passengers)
* Passenger Liability up to IDR 50 million 50 million
* Claims Compensation (Rp 10,000,000)
* Lost Vehicle Key (up to Rp 5,000,000)
* Theft by Driver (Region 2 Only)
* Special Benefits (New for Old, Taxi, Towing, and Ambulance Reimbursement)

Please note that the "Authorized Workshop" coverage extension will not be included in the calculation because your vehicle's price (Rp 279,000,000) is below the required minimum of Rp 400,000,000.

column2: Apakah ada produk AXA lain yang menawarkan diskon langsung?
column3:
Saya tidak memiliki informasi mengenai produk AXA Indonesia yang menawarkan diskon langsung dalam dokumen yang tersedia.

Namun, beberapa produk pesaing menawarkan diskon:
*   **Allianz SmartHealth Maxi Violet** menawarkan total diskon hingga 35% [63b31f92-1e14-4cc4-a529-bf2ccba76de3, 1018:1140]. Diskon ini terdiri dari:
    *   5% untuk penambahan anggota keluarga [63b31f92-1e14-4cc4-a529-bf2ccba76de3, 1018:1140].
    *   10% jika memiliki produk SmartLink Flexi Account Plus atau SmartLink New Flexi Account [63b31f92-1e14-4cc4-a529-bf2ccba76de3, 1018:1140].
    *   20% jika tidak ada klaim di tahun sebelumnya dan polis diperpanjang [63b31f92-1e14-4cc4-a529-bf2ccba76de3, 1018:1140].
*   **Manulife MiUltimate HealthCare** memiliki fitur "No Claim Discount (Diskon Premi)" untuk perpanjangan hingga 15% [2d354c3b-d0c8-4324-a862-eeda1d20605d, 1018:1095].

column25: Are there any other AXA products that offer direct discounts?
column26:
I don't have any information on AXA Indonesia products offering direct discounts in the available documentation.

However, some competing products do offer discounts:
* **Allianz SmartHealth Maxi Violet** offers a total discount of up to 35% [63b31f92-1e14-4cc4-a529-bf2ccba76de3, 1018:1140]. This discount consists of:
* 5% for additional family members [63b31f92-1e14-4cc4-a529-bf2ccba76de3, 1018:1140].
* 10% for SmartLink Flexi Account Plus or SmartLink New Flexi Account [63b31f92-1e14-4cc4-a529-bf2ccba76de3, 1018:1140].
* 20% if there were no claims in the previous year and the policy is renewed [63b31f92-1e14-4cc4-a529-bf2ccba76de3, 10:18:1140].
* **Manulife MiUltimate HealthCare** has a "No Claim Discount" feature for renewals of up to 15% [2d354c3b-d0c8-4324-a862-eeda1d20605d, 10:18:1095].

Follow-up Question(s):

column2: Jadi kalu saya mau menutup asuransi dengan opsi comprehensive diatas tinggal ke web axa mypage ya?
column3:

Untuk menghitung premi komprehensif dengan semua cakupan yang tersedia, saya masih memerlukan detail spesifik mengenai "semua cakupan" yang Anda inginkan, karena ada banyak perluasan jaminan opsional yang dapat dipilih.
column25: So if I want to close the insurance with the comprehensive option above, I just go to the AXA MyPage website, right?
column26:

To calculate the comprehensive premium with all available coverage, I still need specific details about the "all coverage" you want, as there are many optional coverage extensions to choose from.

column2: Kalau melakukan perjalanan tanpa orang dewasa bagaimana?
column3:
Berdasarkan ketentuan polis SmartTravel Domestik dan Internasional dari AXA, anak-anak harus melakukan perjalanan bersama dengan Tertanggung (orang dewasa) selama keseluruhan periode perjalanan [67aa6331-98e2-47ec-93e2-706107397f88, 1:2, "3. \"Anak/Anak-anak\" berarti anak/anak-anak yang menjadi tanggungan Anda dan belum menikah, berusia antara 1 tahun sampai dengan maksimum 19 tahun dan melakukan Perjalanan bersama Tertanggung selama keseluruhan periode."].

Untuk SmartTravel Internasional, anak-anak juga harus melakukan perjalanan bersama Anda (untuk Perjalanan Tunggal) dan bersama Anda/Pasangan Anda (untuk Program Tahunan) [e25f6b86-7e02-4f53-ba75-4416af2532c2, 1:2, "3. \"Child/Children\" means dependents and unmarried children between te ages of 1 (one) year old up to a maximum of 17 (seventeen) years old or if full time students at a recognized educational institution up to a maximum of 25 (twenty five) years old and must travel with You (for Single Trip) and with You/Your Partner (for Annual Program) during the coverage period."].

Ini berarti perjalanan tanpa orang dewasa tidak dijamin oleh polis SmartTravel Domestik maupun Internasional.

Follow-up Question(s):
*   ["ask", "Berapa batasan usia anak untuk SmartTravel Domestik dan Internasional?"]
*   ["ask", "Apakah ada manfaat khusus untuk anak-anak dalam polis ini?"]
*   ["ask", "Apa yang terjadi jika anak sakit saat bepergian dengan orang dewasa?"]
column25: What if you travel without adults?
column26:
Under the terms of AXA's SmartTravel Domestic and International policies, children must travel with the Insured (adult) for the entire travel period [67aa6331-98e2-47ec-93e2-706107397f88, 1:2, "3. "Children" means your dependent children who are unmarried, aged between 1 year and a maximum of 19 years and traveling with the Insured for the entire period."].

For SmartTravel International, children must also travel with you (for Single Trips) and with you/your Partner (for Annual Programs) [e25f6b86-7e02-4f53-ba75-4416af2532c2, 1:2, "3. "Child/Children" means dependent and unmarried children between the ages of one year old and up to a maximum of seventeen years old, or if full-time students at a recognized educational institution, up to a maximum of twenty-five years old, and must travel with you (for Single Trips) and with you/your Partner (for Annual Programs) during the coverage period."].

This means that travel without adults is not covered by SmartTravel Domestic or International policies.

Follow-up Question(s):
* ["ask", "What is the child age limit for SmartTravel Domestic and International?"]
* ["ask", "Are there any special benefits for children in this policy?"]
* ["ask", "What happens if a child gets sick while traveling with an adult?"]

column2: Bagaimana jika ingin tetap bisa dijamin?
column3:
Berdasarkan informasi yang tersedia dalam dokumen SmartTravel Internasional, perjalanan ke negara-negara yang dikenai sanksi oleh PBB secara tegas dikecualikan dari jaminan [308d0e01-602a-4fd7-b855-b702ee2e6dab, 11:12, "Seluruh dunia, semua negara di bawah Area A & B, Eropa, area Tibet, Mongol dan Laos kecuali negara-negara yang dikenai sanksi oleh PBB yaitu, Afganistan, Republik Demokratis Kongo, Eritrea, Guinea Bissau Haiti, Iran, Irak, Kenya, Lebanon, Liberia, Libya, Nigeria, Korea Utara, Rwanda, Sierra Leone, Somalia, Sudan, Sudan Selatan, Suriah, Zimbabwe, Angola, Palestina dan negara-negara lainnya yang diperbaharui oleh PBB."]. Polis ini tidak akan memberikan jaminan atau membayar klaim jika hal itu akan menyebabkan pelanggaran sanksi ekonomi internasional, hukum, atau peraturan [e25f6b86-7e02-4f53-ba75-4416af2532c2, 21:22, "Asuransi ini tidak berlaku apabila sanksi perdagangan atau ekonomi atau undang-undang atau peraturan lain melarang Kami menyediakan asuransi, termasuk, namun tidak terbatas pada, pembayaran klaim."].

Oleh karena itu, tidak ada ketentuan dalam polis ini yang memungkinkan jaminan untuk perjalanan ke negara-negara yang masuk dalam daftar sanksi tersebut.
column25: What if you want to still be guaranteed?
column26:
Based on the information available in the SmartTravel International document, travel to countries sanctioned by the UN is expressly excluded from the guarantee [308d0e01-602a-4fd7-b855-b702ee2e6dab, 11:12, "Worldwide, all countries under Area A & B, Europe, Tibetan area, Mongolia and Laos except countries sanctioned by the UN namely, Afghanistan, Democratic Republic of Congo, Eritrea, Guinea Bissau Haiti, Iran, Iraq, Kenya, Lebanon, Liberia, Libya, Nigeria, North Korea, Rwanda, Sierra Leone, Somalia, Sudan, South Sudan, Syria, Zimbabwe, Angola, Palestine and other countries updated by the UN."]. This policy will not provide coverage or pay claims if doing so would result in a violation of international economic sanctions, laws, or regulations [e25f6b86-7e02-4f53-ba75-4416af2532c2, 21:22, "This insurance does not apply where trade or economic sanctions or other laws or regulations prohibit us from providing insurance, including, but not limited to, the payment of claims."].

Therefore, nothing in this policy provides coverage for travel to countries on such sanctions lists.

column2: Apakah jika anak-anak usia 15 tahun melakukan perjalanan bersama dijamin dalam smarttravel internasional?
column3:
Ya, anak-anak berusia 15 tahun dijamin dalam SmartTravel Internasional, asalkan mereka adalah tanggungan dan belum menikah, serta melakukan perjalanan bersama Anda (untuk Perjalanan Tunggal) atau bersama Anda/Pasangan Anda (untuk Program Tahunan) selama periode pertanggungan [e25f6b86-7e02-4f53-ba75-4416af2532c2, 1. Definisi Umum, "Anak/Anak-anak"]. Usia maksimum untuk anak yang dijamin adalah 17 tahun, atau 25 tahun jika masih pelajar penuh waktu di institusi pendidikan yang diakui [e25f6b86-7e02-4f53-ba75-4416af2532c2, 1. Definisi Umum, "Anak/Anak-anak"].

Follow-up Question(s):
*   ["ask", "Berapa usia minimum untuk anak yang dijamin?"]
*   ["ask", "Apakah ada batasan jumlah anak dalam polis keluarga?"]
*   ["ask", "Apa saja dokumen yang diperlukan untuk mengajukan klaim jika anak sakit saat perjalanan?"]
column25: Is it guaranteed for children aged 15 years and older to travel together on international smarttravel?
column26:
Yes, children aged 15 years and older are covered under SmartTravel International, provided they are dependents and unmarried, and are traveling with you (for Single Trips) or with you/your Spouse (for Annual Plans) during the coverage period [e25f6b86-7e02-4f53-ba75-4416af2532c2, 1. General Definitions, "Children"]. The maximum age for a covered child is 17 years, or 25 years if a full-time student at a recognized educational institution [e25f6b86-7e02-4f53-ba75-4416af2532c2, 1. General Definitions, "Children"].

Follow-up Question(s):
* ["ask", "What is the minimum age for a covered child?"]
* ["ask", "Is there a limit to the number of children on a family policy?"]
* ["ask", "What documents are required to file a claim if a child becomes ill while traveling?"]

column2: Are pre-existing conditions covered by this policy?
column3:
Yes, SmartCare Executive (SmartMedicare) does cover pre-existing conditions, but with specific terms and conditions.

SmartMedicare provides benefits for pre-existing conditions with certain limits and a waiting period, depending on the plan you choose [2831a229-ea3f-491b-b1d8-8a435aa5bcb5, 12:16, "Ya, SmartMedicare menyediakan manfaat untuk pre-existing condition (yang sudah diderita sebelumnya) dengan batas/limit tertentu sesuai plan yang dipilih, dengan masa tunggu."]. For example, for plans A, B, and C, pre-existing conditions will be covered after 9 consecutive months from the start of the policy period [2831a229-ea3f-491b-b1d8-8a435aa5bcb5, 12:16, "Misalnya plan A, B dan C, pre-existing condition akan dijaminkan setelah 9 (Sembilan) bulan berturut-turut sejak dimulainya periode polis."]. This coverage is provided as long as you declare any pre-existing illnesses when you join AXA (as stated in the application form) [2831a229-ea3f-491b-b1d8-8a435aa5bcb5, 12:16, "Ini diberikan selama Anda menyatakan kepada AXA penyakit apapun yang Anda deritai sebelum Anda bergabung dengan A (tercantum dalam form SPPA/Application Form)."].

However, the policy also states that all pre-existing conditions are generally excluded unless specifically deleted in writing by the company [5396244b-d87c-45e8-9f49-ddc116182e93, 208:209, "6.1 All Pre-existing Conditions unless specifically deleted in writing by the Company."]. If you fail to disclose a pre-existing condition that you should have notified them about, it may be excluded [cd352d52-afe8-4ea8-bbda-eb309bc6bdc0, 190:193, "1. Perawatan atas setiap kondisi medis yang telah dimiliki sebelumnya oleh anggota pada waktu ia menjadi anggota dan yang seharusnya telah Anda/anggota beritahukan kepada kami tetapi tidak memberitahukan kami sama sekali atau Anda tidak memberitahu kami tentang segala sesuatunya, kecuali apabila kami telah menyepakati hal lain secara tertulis bahwa Anda tidak perlu memberitahukan hal tersebut kepada kami."].

Follow-up Question(s):
* ["ask", "What are the exclusions for SmartCare Executive?"]
* ["ask", "How can I submit a claim for SmartCare Executive?"]
* ["ask", "What is the age limit for SmartCare Executive?"]

column25: Are pre-existing conditions covered by this policy?
column26:
Yes, SmartCare Executive (SmartMedicare) does cover pre-existing conditions, but with specific terms and conditions.

SmartMedicare provides benefits for pre-existing conditions with certain limits and a waiting period, depending on the plan you choose [2831a229-ea3f-491b-b1d8-8a435aa5bcb5, 12:16, "Yes, SmartMedicare provides benefits for pre-existing conditions with certain limits depending on the plan you choose, with a waiting period."]. For example, for plans A, B, and C, pre-existing conditions will be covered after 9 consecutive months from the start of the policy period [2831a229-ea3f-491b-b1d8-8a435aa5bcb5, 12:16, "For example, for plans A, B, and C, pre-existing conditions will be covered after 9 (nine) consecutive months from the start of the policy period."]. This coverage is provided as long as you declare any pre-existing illnesses when you join AXA (as stated in the application form) [2831a229-ea3f-491b-b1d8-8a435aa5bcb5, 12:16, "This is provided as long as you declare to AXA any illnesses you suffered from before you joined AXA (listed in the SPPA/Application Form)."].

However, the policy also states that all pre-existing conditions are generally excluded unless specifically deleted in writing by the company [5396244b-d87c-45e8-9f49-ddc116182e93, 208:209, "6.1 All Pre-existing Conditions unless specifically deleted in writing by the Company."]. If you fail to disclose a pre-existing condition that you should have notified them about, it may be excluded [cd352d52-afe8-4ea8-bbda-eb309bc6bdc0, 190:193, "1. Treatment of any medical condition that the member had at the time of becoming a member and about which you/the member should have notified us but did not tell us at all or you did not tell us at all, unless we have otherwise agreed in writing that you do not need to tell us about it."].

Follow-up Question(s):
* ["ask", "What are the exclusions for SmartCare Executive?"]
* ["ask", "How can I submit a claim for SmartCare Executive?"]
* ["ask", "What is the age limit for SmartCare Executive?"]

column2: TLO dengan opsi lengkp perluasan seperti opsi diats yg comprehensive
column3:
Baik, saya akan menghitung premi SmartDrive untuk kendaraan listrik Wuling Air tahun 2025 seharga Rp 279.000.000 di Wilayah 2 dengan periode 1 tahun, usia pemegang polis 40 tahun, dengan jaminan utama Total Loss Only (TLO) dan semua perluasan jaminan yang Anda minta, termasuk bengkel resmi.

Berikut adalah rincian perhitungan premi Anda:

**1. Jaminan Utama: Total Loss Only (TLO)**
*   Harga Pertanggungan: Rp 279.000.000
*   Tarif Premi (Wilayah 2, Kategori 3: >Rp200.000.000 s.d. Rp400.000.000): 0.42% [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 312:315, "0.38% | 0.42%"]
*   **Premi**: 0.42% x Rp 279.000.000 = **Rp 1.171.800**

**2. Perluasan Jaminan Tambahan:**

*   **Angin Topan, Badai, Hujan Es, Banjir atau Tanah Longsor**
    *   Tarif Premi (TLO, Wilayah 2): 0.075% [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 595:599, "0.075%"]
    *   **Premi**: 0.075% x Rp 279.000.000 = **Rp 209.250**
*   **Gempa Bumi, Tsunami atau Letusan Gunung Berapi**
    *   Tarif Premi (TLO, Wilayah 2): 0.075% [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 600:604, "0.075%"]
    *   **Premi**: 0.075% x Rp 279.000.000 = **Rp 209.250**
*   **Huru hara dan Kerusuhan**
    *   Tarif Premi (TLO, Wilayah 2): 0.035% [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 605:609, "0.035%"]
    *   **Premi**: 0.035% x Rp 279.000.000 = **Rp 97.650**
*   **Terorisme dan Sabotase**
    *   Tarif Premi (TLO, Wilayah 2): 0.035% [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 610:614, "0.035%"]
    *   **Premi**: 0.035% x Rp 279.000.000 = **Rp 97.650**
*   **Tanggung Jawab Hukum Pihak Ketiga (maksimal Rp 50.000.000)**
    *   Tarif Premi:
        *   Hingga Rp 25.000.000: 1% x Rp 25.000.000 = Rp 250.000
        *   Rp 25.000.001 s.d. Rp 50.000.000: 0.5% x Rp 25.000.000 = Rp 125.000
    *   **Premi**: Rp 250.000 + Rp 125.000 = **Rp 375.000** [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 619:623, "a. UP* hingga Rp25 juta : 1% dari UP\nb. UP > Rp25 juta s.d. Rp50 juta : 0,5% dari UP"]
*   **Kecelakaan Diri (maksimal Rp 50.000.000 per orang)**
    *   Untuk Pengemudi: 0.50% x Rp 50.000.000 = Rp 250.000 [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 625:626, "a. Untuk Pengemudi : 0,50% dari uang pertanggungan kecelakaan diri"]
    *   Untuk Penumpang (asumsi 4 penumpang): 0.10% x Rp 50.000.000 x 4 = Rp 200.000 [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 627:628, "b. Untuk Penumpang: 0,10% dari uang pertanggungan kecelakaan diri untuk setiap tempat duduk penumpang"]
    *   **Premi**: Rp 250.000 + Rp 200.000 = **Rp 450.000**
*   **Tanggung Jawab Hukum terhadap Penumpang (maksimal Rp 50.000.000)**
    *   Tarif Premi:
        *   Hingga Rp 25.000.000: 0.50% x Rp 25.000.000 = Rp 125.000
        *   Rp 25.000.001 s.d. Rp 50.000.000: 0.25% x Rp 25.000.000 = Rp 62.500
    *   **Premi**: Rp 125.000 + Rp 62.500 = **Rp 187.500** [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 630:634, "a. UP hingga Rp25 juta: 0,50% dari UP\nb. UP > Rp25 juta s.d. Rp50 juta : 0,25% dari UP"]
*   **Santunan Biaya Klaim (Rp 10.000.000)**
    *   Tarif Premi (TLO, untuk UP Rp 200.000.001 - Rp 400.000.000): 0.015% [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 638:642, "c. > Rp. 200 juta s.d. Rp. 400 juta: 0.015%"]
    *   **Premi**: 0.015% x Rp 279.000.000 = **Rp 41.850**
*   **Kehilangan Kunci Kendaraan (up to Rp 5.000.000)**
    *   **Premi**: **Rp 50.000** [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 646:647, "Rp50,000"]
*   **Pencurian oleh Supir (Hanya Wilayah 2)**
    *   Tarif Premi (TLO, Wilayah 2): 0.10% [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 648:649, "0.10%"]
    *   **Premi**: 0.10% x Rp 279.000.000 = **Rp 279.000**
*   **Bengkel Resmi (Hanya Wilayah 2)**
    *   Tarif Premi (TLO, Wilayah 2): 0.20% [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 650:651, "0.20%"]
    *   **Premi**: 0.20% x Rp 279.000.000 = **Rp 558.000**
*   **Manfaat Khusus (New For Old, Penggantian Biaya Taksi, Mobil Derek, Ambulance)**
    *   **Premi**: **Rp 100.000** [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 653:654, "Rp100,000"]

**Total Premi Perluasan Jaminan:**
Rp 209.250 + Rp 209.250 + Rp 97.650 + Rp 97.650 + Rp 375.000 + Rp 450.000 + Rp 187.500 + Rp 41.850 + Rp 50.000 + Rp 279.000 + Rp 558.000 + Rp 100.000 = **Rp 2.655.350**

**Total Premi Keseluruhan (Jaminan Utama + Perluasan Jaminan):**
Rp 1.171.800 + Rp 2.655.350 = **Rp 3.827.150**

**Biaya Materai**: Rp 10.000 [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 700:701, "Biaya Materai : IDR 10.000"]

**Total Premi Akhir yang harus dibayarkan**:
Rp 3.827.150 + Rp 10.000 = **Rp 3.837.150**

Mohon konfirmasi apakah Anda ingin melanjutkan dengan perhitungan premi ini.

**Follow-up Question(s):**
*   ["ask", "Apakah ada diskon yang tersedia untuk premi SmartDrive?"]
*   ["ask", "Bisakah saya mengubah jenis jaminan setelah polis diterbitkan?"]
*   ["ask", "Apa saja pengecualian umum dalam polis SmartDrive?"]
column25: TLO with complete expansion options such as the comprehensive options above
column26:
Okay, I'll calculate the SmartDrive premium for a 2025 Wuling Air electric vehicle worth IDR 279,000,000 in Region 2, with a 1-year term, a policyholder age of 40, with Total Loss Only (TLO) as the primary coverage and all your requested coverage extensions, including authorized repair shops.

Here are the details of your premium calculation:

**1. Primary Coverage: Total Loss Only (TLO)**
* Sum Insured: Rp 279,000,000
* Premium Rate (Region 2, Category 3: >Rp 200,000,000 to Rp 400,000,000): 0.42% [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 312:315, "0.38% | 0.42%"]
* **Premium**: 0.42% x Rp 279,000,000 = **Rp 1,171,800**

**2. Additional Coverage Extensions:**

* Hurricane, Storm, Hail, Flood, or Landslide**
* Premium Rate (TLO, Region 2): 0.075% [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 595:599, "0.075%"]
* **Premium**: 0.075% x Rp 279,000,000 = **Rp 209,250**
* **Earthquake, Tsunami, or Volcanic Eruption**
* Premium Rate (TLO, Region 2): 0.075% [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 600:604, "0.075%"]
* **Premium**: 0.075% x Rp 279,000,000 = Rp 209,250
* Riots and Civil Commotions**
* Premium Rate (TLO, Region 2): 0.035% [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 605:609, "0.035%"]
* Premium Rate: 0.035% x Rp 279,000,000 = Rp 97,650
* Terrorism and Sabotage**
* Premium Rate (TLO, Region 2): 0.035% [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 610:614, "0.035%"]
* **Premium**: 0.035% x Rp 279,000,000 = **Rp 97,650**
* **Third Party Liability (maximum Rp 50,000,000)**
* Premium Rate:
* Up to Rp 25,000,000: 1% x Rp 25,000,000 = Rp 250,000
* Rp 25,000,001 to Rp 50,000,000: 0.5% x Rp 25,000,000 = Rp 125,000
* **Premium**: Rp 250,000 + Rp 125,000 = **Rp 375,000** [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 619:623, "a. UP* up to Rp 25 million: 1% of UP\nb. UP > Rp 25 million to Rp 50 million: 0.5% of UP"]
* **Personal Accident (maximum Rp 50,000,000 per person)**
* For Driver: 0.50% x Rp 50,000,000 = Rp 250,000 [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 625:626, "a. For Driver: 0.50% of the personal accident insurance amount"]
* For Passengers (assuming 4 passengers): 0.10% x Rp 50,000,000 x 4 = Rp 200,000 [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 627:628, "b. For Passengers: 0.10% of the personal accident insurance amount for each passenger seat"]
* **Premium**: Rp 250,000 + Rp 200,000 = **Rp 450,000**
* **Legal Liability to Passengers (maximum Rp 50,000,000)**
* Premium Rate:
* Up to Rp 25,000,000: 0.50% x Rp 25,000,000 = Rp 125,000
* Rp 25,000,001 to Rp 50,000,000: 0.25% x Rp 25,000,000 = Rp 62,500
* **Premium**: Rp 125,000 + Rp 62,500 = **Rp 187,500** [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 630:634, "a. UP up to Rp 25 million: 0.50% of UP\nb. UP > Rp 25 million up to Rp 50 million: 0.25% of UP"]
* **Claim Cost Compensation (Rp 10,000,000)**
* Premium Rate (TLO, for UP Rp 200,000,001 - Rp 400,000,000): 0.015% [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 638:642, "c. > Rp. 200 million to Rp. 400 million: 0.015%"]
* **Premium**: 0.015% x Rp. 279,000,000 = **Rp. 41,850**
* **Loss of Vehicle Keys (up to Rp. 5,000,000)**
* **Premium**: **Rp. 50,000** [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 646:647, "Rp. 50,000"]
* **Theft by Driver (Region 2 Only)**
* Premium Rate (TLO, Region 2): 0.10% [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 648:649, "0.10%"]
* **Premium**: 0.10% x Rp 279,000,000 = **Rp 279,000**
* **Authorized Workshop (Region 2 Only)**
* Premium Rate (TLO, Region 2): 0.20% [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 650:651, "0.20%"]
* **Premium**: 0.20% x Rp 279,000,000 = **Rp 558,000**
* **Special Benefits (New for Old, Taxi, Towing, and Ambulance Reimbursement**
* **Premium**: **Rp 100,000** [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 653:654, "Rp100,000"]

**Total Premium for Extended Coverage:**
Rp 209,250 + Rp 209,250 + Rp 97,650 + Rp 97,650 + Rp 375,000 + Rp 450,000 + Rp 187,500 + Rp 41,850 + Rp 50,000 + Rp 279,000 + Rp 558,000 + Rp 100,000 = **Rp 2,655,350**

**Total Premium (Primary Coverage) + Extended Coverage):**
Rp 1,171,800 + Rp 2,655,350 = **Rp 3,827,150**

**Stamp Duty**: Rp 10,000 [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 700:701, "Stamp Duty: IDR 10,000"]

**Total Final Premium to be paid**:
Rp 3,827,150 + Rp 10,000 = **Rp 3,837,150**

Please confirm whether you wish to proceed with this premium calculation.

column2: Mana perhitungannya?
column3:
Mohon maaf, saya belum bisa memberikan perhitungannya karena saya masih membutuhkan beberapa informasi dari Anda.

Sebelumnya saya sudah menginformasikan bahwa produk SmartDrive hanya menawarkan periode asuransi 1 tahun yang dapat diperbarui, bukan 3 tahun [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 114:117, "Periode Asuransi : 1 tahun yang syarat dan kondisi polisnya dapat diperbaharui kembali pada setiap ulang tahun polis (renewable)"].

Untuk dapat menghitung premi, saya memerlukan detail berikut:
*   Apakah Anda ingin menghitung premi untuk periode asuransi 1 tahun?
*   Wilayah operasional kendaraan Anda (Wilayah 1: Sumatera dan Kepulauan di sekitarnya; Wilayah 2: DKI Jakarta, Jawa Barat, dan Banten; atau Wilayah 3: Selain Wilayah 1 dan Wilayah 2)?
*   Jenis jaminan utama yang Anda inginkan (Komprehensif atau Total Loss Only)?
*   Perluasan jaminan opsional apa saja yang Anda inginkan?
column25: Where is the calculation?
column26:
Sorry, I can't provide the calculation yet because I still need some information from you.

I previously informed you that the SmartDrive product only offers a 1-year renewable insurance period, not a 3-year one [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 114:117, "Insurance Period: 1 year, the terms and conditions of the policy can be renewed at each policy anniversary (renewable)"].

To calculate the premium, I need the following details:
* Do you want to calculate the premium for a 1-year insurance period?
* Your vehicle's operational area (Region 1: Sumatra and the surrounding islands; Region 2: DKI Jakarta, West Java, and Banten; or Region 3: Other than Regions 1 and 2)?
* What type of primary coverage do you want (Comprehensive or Total Loss Only)?
* What optional coverage extensions do you want?

column2: Is there a waiting period for claims if I have joined this policy?
column3:
Yes, there is a waiting period for claims if you have joined the SmartCare Executive policy.

There is a 30-day waiting period for any disability that begins or occurs within this period, with the exception of accidental injuries [5396244b-d87c-45e8-9f49-ddc116182e93, 210:213, "6.3 Any Disability which commences or occurs within the Waiting Period of 30 (thirty) days, except for Accidental Injuries."]. This 30-day waiting period applies when a person is insured for the first time [5396244b-d87c-45e8-9f49-ddc116182e93, 100:103, "4.23 Waiting Period shall mean the first thirty (30) days between the commencement date of this Policy and beginning of the Insured Person's Disability and is applied only when the person is first insured."].

For pre-existing conditions, SmartMedicare provides benefits with certain limits and a waiting period. For example, for plans A, B, and C, pre-existing conditions will be covered after 9 consecutive months from the start of the policy period, provided you declared any pre-existing illnesses when applying [2831a229-ea3f-491b-b1d8-8a435aa5bcb5, 12:16, "Ya, SmartMedicare menyediakan manfaat untuk pre-existing condition (yang sudah diderita sebelumnya) dengan batas/limit tertentu sesuai plan yang dipilih, dengan masa tunggu. Misalnya plan A, B dan C, pre-existing condition akan dijaminkan setelah 9 (Sembilan) bulan berturut-turut sejak dimulainya periode polis. Ini diberikan selama Anda menyatakan kepada AXA penyakit apapun yang Anda deritai sebelum Anda bergabung dengan A (tercantum dalam form SPPA/Application Form)."].

Follow-up Question(s):
* ["ask", "What are the exclusions for SmartCare Executive?"]
* ["ask", "How can I submit a claim for SmartCare Executive?"]
* ["ask", "What is the age limit for SmartCare Executive?"]
