column2: Kalu misalkan saya sudah beli polis travel domestik single trip 10 hari plan platinum, tapi saya sakit jadi direschedule perjalanannya hanya saja saya ada bayar tambahan biaya untuk reschedule tiket sebesar 250.000 ini bisa saya klaim gak?
column3:
Jika Anda memiliki polis SmartTravel Domestik plan Platinum dan perjalanan Anda direschedule karena sakit, biaya tambahan untuk reschedule tiket sebesar Rp 250.000 **kemungkinan bisa diklaim** di bawah manfaat "Kehilangan Uang Muka atau Pembatalan" [d7e53a2b-3ff8-4e79-8aef-0036a1d00b49, 11:12, "Bagian 11 - Kehilangan Uang Muka atau Pembatalan"].

Manfaat ini mencakup penggantian atas kehilangan biaya perjalanan yang telah dibayar di muka dan tidak dapat diperoleh kembali dari sumber lain akibat pembatalan perjalanan yang direncanakan karena sakit atau cedera parah [d7e53a2b-3ff8-4e79-8aef-0036a1d00b49, 11:12, "Penanggung akan membayarkan kepada Tertanggung penggantian atas kehilangan biaya perjalanan dan/atau akomodasi yang telah Tertanggung bayar dimuka dan tidak dapat diperoleh kembali dari sumber lain akibat pembatalan Perjalanan yang direncanakan... dan diakibatkan oleh: 1. Kematian, sakit atau cedera parah..."].

Namun, ada beberapa ketentuan yang harus dipenuhi:
*   Pembatalan (atau reschedule yang mengakibatkan biaya tambahan) harus terjadi kurang dari 30 hari sebelum tanggal dimulainya perjalanan [d7e53a2b-3ff8-4e79-8aef-0036a1d00b49, 11:12, "pembatalan terjadi kurang dari 30 (tiga puluh) hari... sebelum tanggal dimulainya Perjalanan"].
*   Anda harus mendapatkan keterangan tertulis dari Dokter Praktek yang merawat Anda untuk memastikan kelayakan pembatalan perjalanan akibat sakit [d7e53a2b-3ff8-4e79-8aef-0036a1d00b49, 11:12, "keterangan tertulis dari Dokter Praktek yang bertugas merawat Tertanggung harus diperoleh untuk memastikan kelayakan pembatalan Perjalanan akibat sakit atau cedera."].
*   Polis harus dibeli minimal 1 hari kalender sebelum keberangkatan dan Anda belum mengetahui keadaan apa pun yang dapat menyebabkan pembatalan perjalanan Anda [d7e53a2b-3ff8-4e79-8aef-0036a1d00b49, 11:12, "Polis ini dibeli minimal 1 (satu) hari kalender sebelum keberangkatan dan Anda belum mengetahui keadaan apa pun yang dapat menyebabkan pembatalan Perjalanan Anda."].

Meskipun ada pengecualian umum untuk "perubahan rencana yang Anda lakukan... karena alasan apa pun" [d7e53a2b-3ff8-4e79-8aef-0036a1d00b49, 11:12, "perubahan rencana yang Anda lakukan atau anggota Keluarga karena alasan apa pun;"], kondisi sakit yang menyebabkan pembatalan/reschedule secara spesifik disebutkan sebagai penyebab yang dijamin.

Untuk plan Platinum, batas maksimum manfaat untuk "Kehilangan Uang Muka atau Pembatalan" adalah Rp 2.500.000 [d7e53a2b-3ff8-4e79-8aef-0036a1d00b49, 11:12, "2,500,000"]. Biaya reschedule Anda sebesar Rp 250.000 berada dalam batas ini.

Follow-up Question(s):
*   ["ask", "Dokumen apa saja yang diperlukan untuk mengajukan klaim pembatalan perjalanan?"]
*   ["ask", "Berapa lama waktu yang saya miliki untuk mengajukan klaim?"]
*   ["ask", "Apa perbedaan antara pembatalan perjalanan dan pembatasan perjalanan?"]
column7: Jawaban sudah merujuk ke Jaminan, Benefit & Pengecualiannya tetapi disarankan untuk tidak memberikan jawaban bisa pasti klaim atau kemungkinan klaim, sebaiknya lebih disarankan komunikasi dengan tim terkait.
column25: For example, if I have purchased a domestic travel policy with a 10-day single trip platinum plan, but I am sick so the trip is rescheduled, but I have to pay an additional fee of 250,000 for the ticket rescheduling. Can I claim this?
column26:
If you have a SmartTravel Domestic Platinum plan and your trip is rescheduled due to illness, an additional Rp 250,000 rescheduling fee **may be claimed** under the "Loss of Deposit or Cancellation" benefit [d7e53a2b-3ff8-4e79-8aef-0036a1d00b49, 11:12, "Section 11 - Loss of Deposit or Cancellation"].

This benefit covers reimbursement for lost prepaid travel expenses that cannot be recovered from other sources due to cancellation of a planned trip due to serious illness or injury [d7e53a2b-3ff8-4e79-8aef-0036a1d00b49, 11:12, "The Insurer will pay the Insured person reimbursement for lost prepaid travel and/or accommodation expenses that cannot be recovered from other sources due to cancellation of a planned trip... and caused by: 1. Death, serious illness or injury..."].

However, there are several conditions that must be met:
* The cancellation (or rescheduling that results in additional costs) must occur less than 30 days before the trip start date [d7e53a2b-3ff8-4e79-8aef-0036a1d00b49, 11:12, "cancellation occurs less than 30 (thirty) days... before the trip start date"].

* You must obtain a written statement from your treating physician to confirm the appropriateness of canceling your trip due to illness [d7e53a2b-3ff8-4e79-8aef-0036a1d00b49, 11:12, "A written statement from your treating physician must be obtained to confirm the appropriateness of canceling your trip due to illness or injury."].
* The policy must be purchased at least 1 calendar day before departure and you are not yet aware of any circumstances that could cause your trip to be canceled [d7e53a2b-3ff8-4e79-8aef-0036a1d00b49, 11:12, "This policy must be purchased at least 1 (one) calendar day before departure and you are not yet aware of any circumstances that could cause your trip to be canceled."].

While there is a general exclusion for "plan changes made by you... for any reason" [d7e53a2b-3ff8-4e79-8aef-0036a1d00b49, 11:12, "plan changes made by you or a Family member for any reason;"], illnesses that lead to cancellation/rescheduling are specifically listed as covered causes.

For the Platinum plan, the maximum benefit limit for "Loss of Down Payment or Cancellation" is Rp 2,500,000 [d7e53a2b-3ff8-4e79-8aef-0036a1d00b49, 11:12, "2,500,000"]. Your rescheduling fee of Rp 250,000 falls within this limit.

Follow-up Question(s):
* ["ask", "What documents are needed to file a trip cancellation claim?"]
* ["ask", "How long do I have to file a claim?"]
* ["ask", "What is the difference between a trip cancellation and a travel restriction?"]
column27: The answer refers to the Guarantee, Benefits & Exceptions but it is recommended not to provide an answer that can definitely be a claim or a possible claim, it is better to communicate with the relevant team.

column2: Pls help to calculate wuling air ev year 2025, tsi idr 279mn, for all coverage and ins period 3 years
column3:
Untuk menghitung premi SmartDrive untuk Wuling Air EV tahun 2025 dengan nilai pertanggungan IDR 279 juta, saya memerlukan beberapa informasi tambahan:

*   **Usia Pemegang Polis**: Berapa usia Anda?
*   **Wilayah Kendaraan**: Mohon sebutkan wilayah registrasi kendaraan Anda (misalnya, Wilayah 1: Sumatera dan pulau-pulau sekitarnya, Wilayah 2: DKI Jakarta, Jawa Barat, dan Banten, atau Wilayah 3: Selain Wilayah 1 dan 2).
*   **Merek Kendaraan**: Wuling Air EV termasuk dalam kategori merek "lower".

Perlu diketahui bahwa periode asuransi SmartDrive adalah 1 tahun dan dapat diperpanjang setiap tahunnya, bukan 3 tahun [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 10:13, "1 tahun yang syarat dan kondisi polisnya dapat diperbaharui kembali pada setiap ulang tahun polis (renewable)"].

Mohon berikan informasi yang diperlukan agar saya dapat melanjutkan perhitungan premi Anda.
column7: EV is not under product scheme but going to uw and RTC implementation for EV is refer to upper RTC
column25: Pls help to calculate wuling air ev year 2025, tsi idr 279mn, for all coverage and ins period 3 years
column26:
To calculate the SmartDrive premium for a Wuling Air EV in 2025 with a coverage value of IDR 279 million, I need some additional information:

* **Policyholder Age**: How old are you?
* **Vehicle Region**: Please indicate your vehicle's registration region (e.g., Region 1: Sumatra and surrounding islands, Region 2: DKI Jakarta, West Java, and Banten, or Region 3: Other than Regions 1 and 2).
* **Vehicle Brand**: The Wuling Air EV falls under the "lower" brand category.

Please note that the SmartDrive insurance period is 1 year and can be renewed annually, not 3 years [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 10:13, "1 year with policy terms and conditions renewable on each policy anniversary (renewable)"].

Please provide the necessary information so I can proceed with your premium calculation.
column27: EV is not under product scheme but going to uw and RTC implementation for EV is refer to upper RTC

column2: Kalo beli bisa dapet langsung polisnya?
column3:
Untuk produk asuransi perjalanan AXA Indonesia seperti SmartTravel Domestik dan Internasional, polis dan sertifikat asuransi Anda akan dikirimkan melalui email segera setelah pembelian dilakukan secara online [fea4bbff-11d4-4ec3-aa68-428a39de4a32, 100:229, "Your certificate of insurance and policy wording will be sent via e-mail shortly after the purchase is made"].

Untuk produk SmartDrive, permohonan diajukan melalui website MyPage dan pembayaran premi dilakukan setelah perhitungan, namun tidak disebutkan secara spesifik bahwa polis akan langsung didapatkan [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 100:500, "Prosedur Penutupan Asuransi : 1. Tertanggung mengajukan permohonan kepada penanggung melalui website MyPage dan mengisi data pertanggungan dan ketentuan lainnya yang ada di website MyPage. 2. Membayar premi yang telah dihitung sesuai dengan jaminan yang telah dipilih oleh Tertanggung dengan pilihan cara pembayaran yang ada di website MyPage."].

Untuk SmartMedicare, polis diterbitkan dalam bentuk dokumen tertulis setelah proses persetujuan dan ditandatangani secara sah oleh pejabat AXA Insurance yang berwenang [73d4417f-b37b-4565-a390-7e1dfdcffcc3, 100:500, "F. Penerbitan Polis : Polis diterbitkan dalam bentuk dokumen tertulis yang berisi data polis, ketentuan umum dan ketentuan manfaat asuransi, ketentuan asuransi tambahan (jika ada), Tabel Manfaat, daftar peserta, lampiran Rumah Sakit Jaringan (jika ada), Endosemen Polis (jika ada), salinan Surat Permohonan Asuransi Kesehatan (SPAK) dan Informasi mengenai Badan Mediasi Asuransi Indonesia (BMAI). Polis yang diterbitkan berdasarkan data-data dan informasi-informasi yang disampaikan Tertanggung melalui dokumen Surat Permohonan Asuransi Kesehatan dan hanya berlaku apabila telah diterbitkan dan ditandatangai secara sah oleh Pejabat AXA Insurance yang berwenang."].

**Follow-up Question(s):**
*   ["ask", "Apakah Anda ingin mengetahui lebih lanjut tentang produk asuransi perjalanan?"]
*   ["ask", "Apakah Anda ingin mengetahui lebih lanjut tentang produk asuransi kendaraan?"]
*   ["ask", "Apakah Anda ingin mengetahui lebih lanjut tentang produk asuransi kesehatan?"]
column25: If I buy it, can I get the policy straight away?
column26:
For AXA Indonesia travel insurance products such as SmartTravel Domestic and International, your policy and insurance certificate will be sent via email immediately after purchasing online [fea4bbff-11d4-4ec3-aa68-428a39de4a32, 100:229, "Your certificate of insurance and policy wording will be sent via email shortly after the purchase is made"].

For SmartDrive products, applications are submitted through the MyPage website and premium payments are made after calculation. However, it is not specifically stated that the policy will be received immediately [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 100:500, "Insurance Closing Procedure: 1. The insured submits an application to the insurer through the MyPage website and fills in the insurance data and other provisions on the MyPage website. 2. Pays the calculated premium according to the coverage selected by the insured using the payment method available on the MyPage website."].

For SmartMedicare, the policy is issued in the form of a written document after the approval process and is legally signed by an authorized AXA Insurance official [73d4417f-b37b-4565-a390-7e1dfdcffcc3, 100:500, "F. Policy Issuance: The policy is issued in the form of a written document containing policy data, general provisions and provisions of insurance benefits, additional insurance provisions (if any), a Table of Benefits, a list of participants, an attachment of Network Hospitals (if any), Policy Endorsement (if any), a copy of the Health Insurance Application Letter (SPAK) and Information regarding the Indonesian Insurance Mediation Agency (BMAI). The policy issued is based on the data and information submitted by the Insured through the Health Insurance Application Letter document and is only valid if it has been issued and legally signed by an authorized AXA Insurance official."].

**Follow-up Question(s):**
* ["ask", "Would you like to learn more about travel insurance products?"]
* ["ask", "Would you like to learn more about vehicle insurance products?"]
* ["ask", "Would you like to learn more about health insurance products?"]

column2: can you explain the detail benefit?
column3:
SmartMedicare, also known as SmartCare Executive, offers comprehensive benefits for inpatient and outpatient care. Here are the detailed benefits:

**Inpatient Benefits:**

1.  **Daily Hospital Room and Board**
    This benefit reimburses charges for room accommodation, meals, and general nursing services. The amount paid is equal to the actual charges made by the hospital, up to a maximum of 60 days per disability. You are entitled to this benefit only for the period you are confined in a hospital as an inpatient [5396244b-d87c-45e8-9f49-ddc116182e93, 107:114, "5.1 Biaya Kamar dan Menginap\nPenggantian biaya untuk akomodasi kamar, makanan dan layanan perawatan umum bagi Tertanggung. Besar manfaat adalah sama dengan biaya yang dibebankan oleh Rumah Sakit selama Tertanggung dirawat inap; tetapi manfaat tersebut tidak lebih besar dari manfaat biaya Kamar dan Menginap per-hari, atau maksimum 60 (enam puluh) hari per- Ketidakmampuan sebagaimana yang ditetapkan dalam Uraian Manfaat. Tertanggung hanya berhak atas manfaat ini selama ia dirawat di Rumah Sakit sebagai Pasien Rawat Inap."].

2.  **Intensive Care Unit (ICU)**
    This covers charges incurred during confinement as an inpatient in the Intensive Care Unit of the hospital. The benefit is equal to the actual charges, up to a maximum of 30 days per disability. If the ICU stay exceeds 30 days, subsequent days will be reimbursed at the standard Daily Hospital Room and Board rate [5396244b-d87c-45e8-9f49-ddc116182e93, 116:123, "5.2 Unit Perawatan Intensif\nPenggantian biaya yang ditimbulkan selama rawat inap sebagai Pasien Rawat Inap di Unit Perawatan Intensif Rumah Sakit. Besar manfaat yang dibayar sama dengan biaya yang dibebankan Rumah Sakit tetapi tidak lebih besar dari maksimum manfaat per-hari, dan maksimum 30 (tiga puluh) hari per- Ketidakmampuan, sebagaimana yang ditetapkan dalam Uraian Manfaat. Bila jangka waktu rawat inap di Unit Perawatan Intensif melebihi jumlah hari maksimum di Unit Perawatan Intensif dalam Uraian Manfaat, maka sisa jumlah hari penggantian akan ditanggung sesuai biaya Kamar dan Menginap."].

3.  **Daily Doctor Visits (General Practitioner / Specialist)**
    This reimburses fees charged by the attending general practitioner or specialist physician for daily bedside visits during hospital confinement. It is limited to one visit per day per practitioner, up to the maximum number of days for a disability as specified in the Schedule of Benefits [5396244b-d87c-45e8-9f49-ddc116182e93, 125:131, "5.3 Biaya Kunjungan Dokter per Hari\nPenggantian atas biaya yang dibebankan oleh Dokter Umum / Spesialis untuk kunjungan harian kepada Tertanggung selama dirawat inap di Rumah Sakit. Penanggung akan membayar kepada Tertanggung sebesar Biaya Wajar yang Biasa Dibebankan oleh Dokter Umum / Spesialis bagi kunjungan tersebut dengan batas 1 (satu) kunjungan per-hari untuk masing-masing Dokter selama rawat inap di Rumah Sakit, tetapi tidak melebihi batas Maksimum Hari per-Ketidakmampuan seperti yang tercantum pada Uraian Manfaat."].

4.  **Operating Theatre Charges**
    This covers the cost of using an operating theatre for a necessary surgical procedure [5396244b-d87c-45e8-9f49-ddc116182e93, 133:135, "5.4 Biaya Kamar Bedah\nPenggantian biaya untuk pemakaian Kamar Bedah yang diperlukan untuk suatu tindakan pembedahan."].

5.  **Anaesthetist's Fees**
    This reimburses reasonable and customary fees charged by the anaesthesiologist for a surgical operation, up to the maximum benefit indicated in the Schedule of Benefits [5396244b-d87c-45e8-9f49-ddc116182e93, 137:140, "5.5 Biaya Ahli Anestesi\nPenggantian atas Biaya Wajar yang Biasa Dibebankan oleh Ahli Anestesi pada suatu tindakan pembedahan mengacu pada jumlah maksimum manfaat yang tercantum dalam Uraian Manfaat."].

6.  **Surgeon's Fees**
    This covers reasonable and customary fees for surgery performed by a surgeon, including surgeon's visits and post-operative care for up to 30 days from the date of operation, within the maximum indicated in the Schedule of Benefits. If multiple operations are performed for one disability, the total payment will not exceed the maximum per disability amount [5396244b-d87c-45e8-9f49-ddc116182e93, 142:149, "5.6 Biaya Dokter Ahli Bedah\nPenggantian atas Biaya Wajar yang Biasa Dibebankan untuk suatu pembedahan yang dilakukan oleh Dokter Ahli Bedah, termasuk kunjungan Dokter Ahli Bedah kepada Tertanggung dan perawatan pasca pembedahan hingga maksimum 30 (tiga puluh) hari dari tanggal pembedahan, dan maksimum seperti yang tercantum pada Uraian Manfaat. Jika lebih dari 1 (satu) pembedahan dilakukan untuk suatu Ketidakmampuan, maka total pembayaran untuk semua pembedahan yang dilakukan tidak lebih besar dari jumlah maksimum manfaat per-Ketidakmampuan seperti yang tercantum pada Uraian Manfaat."].

7.  **Miscellaneous Hospital Expenses**
    This reimburses reasonable and customary charges for medically necessary ancillary services and consumable items directly related to the treatment received as an inpatient or for day surgery. This includes drugs during confinement, gauze bandages, syringes, laboratory test charges, X-rays, and oxygen [5396244b-d87c-45e8-9f49-ddc116182e93, 151:157, "5.7 Biaya Aneka Perawatan Rumah Sakit\nPenggantian atas Biaya Wajar yang Biasa Dibebankan oleh Rumah Sakit untuk semua pelayanan dan perawatan Tertanggung yang Diperlukan Secara Medis selama Rawat Inap atau selama Pembedahan Rawat Jalan.\nYang termasuk dalam Manfaat ini : biaya obat-obatan selama rawat inap, perban-kasa, jarum suntik, biaya laboratorium, sinar X, oksigen."].

8.  **Pre-Hospital Diagnostic Services**
    This covers reasonable and customary charges for diagnostic procedures and laboratory examinations, including prescribed drugs, recommended by a general practitioner or specialist within 30 days prior to hospital admission for inpatient stay or day surgery. Payment is contingent on subsequent hospitalization or surgical treatment [5396244b-d87c-45e8-9f49-ddc116182e93, 159:165, "5.8 Biaya Layanan Diagnostik sebelum Rawat Inap\nPenggantian atas Biaya Wajar yang Biasa Dibebankan untuk prosedur diagnostik dan pemeriksaan laboratorium termasuk obat resep, yang direkomendasikan oleh Dokter Umum atau Dokter Spesialis karena Penyakit atau Luka Tubuh yang timbul dalam kurun waktu 30 (tiga puluh) hari sebelum Tanggal Masuk Rumah Sakit untuk Rawat Inap atau Pembedahan pulang hari. Pembayaran tidak akan dilakukan jika Tertanggung selanjutnya tidak dirawat inap atau menjalani pembedahan setelah pemeriksaan-pemeriksaan tersebut."].

9.  **Post-Hospitalisation Care**
    This reimburses reasonable and customary charges for follow-up treatment by the same attending physician within 30 days immediately following discharge from the hospital for a disability [5396244b-d87c-45e8-9f49-ddc116182e93, 167:170, "5.9 Biaya Perawatan setelah Rawat Inap\nPerusahaan akan mengganti Biaya Wajar yang Biasa Dibebankan dalam perawatan tindak-lanjut oleh Dokter yang sama, dalam 30 (tiga puluh) hari setelah tanggal keluar Rumah Sakit untuk suatu Ketidakmampuan"].

10. **Emergency Out-Patient Benefit (Accidental only)**
    This covers reasonable and customary charges for services and medical supplies provided by a hospital or clinic for emergency treatment of an injury resulting from an accident. The insured person must be received as an outpatient within a maximum of 24 hours after the accident. Eligible expenses for follow-up treatment by the same doctor will be reimbursed for up to 30 days from the date of the accident for a disability [5396244b-d87c-45e8-9f49-ddc116182e93, 172:179, "5.10 Manfaat Rawat Jalan Darurat (Hanya untuk Kecelakaan)\nBiaya Wajar yang Biasa Dibebankan bagi jasa dan peralatan medis oleh Rumah Sakit atau Klinik untuk perawatan darurat bagi Luka Tubuh karena suatu Kecelakaan. Tertanggung harus diterima sebagai Pasien Rawat Jalan dalam waktu maksimum 24 (duapuluh empat) jam setelah Kecelakaan tersebut. Biaya yang layak ditimbulkan setelah itu untuk perawatan tindak-lanjut oleh Dokter yang sama akan diganti sampai dengan 30 (tiga puluh) hari setelah tanggal Kecelakaan untuk suatu Ketidakmampuan."].

11. **Ambulance Charges**
    This reimburses reasonable and customary charges for necessary domestic ambulance services (including attendance) to and/or from the hospital or between hospitals. Payment is contingent on the insured person being hospitalized [5396244b-d87c-45e8-9f49-ddc116182e93, 181:185, "5.11 Biaya Ambulans\nPenggantian atas Biaya Wajar yang Biasa Dibebankan untuk jasa ambulans domestik yang diperlukan (termasuk kehadiran perawat dalam ambulan) ke dan atau dari Rumah Sakit atau antar Rumah Sakit. Penggantian Biaya Ambulan yang diberikan maksimum sesuai Uraian Manfaat. Pembayaran tidak akan dilakukan jika Tertanggung tidak dirawat inap."].

12. **Prescription Drugs**
    This covers medically necessary prescribed drugs directly related to the insured person's disability. Reimbursement is limited to drugs used for treatment of the disability and prescribed for use within 30 days after discharge from the hospital [5396244b-d87c-45e8-9f49-ddc116182e93, 187:191, "5.12 Obat Resep\nPenggantian bagi obat-obat yang diresepkan hanya untuk yang Diperlukan Secara Medis dan secara langsung terkait dengan Ketidakmampuan Tertanggung. Hanya biaya obat yang digunakan untuk perawatan Ketidakmampuan yang dapat diganti. Penggantian obat-obat yang diresepkan hanya untuk penggunaan dalam kurun waktu 30 (tigapuluh) hari setelah Tanggal Keluar Rumah Sakit"].

13. **Per Disability Limit**
    This is the maximum benefit payable for expenses incurred for treatment provided during the insurance period, limited per disability, regardless of the type of disability. Once this limit is reached, no additional benefits will be paid [5396244b-d87c-45e8-9f49-ddc116182e93, 193:198, "5.13 Batas per Ketidakmampuan\nManfaat yang dibayarkan Perusahaan sehubungan dengan biaya yang timbul untuk Perawatan yang disediakan kepada Tertanggung selama Jangka Waktu Pertanggungan dibatasi per Ketidakmampuan sebagaimana yang tercantum dalam Uraian Manfaat tanpa memandang jenis Ketidakmampuannya dan manfaat yang dibayar sudah termasuk pajak.\nJika Batasan Per Ketidakmampuan telah dibayarkan, maka tidak ada tambahan manfaat yang dibayarkan."].

14. **Overall Annual Limit**
    This is the maximum benefit payable for expenses incurred for treatment provided during the insurance period, limited to the overall annual limit, regardless of the type of disability. Once this limit is reached, all coverage for the insured person under the policy ceases [5396244b-d87c-45e8-9f49-ddc116182e93, 200:205, "5.14 Batas Tahunan Total\nManfaat yang dibayarkan sehubungan dengan biaya yang timbul untuk Perawatan yang disediakan kepada Tertanggung selama Jangka Waktu Pertanggungan dibatasi hingga Batas Tahunan Total sebagaimana yang ditetapkan dalam Uraian Manfaat tanpa memandang jenis Ketidakmampuannya.\nJika Batas Tahunan Total telah dibayarkan, maka semua pertanggungan bagi Tertanggung di bawah Polis ini berakhir."].

**Other Benefits:**

*   **Outpatient Care**
    Annual limits for outpatient care vary by plan, up to Rp 500,000 [cd352d52-afe8-4ea8-bbda-eb309bc6bdc0, 119:121, "Rawat jalan Outpatient | Per tahun sampai dengan Annually up to | Rp 350,000 | Rp 350,000 | Rp 500,000 | Rp 500,000 | Rp 500,000 | Rp 500,000"].

*   **Personal Accident Protection**
    Annual limits for personal accident protection are up to Rp 3,000,000 [cd352d52-afe8-4ea8-bbda-eb309bc6bdc0, 123:125, "Proteksi terhadap kecelakaan diri Personal accident protection | Pertahun sampai dengan Annually up to | Rp 3,000,000 | Rp 3,000,000 | Rp 3,000,000 | Rp 3,000,000 | Rp 3,000,000 | Rp 3,000,000"].

*   **Overseas Treatment**
    Overseas cover is for emergency treatment only. The insured person must be in fit condition to travel before commencing the journey and must not have traveled with the express purpose of obtaining treatment overseas. There is no reimbursement for travel costs (including ambulance services), hotel costs, or other costs not specified in the Schedule of Benefits [5396244b-d87c-45e8-9f49-ddc116182e93, 75:83, "3.4 Wilayah Geografis\nSemua manfaat yang tercantum dalam Polis ini berlaku di seluruh dunia dengan tunduk pada syarat dan ketentuan Polis ini:\n3.4.1 Pertanggungan di luar negeri hanya untuk Perawatan Darurat\n3.4.2. Untuk perawatan darurat, Tertanggung harus dalam keadaan sehat sebelum melakukan perjalanan dan tidak mempunyai rencana untuk melakukan perawatan di luar negeri.\n3.4.3. Tidak ada penggantian biaya perjalanan (termasuk biaya ambulans), biaya hotel atau biaya lainnya yang tidak disebutkan dalam Uraian Manfaat."].

Follow-up Question(s):
* ["ask", "What are the exclusions for SmartMedicare?"]
* ["ask", "How can I submit a claim for SmartMedicare?"]
* ["ask", "What is the age limit for SmartMedicare?"]

column25: can you explain the detail benefit?
column26:
SmartMedicare, also known as SmartCare Executive, offers comprehensive benefits for inpatient and outpatient care. Here are the detailed benefits:

**Inpatient Benefits:**

1. **Daily Hospital Room and Board**
    This benefit reimburses charges for room accommodation, meals, and general nursing services. The amount paid is equal to the actual charges made by the hospital, up to a maximum of 60 days per disability. You are entitled to this benefit only for the period you are confined to a hospital as an inpatient [5396244b-d87c-45e8-9f49-ddc116182e93, 107:114, "5.1 Room and Board Costs\nReimbursement of costs for room accommodation, meals, and general nursing services for the Insured. The amount of the benefit is equal to the charges charged by the Hospital during the Insured's hospitalization; however, the benefit is not greater than the Room and Board cost benefit per day, or a maximum of 60 (sixty) days per disability as set out in the Description of Benefits. The Insured is only entitled to this benefit while they are hospitalized as an inpatient."].

2. **Intensive Care Unit (ICU)**
This covers charges incurred during confinement as an inpatient in the Intensive Care Unit of the hospital. The benefit is equal to the actual charges, up to a maximum of 30 days per disability. If the ICU stay exceeds 30 days, subsequent days will be reimbursed at the standard Daily Hospital Room and Board rate [5396244b-d87c-45e8-9f49-ddc116182e93, 116:123, "5.2 Intensive Care Unit Reimbursement of costs incurred during hospitalization as an Inpatient in a Hospital's Intensive Care Unit. The amount of benefit paid is equal to the cost charged by the Hospital but not greater than the maximum benefit per day, and a maximum of 30 (thirty) days per Disability, as set out in the Description of Benefits. If the length of stay in the Intensive Care Unit exceeds the maximum number of days in the Intensive Care Unit in the Description of Benefits, the remaining number of reimbursement days will be covered according to the Room and Board costs."].

3. **Daily Doctor Visits (General Practitioner / Specialist)**
This reimburses fees charged by the attending general practitioner or specialist physician for daily bedside visits during hospital confinement. It is limited to one visit per day per practitioner, up to the maximum number of days for a disability as specified in the Schedule of Benefits [5396244b-d87c-45e8-9f49-ddc116182e93, 125:131, "5.3 Daily Doctor Visit Fees Reimbursement for fees charged by a General Practitioner / Specialist for daily visits to the Insured during hospitalization. The Insurer will pay the Insured the Reasonable Fees Customarily Charged by the General Practitioner / Specialist for these visits, with a limit of one visit per day for each doctor during hospitalization, but not exceeding the Maximum Days per Disability limit as stated in the Description of Benefits."].

4. **Operating Theater Charges**
This covers the cost of using an operating theater for a necessary surgical procedure [5396244b-d87c-45e8-9f49-ddc116182e93, 133:135, "5.4 Operating Theater Charges\nReimbursement for the use of the Operating Theater necessary for a surgical procedure."].

5. **Anaesthetist's Fees**
This reimburses reasonable and customary fees charged by the anesthesiologist for a surgical operation, up to the maximum benefit indicated in the Schedule of Benefits [5396244b-d87c-45e8-9f49-ddc116182e93, 137:140, "5.5 Anesthesiologist's Fees\nReimbursement for Reasonable and Customary Fees Charged by an Anesthesiologist for a surgical procedure refers to the maximum benefit amount listed in the Description of Benefits."].

6. **Surgeon's Fees**
    This covers reasonable and customary fees for surgery performed by a surgeon, including surgeon's visits and post-operative care for up to 30 days from the date of operation, within the maximum indicated in the Schedule of Benefits. If multiple operations are performed for one disability, the total payment will not exceed the maximum per-disability amount [5396244b-d87c-45e8-9f49-ddc116182e93, 142:149, "5.6 Surgeon's Fees: Reimbursement for the Reasonable and Customary Charges for a surgery performed by a surgeon, including the surgeon's visit to the Insured and post-operative care up to a maximum of 30 (thirty) days from the date of surgery, and up to a maximum as stated in the Description of Benefits. If more than one surgery is performed for a disability, the total payment for all surgeries performed will not exceed the maximum per-disability benefit amount as stated in the Description of Benefits."].

7. **Miscellaneous Hospital Expenses**
This reimburses reasonable and customary charges for medically necessary ancillary services and consumable items directly related to the treatment received as an inpatient or for day surgery. This includes drugs during confinement, gauze bandages, syringes, laboratory test charges, X-rays, and oxygen [5396244b-d87c-45e8-9f49-ddc116182e93, 151:157, "5.7 Miscellaneous Hospital Care Expenses\nReimbursement for the Reasonable and Customary Charges Charged by the Hospital for all Medically Necessary services and treatments provided by the Insured during Inpatient Care or during Outpatient Surgery.\nThis benefit includes: the cost of medications during inpatient care, bandages, syringes, laboratory fees, X-rays, oxygen."].

8. **Pre-Hospital Diagnostic Services**
This covers reasonable and customary charges for diagnostic procedures and laboratory examinations, including prescribed drugs, recommended by a general practitioner or specialist within 30 days prior to hospital admission for inpatient stay or day surgery. Payment is contingent on subsequent hospitalization or surgical treatment [5396244b-d87c-45e8-9f49-ddc116182e93, 159:165, "5.8 Diagnostic Service Fees before Hospitalization\nReimbursement of the Reasonable Fees Customarily Charged for diagnostic procedures and laboratory tests, including prescription drugs, recommended by a General Practitioner or Specialist for an Illness or Bodily Injury that arose within 30 (thirty) days prior to the Date of Admission for Inpatient or Day Surgery. Payment will not be made if the Insured is not subsequently hospitalized or undergoes surgery after these tests."].

9. **Post-Hospitalization Care**
This reimburses reasonable and customary charges for follow-up treatment by the same attending physician within 30 days immediately following discharge from the hospital for a disability [5396244b-d87c-45e8-9f49-ddc116182e93, 167:170, "5.9 Post-Hospitalization Care Costs: The Company will reimburse the Reasonable and Customary Charges for follow-up care by the same physician, within 30 (thirty) days following the date of discharge from the hospital for a disability"].

10. **Emergency Out-Patient Benefit (Accidental only)**
This covers reasonable and customary charges for services and medical supplies provided by a hospital or clinic for emergency treatment of an injury resulting from an accident. The insured person must be received as an outpatient within a maximum of 24 hours after the accident. Eligible expenses for follow-up treatment by the same doctor will be reimbursed for up to 30 days from the date of the accident for a disability [5396244b-d87c-45e8-9f49-ddc116182e93, 172:179, "5.10 Emergency Outpatient Benefit (For Accidents Only)\nReasonable and customary charges for medical services and equipment by a hospital or clinic for emergency treatment for bodily injury due to an accident. The insured must be admitted as an outpatient within a maximum of 24 (twenty-four) hours of the accident. Reasonable costs incurred thereafter for follow-up treatment by the same doctor will be reimbursed for up to 30 (thirty) days from the date of the accident for a disability."].

11. **Ambulance Charges**
This reimburses reasonable and customary charges for necessary domestic ambulance services (including attendance) to and/or from the hospital or between hospitals. Payment is contingent on the insured person being hospitalized [5396244b-d87c-45e8-9f49-ddc116182e93, 181:185, "5.11 Ambulance Expenses\nReimbursement of the Reasonable Costs Customarily Charged for necessary domestic ambulance services (including the presence of a nurse in the ambulance) to and/or from the hospital or between hospitals. The maximum ambulance expense reimbursement provided is as per the Description of Benefits. Payment will not be made if the Insured is not hospitalized."].

12. **Prescription Drugs**
This covers medically necessary prescribed drugs directly related to the insured person's disability. Reimbursement is limited to drugs used for the treatment of the disability and prescribed for use within 30 days after discharge from the hospital [5396244b-d87c-45e8-9f49-ddc116182e93, 187:191, "5.12 Prescription Drugs Reimbursement for prescribed drugs is limited to those that are medically necessary and directly related to the Insured's disability. Only the cost of drugs used for the treatment of the disability is reimbursable. Reimbursement for prescribed drugs is limited to use within 30 (thirty) days after the date of hospital discharge."].

13. **Per Disability Limit**
This is the maximum benefit payable for expenses incurred for treatment provided during the insurance period, limited per disability, regardless of the type of disability. Once this limit is reached, no additional benefits will be paid [5396244b-d87c-45e8-9f49-ddc116182e93, 193:198, "5.13 Limit per Disability\nThe benefit paid by the Company in respect of expenses incurred for Treatment provided to the Insured during the Coverage Period is limited per Disability as stated in the Description of Benefits, regardless of the type of Disability, and the benefit paid is inclusive of tax.\nIf the Limit per Disability has been paid, no additional benefits will be paid."].

14. **Overall Annual Limit**
This is the maximum benefit payable for expenses incurred for treatment provided during the insurance period, limited to the overall annual limit, regardless of the type of disability. Once this limit is reached, all coverage for the insured person under the policy ceases [5396244b-d87c-45e8-9f49-ddc116182e93, 200:205, "5.14 Total Annual Limit\nBenefits payable in respect of costs incurred for Treatment provided to the Insured during the Coverage Period are limited to the Total Annual Limit as set out in the Description of Benefits regardless of the type of Disability.\nIf the Total Annual Limit has been paid, all coverage for the Insured under this Policy ceases."].

**Other Benefits:**

* **Outpatient Care**
Annual limits for outpatient care vary by plan, up to Rp 500,000 [cd352d52-afe8-4ea8-bbda-eb309bc6bdc0, 119:121, "Outpatient Outpatient | Annually up to | Rp 350,000 | Rp 350,000 | Rp 500,000 | Rp 500,000 | Rp 500,000 | Rp 500,000"].

* **Personal Accident Protection**
    Annual limits for personal accident protection are up to IDR 3,000,000 [cd352d52-afe8-4ea8-bbda-eb309bc6bdc0, 123:125, "Protection against personal accident Personal accident protection | Annually up to | IDR 3,000,000 | IDR 3,000,000 | IDR 3,000,000 | Rp. 3,000,000 |. Rp. 3,000,000 |.

* **Overseas Treatment**
    Overseas cover is for emergency treatment only. The insured person must be in fit condition to travel before commencing the journey and must not have traveled with the express purpose of obtaining treatment overseas. There is no reimbursement for travel costs (including ambulance services), hotel costs, or other costs not specified in the Schedule of Benefits [5396244b-d87c-45e8-9f49-ddc116182e93, 75:83, "3.4 Geographical Area\nAll benefits listed in this Policy apply worldwide subject to the terms and conditions of this Policy:\n3.4.1 Coverage abroad is for Emergency Treatment only\n3.4.2. For emergency treatment, the Insured must be in good health before travel and have no plans to seek treatment abroad.\n3.4.3. There is no reimbursement for travel costs (including ambulance costs), hotel costs, or other costs not specified in the Description of Benefits."].

Follow-up Question(s):
* ["ask", "What are the exclusions for SmartMedicare?"]
* ["ask", "How can I submit a claim for SmartMedicare?"]
* ["ask", "What is the age limit for SmartMedicare?"]

column2: Apakah ada panduan untuk mengisi formulir di AXA MyPage?
column3:
Saya tidak memiliki informasi spesifik mengenai panduan langkah demi langkah untuk mengisi formulir di AXA MyPage dalam dokumen yang saya miliki. Namun, secara umum, proses pengajuan asuransi melalui MyPage melibatkan pengisian data pertanggungan dan ketentuan lainnya yang ada di website tersebut [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 1500:1503, "Tertanggung mengajukan permohonan kepada penanggung melalui website MyPage dan mengisi data pertanggungan dan ketentuan lainnya yang ada di website MyPage."].

Jika Anda mengalami kesulitan, Anda bisa menghubungi Customer Care Centre AXA Indonesia di 1500 733 atau melalui email customer.general@axa.co.id untuk mendapatkan bantuan [cd352d52-afe8-4ea8-bbda-eb309bc6bdc0, 10:16, "Customer Care Centre\nAXA Tower Lt. GF\nJl. Prof. Dr. Satrio Kav. 18, Kuningan City\nJakarta 12940, Indonesia\nTel : 1500 733\nEmail : customer.general@axa.co.id"].

column25: Is there a guide to filling out the form on AXA MyPage?
column26:
I don't have specific information regarding step-by-step instructions for filling out the AXA MyPage form in my documents. However, generally, the insurance application process through MyPage involves filling in the insurance information and other requirements listed on the website [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 1500:1503, "The insured submits an application to the insurer through the MyPage website and completes the insurance information and other requirements listed on the MyPage website."].

If you experience any difficulties, you can contact the AXA Indonesia Customer Care Center at 1500 733 or email customer.general@axa.co.id for assistance. [cd352d52-afe8-4ea8-bbda-eb309bc6bdc0, 10:16, "Customer Care Center\nAXA Tower Lt. GF\nJl. Prof. Dr. Satrio Kav. 18, Kuningan City\nJakarta 12940, Indonesia\nTel: 1500 733\nEmail: customer.general@axa.co.id"].

column2: Kan sudah diinformasikan diatas usia 40 tahun. Tolong buatkan semua opsi perhitungan premi yang diinformasikan diatas. Termasuk juga bengkel resminya
column3:
Baik, saya akan menghitung premi SmartDrive untuk kendaraan listrik Wuling Air tahun 2025 seharga Rp 279.000.000 di Wilayah 2 dengan periode 1 tahun, usia pemegang polis 40 tahun, dan semua jaminan yang Anda minta.

Berikut adalah rincian perhitungan premi Anda:

**1. Jaminan Utama: Komprehensif**
*   Harga Pertanggungan: Rp 279.000.000
*   Tarif Premi (Wilayah 2, Kategori 3: >Rp200.000.000 s.d. Rp400.000.000): 2.29% [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 275:284, "2.29%"]
*   **Premi**: 2.29% x Rp 279.000.000 = **Rp 6.399.900**

**2. Perluasan Jaminan Tambahan:**

*   **Angin Topan, Badai, Hujan Es, Banjir atau Tanah Longsor**
    *   Tarif Premi (Wilayah 2): 0.100% [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 506:510, "0.100%"]
    *   **Premi**: 0.100% x Rp 279.000.000 = **Rp 279.000**
*   **Gempa Bumi, Tsunami atau Letusan Gunung Berapi**
    *   Tarif Premi (Wilayah 2): 0.100% [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 511:515, "0.100%"]
    *   **Premi**: 0.100% x Rp 279.000.000 = **Rp 279.000**
*   **Huru hara dan Kerusuhan**
    *   Tarif Premi (Wilayah 2): 0.050% [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 516:520, "0.050%"]
    *   **Premi**: 0.050% x Rp 279.000.000 = **Rp 139.500**
*   **Terorisme dan Sabotase**
    *   Tarif Premi (Wilayah 2): 0.050% [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 521:525, "0.050%"]
    *   **Premi**: 0.050% x Rp 279.000.000 = **Rp 139.500**
*   **Tanggung Jawab Hukum Pihak Ketiga (maksimal Rp 50.000.000)**
    *   Tarif Premi:
        *   Hingga Rp 25.000.000: 1% x Rp 25.000.000 = Rp 250.000
        *   Rp 25.000.001 s.d. Rp 50.000.000: 0.5% x Rp 25.000.000 = Rp 125.000
    *   **Premi**: Rp 250.000 + Rp 125.000 = **Rp 375.000** [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 530:534, "a. UP* hingga Rp25 juta : 1% dari UP\nb. UP > Rp25 juta s.d. Rp50 juta : 0,5% dari UP"]
*   **Kecelakaan Diri (maksimal Rp 50.000.000 per orang)**
    *   Untuk Pengemudi: 0.500% x Rp 50.000.000 = Rp 250.000 [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 536:537, "a. Untuk Pengemudi : 0,500% dari uang pertanggungan kecelakaan diri"]
    *   Untuk Penumpang (asumsi 4 penumpang): 0.100% x Rp 50.000.000 x 4 = Rp 200.000 [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 538:539, "b. Untuk Penumpang : 0,100% dari uang pertanggungan kecelakaan diri untuk setiap tempat duduk penumpang"]
    *   **Premi**: Rp 250.000 + Rp 200.000 = **Rp 450.000**
*   **Tanggung Jawab Hukum terhadap Penumpang (maksimal Rp 50.000.000)**
    *   Tarif Premi:
        *   Hingga Rp 25.000.000: 0.50% x Rp 25.000.000 = Rp 125.000
        *   Rp 25.000.001 s.d. Rp 50.000.000: 0.25% x Rp 25.000.000 = Rp 62.500
    *   **Premi**: Rp 125.000 + Rp 62.500 = **Rp 187.500** [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 542:546, "a. UP hingga Rp25 juta: 0,50% dari UP\nb. UP > Rp25 juta s.d. Rp50 juta : 0,25% dari UP"]
*   **Santunan Biaya Klaim (Rp 10.000.000)**
    *   Tarif Premi (untuk UP Rp 200.000.001 - Rp 400.000.000): 0.015% [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 550:554, "c. > Rp. 200 juta s.d. Rp. 400 juta : 0.015%"]
    *   **Premi**: 0.015% x Rp 279.000.000 = **Rp 41.850**
*   **Kehilangan Kunci Kendaraan (hingga Rp 5.000.000)**
    *   **Premi**: **Rp 50.000** [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 560:561, "Rp50,000"]
*   **Pencurian oleh Supir (Hanya Wilayah 2)**
    *   Tarif Premi: 0.10% [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 562:563, "0.10%"]
    *   **Premi**: 0.10% x Rp 279.000.000 = **Rp 279.000**
*   **Bengkel Resmi (Hanya Wilayah 2)**
    *   Meskipun harga kendaraan Anda (Rp 279.000.000) di bawah batas minimum Rp 400.000.000 yang disyaratkan untuk perluasan jaminan ini, sesuai permintaan Anda, saya akan menghitungnya.
    *   Tarif Premi: 0.20% [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 565:566, "0.20%"]
    *   **Premi**: 0.20% x Rp 279.000.000 = **Rp 558.000**
*   **Manfaat Khusus (New For Old, Penggantian Biaya Taksi, Mobil Derek, Ambulance)**
    *   **Premi**: **Rp 100.000** [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 570:571, "Rp100,000"]

**Total Premi Perluasan Jaminan:**
Rp 279.000 + Rp 279.000 + Rp 139.500 + Rp 139.500 + Rp 375.000 + Rp 450.000 + Rp 187.500 + Rp 41.850 + Rp 50.000 + Rp 279.000 + Rp 558.000 + Rp 100.000 = **Rp 2.876.350**

**Total Premi Keseluruhan (Jaminan Utama + Perluasan Jaminan):**
Rp 6.399.900 + Rp 2.876.350 = **Rp 9.276.250**

**Biaya Materai**: Rp 10.000 [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 700:701, "Biaya Materai : IDR 10.000"]

**Total Premi Akhir yang harus dibayarkan**:
Rp 9.276.250 + Rp 10.000 = **Rp 9.286.250**

Mohon konfirmasi apakah Anda ingin melanjutkan dengan perhitungan premi ini.

**Follow-up Question(s):**

*   ["ask", "Bisakah saya mengubah jenis jaminan setelah polis diterbitkan?"]

Here are the details of your premium calculation:

**1. Primary Coverage: Comprehensive**

* Premium Rate (Region 2, Category 3: >Rp 200,000,000 to Rp 400,000,000): 2.29% [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 275:284, "2.29%"]
* **Premium**: 2.29% x Rp 279,000,000 = **Rp 6,399,900**

**2. Additional Coverage Extensions:**

* Hurricane, Storm, Hail, Flood, or Landslide**

* Premium: 0.100% x Rp 279,000,000 = Rp 279,000**
* Earthquake, Tsunami, or Volcanic Eruption**

* Premium: 0.100% x Rp 279,000,000 = **Rp 279,000**
* **Riots and Unrest**

* **Premium**: 0.050% x Rp 279,000,000 = **Rp 139,500**
* **Terrorism and Sabotage**
* Premium Rate (Region 2): 0.050% [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 521:525, "0.050%"]
* **Premium**: 0.050% x Rp 279,000,000 = **Rp 139,500**
* **Third Party Liability (maximum Rp 50,000,000)**
* Premium Rate:
* Up to Rp 25,000,000: 1% x Rp 25,000,000 = Rp 250,000
* Rp 25,000,001 to Rp 50,000,000: 0.5% x Rp 25,000,000 = Rp 125,000
* **Premium**: Rp 250,000 + Rp 125,000 = **Rp 375,000** [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 530:534, "a. UP* up to Rp 25 million: 1% of UP\nb. UP > Rp 25 million up to Rp 50 million: 0.5% of UP"]
* **Personal Accident (maximum Rp 50,000,000 per person)**
* For Driver: 0.500% x Rp 50,000,000 = Rp 250,000 [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 536:537, "a. For Driver: 0.500% of the personal accident insurance amount"]
* For Passengers (assuming 4 passengers): 0.100% x Rp 50,000,000 x 4 = Rp 200,000 [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 538:539, "b. For Passengers: 0.100% of the personal accident insurance amount for each passenger seat"]
* **Premium**: Rp 250,000 + Rp 200,000 = **Rp 450,000**
* **Legal Liability to Passengers (maximum Rp 50,000,000)**
* Premium Rate:
* Up to Rp 25,000,000: 0.50% x Rp 25,000,000 = Rp 125,000
* Rp 25,000,001 to Rp 50,000,000: 0.25% x Rp 25,000,000 = Rp 62,500
* **Premium**: Rp 125,000 + Rp 62,500 = **Rp 187,500** [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 542:546, "a. UP up to Rp 25 million: 0.50% of UP\nb. UP > Rp 25 million to Rp 50 million: 0.25% of UP"]
* **Claim Cost Compensation (Rp 10,000,000)**
* Premium Rate (for UP Rp 200,000,001 - Rp 400,000,000): 0.015% [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 550:554, "c. > Rp. 200 million to Rp. 400 million: 0.015%"]
* **Premium**: 0.015% x Rp. 279,000,000 = **Rp. 41,850**
* **Loss of Vehicle Keys (up to Rp. 5,000,000)**
* **Premium**: **Rp. 50,000** [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 560:561, "Rp. 50,000"]
* **Theft by Driver (Region 2 Only)**
* Premium Rate: 0.10% [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 562:563, "0.10%"]
* **Premium**: 0.10% x Rp 279,000,000 = **Rp 279,000**
* **Authorized Workshop (Region 2 Only)**
* Even if your vehicle's value (Rp 279,000,000) is below the minimum Rp 400,000,000 required for this extended coverage, I will calculate it at your request.
* Premium Rate: 0.20% [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 565:566, "0.20%"]
* **Premium**: 0.20% x Rp 279,000,000 = **Rp 558,000**
* **Special Benefits (New for Old, Taxi, Towing, Ambulance Reimbursement)**
* **Premium**: **Rp 100,000** [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 570:571, "Rp 100,000"]

**Total Extended Coverage Premium:**
Rp 279,000 + Rp 279,000 + Rp Rp 139,500 + Rp 139,500 + Rp 375,000 + Rp 450,000 + Rp 187,500 + Rp 41,850 + Rp 50,000 + Rp 279,000 + Rp 558,000 + Rp 100,000 = **Rp 2,876,350**

**Total Premium (Primary Coverage + Extended Coverage):**
Rp 6,399,900 + Rp 2,876,350 = **Rp 9,276,250**

**Stamp Duty**: Rp 10,000 [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 700:701, "Stamp Duty: IDR 10,000]

**Total Final Premium to be paid**:
Rp 9,276,250 + Rp 10,000 = **Rp 9,286,250**

Please confirm whether you wish to proceed with this premium calculation.
