column7: Tabel terpotong
column25: What are the differences in benefits between the Standard, Gold, and Platinum packages for SmartTravel Domestic?
column26:
There are specific exclusions that apply to certain benefits within SmartTravel Domestic, as well as clear benefit differences between the Standard, Gold, and Platinum packages.

### Specific Exclusions for Certain Benefits within SmartTravel Domestic:

Several exclusions apply to certain sections of the benefits:

* **Exceptions apply to Section 3 (Repatriation of Remains):**
* Travel to certain countries, areas, or events prohibited by regulatory/government authorities in the country of origin/destination. In this case, the claim will only be paid up to the Sum Insured mentioned in the Policy Schedule or a maximum of 20% of the Sum Insured in this section [d7e53a2b-3ff8-4e79-8aef-0036a1d00b49, 1:2, "your travel to a specific country, area or event held in a specific country or area when the regulatory/government authority in the country of origin/destination country where you are traveling prohibits travel, in this case, we will only pay the claim up to the Sum Insured specifically mentioned in your Policy Schedule or a maximum of 20% of the Sum Insured in this section."].
* Contracting a vaccine-preventable disease that you failed to obtain and comply with as directed [d7e53a2b-3ff8-4e79-8aef-0036a1d00b49, 1:2, "An event in which you contract a vaccine-preventable disease that you failed to obtain and comply with as directed, recommended or warned by the Government or the World Health Organization (WHO) or equivalent authority of your Travel Destination before the start of your Travel."].

* **Exceptions apply to Sections 2 and 4 (Medical, Dental, and Other Expenses, and Hospital Cash Benefits):**
* Additional costs for private room accommodation in a hospital/clinic/nursing home, unless deemed necessary by the treating Physician [d7e53a2b-3ff8-4e79-8aef-0036a1d00b49, 1:2, "Additional costs for private room accommodation in a hospital, clinic, or nursing home, unless the treating Physician deems such accommodation necessary for the Insured."].
* Medical consultation or treatment except from a registered Practicing Physician [d7e53a2b-3ff8-4e79-8aef-0036a1d00b49, 1:2, "Medical consultation or treatment unless obtained from a registered Practicing Physician."].
* Exclusions related to travel to restricted countries/areas and vaccine-preventable diseases (same as Section 3) [d7e53a2b-3ff8-4e79-8aef-0036a1d00b49, 1:2, "your travel to a specific country, area or event held in a specific country or area when the regulatory/governmental authority in the country of origin/destination to which you are travelling prohibits travel, in which case, we will only pay claims up to the Sum Insured specifically mentioned in your Policy Schedule or a maximum of 20% of the Sum Insured in this section.", "Events where you contract a vaccine-preventable disease which you failed to obtain and comply with as directed, recommended or warned by the Government or World Health Organization (WHO) or equivalent authority of your Travel Destination before the start of your Travel."].

* **Exceptions apply to Section 5 (Emergency Medical Evacuation):**
* Costs for services provided by another party that you are not obligated to pay, or costs that are included in the planned travel cost [d7e53a2b-3ff8-4e79-8aef-0036a1d00b49, 1:2, "Costs incurred for services provided by another party that the Insured is not obligated to pay or costs that are included in the planned travel cost."].
* Costs for services not approved or arranged by the Insurer, except in the case of a medical emergency beyond your control [d7e53a2b-3ff8-4e79-8aef-0036a1d00b49, 1:2, "Costs not approved or arranged by the Insurer. This exception may be waived if the Insured or their travel companion, for reasons beyond their control, is unable to contact the Insurer during a medical emergency."].
* Exclusions related to travel to restricted countries/areas and vaccine-preventable diseases (same as Section 3) [d7e53a2b-3ff8-4e79-8aef-0036a1d00b49, 1:2, "your travel to a specific country, area or event held in a specific country or area when the regulatory/governmental authority in the country of origin/destination to which you are travelling prohibits travel, in which case, we will only pay claims up to the Sum Insured specifically mentioned in your Policy Schedule or a maximum of 20% of the Sum Insured in this section.", "Events where you contract a vaccine-preventable disease which you failed to obtain and comply with as directed, recommended or warned by the Government or World Health Organization (WHO) or equivalent authority of your Travel Destination before the start of your Travel."].

* **Exceptions apply to Sections 6 and/or 7 (Baggage and Personal Effects, and Travel Documents):**
* Loss or damage resulting from delay, seizure, or detention by customs or other airport/government officials [d7e53a2b-3ff8-4e79-8aef-0036a1d00b49, 1:2, "Loss or damage arising from delay or seizure or detention by customs or other airport/government officials."].
* Loss or damage to contact lenses, braces, dentures, or fragile items [d7e53a2b-3ff8-4e79-8aef-0036a1d00b49, 1:2, "Loss or damage to contact lenses, braces, dentures," "Damage to fragile items"].
* Merchandise or samples [d7e53a2b-3ff8-4e79-8aef-0036a1d00b49, 1:2, "Merchandise or samples"].
* Loss or damage due to wear and tear, gradual deterioration, insects, termites, the inherent nature of the goods, mechanical/electrical damage, or damage resulting from repair/cleaning/alteration processes [d7e53a2b-3ff8-4e79-8aef-0036a1d00b49, 1:2, "Loss or damage due to wear and tear, gradual deterioration, insects, termites, the inherent nature of the goods, mechanical or electrical damage, or damage resulting from processes initiated by the Insured Person to repair, clean, or alter the goods"].
* Data reproduction costs [d7e53a2b-3ff8-4e79-8aef-0036a1d00b49, 1:2, "Costs for reproducing data stored on tapes, cards, discs or the like"].
* Loss or damage while in the custody of another airline/carrier, unless reported immediately and a Damage Report (PIR) is obtained [d7e53a2b-3ff8-4e79-8aef-0036a1d00b49, 1:2, "Loss or damage while in the custody of another airline or carrier, unless reported immediately after the incident is discovered and in the case of an airline, a Damage Report (PIR) must be obtained."].
* Loss not reported to the police within 24 hours [d7e53a2b-3ff8-4e79-8aef-0036a1d00b49, 1:2, "Loss not reported to the police within 24 hours and report not obtained at the scene"].
* Loss or theft of items left unattended in a public place or due to your negligence [d7e53a2b-3ff8-4e79-8aef-0036a1d00b49, 1:2, "Loss or theft of items left unattended in a public place or as a result of the Insured's negligence in safeguarding or taking precautions to protect or secure such items."].
* Money, precious metals, jewelry, gemstones, watches, antiques, or works of art (Section 6 only) [d7e53a2b-3ff8-4e79-8aef-0036a1d00b49, 1:2, "Money (cash, bank notes, currency notes, traveler's checks, treasury bills, money orders, and other forms of transaction documents). (This exclusion applies only to Section 6)", "Precious metals, jewelry, gemstones or precious stones, watches, antiques or works of art. (This exclusion applies only to Section 6)"].
* Loss or damage to property insured under another policy [d7e53a2b-3ff8-4e79-8aef-0036a1d00b49, 1:2, "Loss or damage to property insured under another policy, or which is reimbursable by the carrier or accommodation company or other service provider."].

* **Exclusions apply to Section 9 (Personal Liability):**
* Employer's legal liability, contractual liability, or liability to members of the Insured's family [d7e53a2b-3ff8-4e79-8aef-0036a1d00b49, 1:2, "Employer's Legal Liability, contractual liability, or liability to members of the Insured's Family."].
* Goods or animals belonging to the Insured, or under the Insured's care/supervision/control [d7e53a2b-3ff8-4e79-8aef-0036a1d00b49, 1:2, "Goods or animals belonging to the Insured, or under the Insured's care, supervision, or control."].
* Intentional, criminal, or unlawful acts [d7e53a2b-3ff8-4e79-aef-0036a1d00b49, 1:2, "Intentional, criminal, or unlawful acts."].
* Trade, business, or professional activities [d7e53a2b-3ff8-4e79-aef-0036a1d00b49, 1:2, "Trade, business, or professional activities."].
* Ownership or use of land or buildings (other than temporary residence) [d7e53a2b-3ff8-4e79-aef-0036a1d00b49, 1:2, "Ownership or use of land or buildings (other than use only for temporary residence)."].
* Ownership, use of a vehicle, aircraft, boat, or other means of conveyance [d7e53a2b-3ff8-4e79-aef-0036a1d00b49, 1:2, "Ownership, or use of a vehicle, aircraft, boat, or other means of conveyance."].
* Legal costs arising from criminal proceedings [d7e53a2b-3ff8-4e79-aef-0036a1d00b49, 1:2, "Legal costs arising from criminal proceedings."].
* Influence of alcoholic beverages, mountain climbing, ski racing, ski jumping, ice hockey, bobsleighs, skeletons, racing, rallies, or the use of firearms [d7e53a2b-3ff8-4e79-aef-0036a1d00b49, 1:2, "Influence of alcoholic beverages, mountain climbing, major event ski racing, ski jumping, ice hockey, the use of bobsleighs or skeletons, racing or rallies, or the use of firearms."].

* **Exclusions apply to Section 10 (Travel Delay):**
* Failure of the Insured Person to check in according to the itinerary or obtain written confirmation from the carrier/agent of the delay [d7e53a2b-3ff8-4e79-aef-0036a1d00b49, 1:2, "Failure of the Insured Person to check in according to the travel instructions given to him/her, or to obtain written confirmation from the carrier or its managing agent of the length of the delay or the reason for the delay."].

* Strikes or labor actions already in progress at the time of insurance purchase [d7e53a2b-3ff8-4e79-aef-0036a1d00b49, 1:2, "A strike or labor action was in progress at the time the Insured purchased this insurance."].
* Late arrival at the airport after check-in/boarding time (unless due to a strike/labor action) [d7e53a2b-3ff8-4e79-aef-0036a1d00b49, 1:2, "You arrived late at the airport after check-in or boarding time (unless the delay was due to a strike or labor action)."].
* Operational reasons [d7e53a2b-3ff8-4e79-aef-0036a1d00b49, 1:2, "Operational reasons"].

* **Exclusions apply to Sections 11 and 12 (Loss of Deposit or Cancellation, and Travel Restrictions):**
* Government Regulations, delays/changes to booked Trips by service providers [d7e53a2b-3ff8-4e79-aef-0036a1d00b49, 1:2, "Government Regulations or Laws, delays or changes to booked Trips (including errors, omissions, negligence) by service providers related to booked Trips as well as the agent or tour operator through which the Trips were booked."].
* Your or your travel companion's business, financial, or contractual obligations [d7e53a2b-3ff8-4e79-aef-0036a1d00b49, 1:2, "Your or your travel companion's business, financial, or contractual obligations."].
* Unwillingness to travel or financial problems [d7e53a2b-3ff8-4e79-aef-0036a1d00b49, 1:2, "Insured's unwillingness to travel or financial problems."].
* Unlawful action or criminal prosecution against the party responsible for the trip [d7e53a2b-3ff8-4e79-aef-0036a1d00b49, 1:2, "Unlawful action by or criminal prosecution against anyone responsible for the booked trip, except for appearing as a witness in court."].
* Failure to notify the travel agent/operator/accommodation promptly upon needing to cancel/curtail the trip [d7e53a2b-3ff8-4e79-aef-0036a1d00b49, 1:2, "Insured fails to notify the travel agent/tour operator or transportation or accommodation provider promptly upon learning of the need to cancel or curtail the trip."].
* Losses due to government regulation, bankruptcy, liquidation, or default of a travel agent/carrier [d7e53a2b-3ff8-4e79-aef-0036a1d00b49, 1:2, "losses caused directly or indirectly by government regulation or control, bankruptcy, liquidation, or default of a travel agent, or carrier causing cancellation."].
* Operational reasons [d7e53a2b-3ff8-4e79-aef-0036a1d00b49, 1:2, "Operational reasons"].
* Circumstances known before purchasing the policy that could lead to cancellation [d7e53a2b-3ff8-4e79-aef-0036a1d00b49, 1:2, "Circumstances known to you before you purchased your policy or at the time of booking any trip that could reasonably lead to cancellation of the trip."].
* Costs recoverable from accommodation/transport/credit card providers [d7e53a2b-3ff8-4e79-aef-0036a1d00b49, 1:2, "Any unspent or additional costs incurred by you which are recoverable from: i. Your accommodation provider, booking agent, travel agent or other compensation scheme; ii. Your transport provider, booking agent, travel agent, compensation scheme or Air Travel Organisers Licensing (ATOL); iii. Your credit or debit card provider or Paypal."].
* Claims not listed in the 'what is covered' section [d7e53a2b-3ff8-4e79-aef-0036a1d00b49, 1:2, "Any claim arising from a reason not listed in the 'what is covered' section of this Policy."].
* Unable to travel due to government advice relating to a Pandemic/Epidemic [d7e53a2b-3ff8-4e79-aef-0036a1d00b49, 1:2, "Any claim where you are unable to travel or choose not to travel because the Government (or equivalent government body in another country) advises against travel due to a Pandemic or Epidemic."].

* **Exclusions apply to Section 15 (Terrorism):**
* Losses arising directly or indirectly, by contribution, arising from or in connection with a nuclear, chemical or biological incident [d7e53a2b-3ff8-4e79-aef-0036a1d00b49, 1:2, "The Insurer will not pay for losses arising directly or indirectly, by contribution, arising from or in connection with a nuclear, chemical or biological incident."].

### Benefits Differences between Standard, Gold, and Platinum Packages for SmartTravel Domestic:

Here is a comparison table of the main benefits between the Standard, Gold, and Platinum packages for AXA Travel Domestic Insurance:

| No. | Benefit Description | Standard (IDR) | Gold (IDR) | Platinum (IDR) |
|---|---|---|---|---|
| **Personal Accident** | | | |
| 1 | Personal Accident and Permanent Disability | 50,000,000 | 100,000,000 | 200,000,000 |
| **Medical, Dental, and Other Expenses** | | | | |
| 2 | Medical Expenses Due to Accident | 25,000,000 | 50,000,000 | 100,000,000 |
| | Medical Expenses Due to Accident (if you continue to travel despite government advice not to) | 5,000,000 | 10,000,000 | 20,000,000 |
| Medical Expenses Due to Illness | - | 250,000 | 500,000 |
| Medical Expenses Due to Illness (if you continue to travel despite government advice not to) | - | 50,000 | 100,000 |
| 3 | Repatriation of the Body | 50,000,000 | 100,000,000 | 250,000,000 |
| | Repatriation of the Body (if traveling despite government advice not to travel) | 10,000,000 | 20,000,000 | 50,000,000 |
| 4 | Hospital Cash Benefit | - | 200,000/24 hours, max. 2,000,000 | 300,000/24 hours, max. 3,000,000 |
| Hospital Cash Benefit (if traveling despite government advice not to travel) | - | 40,000/24 hours, max. 400,000 | 60,000/24 hours, max. 600,000 |
| 5 | Emergency Medical Evacuation | 50,000,000 | 100,000,000 | 250,000,000 |
| | Emergency Medical Evacuation (if you still travel despite government advice against it) | 10,000,000 | 20,000,000 | 50,000,000 |
| **Travel Inconvenience** | | | |
| 6 | Baggage and Personal Effects | - | 300,000/item, max. 2,000,000 | 300,000/item, max. 3,000,000 |
| 7 | Travel Documents | - | 1,000,000 | 2,500,000 |
| 8 | Baggage Delay | 250,000/6 hours, max. 1,000,000 | 500,000/6 hours, max. 2,000,000 | 1,000,000/6 hours, max. 3,000,000 |
| 9 | Personal Legal Liability | - | 75,000,000 | 100,000,000 |
| 10 | Travel Delay | 250,000/6 hours, max. 1,000,000 | 250,000/6 hours, max. 2,000,000 | 500,000/6 hours, max. 2,500,000 |
| 11 | Loss of Deposit or Cancellation | 1,000,000 | 2,000,000 | 2,500,000 |
| 12 | Travel Restrictions | 1,000,000 | 2,000,000 | 2,500,000 |
| 13 | Hijacking | - | 250,000/6 hours, max. 3,500,000 | 250,000/6 hours, max. 6,000,000 |
| 14 | Emergency Call Fee | - | 200,000 | 300,000 |
| 15 | Terrorism | Yes | Yes | Yes |

[d7e53a2b-3ff8-4e79-8aef-0036a1d00b49, 1:2, "AXA Domestic Travel Insurance Benefit Table"]

**Note:** The benefit amounts listed in the table above are for the Individual Insured. The benefit per Family is twice the benefit for the Individual Insured, except for Personal Legal Liability. [d7e53a2b-3ff8-4e79-8aef-0036a1d00b49, 1:2, "The benefit amounts listed in the table above are for the Individual Insured. The benefit per Family is twice the benefit for the Individual Insured, except for Personal Legal Liability."].

column2: What are the benefits of SmartMedicare?
column3:
SmartMedicare offers various benefits, including:

*   **Inpatient Benefits**
    *   Room and board per day, up to a maximum of 60 days per disability [cd352d52-afe8-4ea8-bbda-eb309bc6bdc0, 74:78, "Biaya kamar dan menginap Room & board per day | Maksimun 60 hari/ ketidakmampuan Maximum 60 days/disability"].
    *   Intensive Care Unit (ICU) room, up to a maximum of 30 days [cd352d52-afe8-4ea8-bbda-eb309bc6bdc0, 80:82, "Kamar unit perawatan intensif (ICU) Emergency Room | Maksimum 30 hari Maximum 30 days"].
    *   General practitioner and specialist doctor visits, up to one visit per day [cd352d52-afe8-4ea8-bbda-eb309bc6bdc0, 84:88, "Kunjungan dokter umum General practitioner visit | Maksimum 1 kunjungan/hari Maximum 1 visits/day"].
    *   Operating theatre and anesthetist's fees [cd352d52-afe8-4ea8-bbda-eb309bc6bdc0, 90:93, "Kamar bedah Operating theatre"].
    *   Surgeon's fees, maximum per disability [cd352d52-afe8-4ea8-bbda-eb309bc6bdc0, 96:98, "Biaya dokter ahli bedah Surgeon's fee | Maksimum perketidakmampuan Maximum per disability"].
    *   Miscellaneous hospital expenses [cd352d52-afe8-4ea8-bbda-eb309bc6bdc0, 100:101, "Biaya aneka perawatan Misc hospital expenses"].
    *   Pre-hospitalization expenses (30 days before hospitalization) and post-hospitalization expenses (30 days after hospitalization) [cd352d52-afe8-4ea8-bbda-eb309bc6bdc0, 103:106, "Biaya sebelum rawat inap Pre-hospitalization expenses | 30 hari sebelum rawat inap 30 days before hospitalization"].
    *   Emergency outpatient treatment (for accidents only) [cd352d52-afe8-4ea8-bbda-eb309bc6bdc0, 109:110, "Rawat jalan darurat Emergency treatment | Hanya untuk kecelakaan For accident"].
    *   Overseas treatment (for emergencies only) [cd352d52-afe8-4ea8-bbda-eb309bc6bdc0, 112:113, "Perawatan di luar negeri Treatment abroad | Hanya untuk keadaan gawat darurat For emergency only"].

column25: What are the benefits of SmartMedicare?
column26:
SmartMedicare offers various benefits, including:

* Inpatient Benefits**
* Room and board per day, up to a maximum of 60 days per disability [cd352d52-afe8-4ea8-bbda-eb309bc6bdc0, 74:78, "Room and board per day | Maximum 60 days/disability"].
* Intensive Care Unit (ICU) room, up to a maximum of 30 days [cd352d52-afe8-4ea8-bbda-eb309bc6bdc0, 80:82, "Intensive care unit (ICU) room | Emergency Room | Maximum 30 days"].

* General practitioner and specialist doctor visits, up to one visit per day [cd352d52-afe8-4ea8-bbda-eb309bc6bdc0, 84:88, "General practitioner visit | Maximum 1 visit/day"].
* Operating theater and anesthetist's fees [cd352d52-afe8-4ea8-bbda-eb309bc6bdc0, 90:93, "Operating theater"].
* Surgeon's fees, maximum per disability [cd352d52-afe8-4ea8-bbda-eb309bc6bdc0, 96:98, "Surgeon's fee | Maximum per disability"].
* Miscellaneous hospital expenses [cd352d52-afe8-4ea8-bbda-eb309bc6bdc0, 100:101, "Miscellaneous hospital expenses"].
* Pre-hospitalization expenses (30 days before hospitalization) and post-hospitalization expenses (30 days after hospitalization) [cd352d52-afe8-4ea8-bbda-eb309bc6bdc0, 103:106, "Pre-hospitalization expenses | 30 days before hospitalization 30 days before hospitalization"].
* Emergency outpatient treatment (for accidents only) [cd352d52-afe8-4ea8-bbda-eb309bc6bdc0, 109:110, "Emergency outpatient treatment | For accidents only"].
* Overseas treatment (for emergencies only) [cd352d52-afe8-4ea8-bbda-eb309bc6bdc0, 112:113, "Treatment abroad | For emergencies only"].
* Local ambulance service, up to Rp 500,000 per trip [cd352d52-afe8-4ea8-bbda-eb309bc6bdc0, 115:117, "Local ambulance service fee | Per trip up to | Rp 150,000 | Rp 150,000 | Rp 500,000 | Rp 500,000 | Rp 500,000"].

* Outpatient care, annually up to Rp 500,000 [cd352d52-afe8-4ea8-bbda-eb309bc6bdc0, 119:121, "Outpatient Outpatient | Annually up to | Rp 350,000 | Rp 350,000 | Rp 500,000 | Rp 500,000 | Rp 500,000 | Rp 500,000"].
* Personal accident protection, annually up to Rp 3,000,000 [cd352d52-afe8-4ea8-bbda-eb309bc6bdc0, 123:125, "Personal accident protection | Annually up to | Rp 3,000,000 | Rp 3,000,000 | Rp 3,000,000 | Rp 3,000,000 | Rp 3,000,000 | Rp 3,000,000 | Rp 3,000,000"].
* Maximum per disability limit ranging from Rp 25,000,000 to Rp 250,000,000 [cd352d52-afe8-4ea8-bbda-eb309bc6bdc0, 127:129, "Maximum disability limit | Rp 25,000,000 | Rp 50,000,000 | Rp 70,000,000 | Rp 80,000,000 | Rp 150,000,000 | Rp 250,000,000"].
* Annual limit per person ranging from Rp 100,000,000 to Rp 500,000,000 [cd352d52-afe8-4ea8-bbda-eb309bc6bdc0, 131:133, "Annual limit per person Annual limit per person | Rp 100,000,000 | Rp 120,000,000 | Rp 200,000,000 | Rp 250,000,000 | Rp 300,000,000 | Rp 500,000,000"].

column2: What are pre-existing conditions?
column3:
Pre-existing conditions refer to any medical condition that has been diagnosed, required medical treatment, or of which the insured person should have reasonably been aware prior to the policy's commencement date, regardless of whether treatment was actually received [5396244b-d87c-45e8-9f49-ddc116182e93, 258:262, "4.17 Keadaan yang Telah Ada Sebelumnya\nberarti semua kondisi yang telah didiagnosa, atau membutuhkan Perawatan medis, atau secara wajar seharusnya Tertanggung menyadari sebelum tanggal mulai Polis ini berlaku, tanpa memandang apakah Perawatan telah diterima sebenarnya."].

Examples of conditions that may be considered pre-existing include, but are not limited to:
*   Stones in the urinary system, chronic renal failure, or stones/infection of the biliary system.
*   Hypertension, cardiovascular disease, cerebrovascular disease, or hematological disease.
*   Cataracts.
*   All types of cancers, tumors, polyps, cysts, or nodules, including breast lumps.
*   Nasal or sinus conditions requiring surgery, abnormalities of the nasal septum or turbinates.
*   Tonsillitis.
*   Hernias, hemorrhoids, fistulae.
*   Diabetes mellitus, hyperthyroidism, hypothyroidism.
*   Hepatitis.
*   Gastritis, duodenitis, gastric or duodenal ulcers.
*   Endometriosis, including diseases of the reproductive system, and adenomyosis.
*   Rheumatic/gout, musculoskeletal disorders.
*   Tuberculosis, asthma [5396244b-d87c-45e8-9f49-ddc116182e93, 278:308].

Follow-up Question(s):
* ["ask", "What are the exclusions for SmartCare Executive?"]
* ["ask", "How can I submit a claim for SmartCare Executive?"]
* ["ask", "What is the age limit for SmartCare Executive?"]
column25: What are pre-existing conditions?
column26:
Pre-existing conditions refer to any medical condition that has been diagnosed, required medical treatment, or of which the insured person should have reasonably been aware prior to the policy's commencement date, regardless of whether the treatment was actually received [5396244b-d87c-45e8-9f49-ddc116182e93, 258:262, "4.17 Pre-existing Conditions" means any condition that has been diagnosed, required medical treatment, or of which the Insured person should reasonably have been aware prior to the commencement date of this Policy, regardless of whether the treatment was actually received."].

Examples of conditions that may be considered pre-existing include, but are not limited to:
* Stones in the urinary system, chronic renal failure, or stones/infection of the biliary system.
* Hypertension, cardiovascular disease, cerebrovascular disease, or hematological disease.
* Cataracts.
* All types of cancers, tumors, polyps, cysts, or nodules, including breast lumps.
* Nasal or sinus conditions requiring surgery, abnormalities of the nasal septum or turbinates.
* Tonsillitis.
* Hernias, hemorrhoids, fistulae.
* Diabetes mellitus, hyperthyroidism, hypothyroidism.
* Hepatitis.
* Gastritis, duodenitis, gastric or duodenal ulcers.
* Endometriosis, including diseases of the reproductive system, and adenomyosis.
* Rheumatic/gout, musculoskeletal disorders.
* Tuberculosis, asthma [5396244b-d87c-45e8-9f49-ddc116182e93, 278:308].

column2: and how about the claim process? is this reimbursement?
column3:
For SmartCare Executive, the claim process can be done through two methods: **cashless** and **reimbursement**.

1.  **Cashless Facility**: This option is available if you receive treatment at a hospital or clinic within AXA's Provider Network. If your claim is approved, AXA Insurance will directly pay for your treatment. For inpatient care, AXA Insurance will issue a Letter of Guarantee (LoG) to the network hospital [73d4417f-b37b-4565-a390-7e1dfdcffcc3, 225:233, "Apabila Tertanggung berhak atas pertanggungan asuransi ini dengan Fasilitas Cashless, AXA Insurance akan melakukan pembayaran terlebih dahulu terhadap perawatan Tertanggung yang dilakukan di Rumah Sakit/Klinik yang termasuk dalam Jaringan Provider dengan ketentuan sebagai berikut: a. Tertanggung menunjukkan Kartu Peserta dan identitas diri lainnya, dan b. Melakukan pelayanan kesehatan di Rumah Sakit/Klinik yang termasuk Jaringan Provider sesuai haknya. 1.2 Rumah Sakit/Klinik Jaringan Provider akan melakukan prosedur standar sebagaimana disepakati dengan AXA Insurance. 1.3 Khusus untuk Rawat Inap, apabila AXA Insurance setuju bahwa tertanggung berhak mendapatkan pelayanan Fasilitas Cashless sesuai haknya, maka AXA Insurance akan mengeluarkan Surat Jaminan kepada Rumah Sakit/Klinik Jaringan Provider."].

2.  **Reimbursement**: If the cashless facility is not applicable (e.g., if you choose a non-partner hospital or if the cashless facility is unavailable for certain reasons), you will need to pay for the medical expenses upfront. Afterwards, you can submit a claim to AXA Insurance for reimbursement [73d4417f-b37b-4565-a390-7e1dfdcffcc3, 235:238, "Tertanggung hanya bisa mendapatkan pelayanan Cashless di rumah sakit rekanan dan jika karena satu sebab atau lainnya Fasilitas Cashless tidak berlaku di rumah sakit rekanan atau tertanggung mendapatkan perawatan di rumah sakit non-rekanan maka klaim akan diproses berdasarkan pengajuan klaim Reimbursemen dari Tertanggung."].

**General Claim Procedure:**

*   You must submit a written notification to AXA Insurance within 30 days of the disability that incurs claimable expenses [5396244b-d87c-45e8-9f49-ddc116182e93, 347:349, "Tertanggung wajib menyampaikan pemberitahuan secara tertulis kepada Penanggung dalam waktu 30 (tiga puluh) hari setelah terjadinya Ketidakmampuan yang menimbulkan biaya yang dapat diklaim"].
*   The notification should include full particulars of the event, all original bills and receipts, a complete physician's report stating the diagnosis and commencement date of the disability, and a summary of treatment costs, including medicines and services rendered [5396244b-d87c-45e8-9f49-ddc116182e93, 349:353, "termasuk: 7.10.1 semua kuitansi dan tanda terima asli; 7.10.2 laporan lengkap dari Dokter yang menegakkan diagnosa dari keadaan tersebut dan tanggal mulainya Ketidakmampuan; dan 7.10.3 ikhtisar biaya Perawatan dari Dokter tersebut, termasuk biaya obat-obatan dan jasa yang diberikan."].
*   If the claim documents are received after 30 days, you must provide a written explanation for the delay. AXA Insurance reserves the right to decline the claim if the reason is not considered valid [5396244b-d87c-45e8-9f49-ddc116182e93, 354:357, "Jika berkas pengajuan klaim diterima setelah jangka waktu 30 (tigapuluh) hari, maka Tertanggung wajib memberikan pernyataan tertulis kepada Perusahaan yang berisi alasan keterlambatan pengajuan tersebut. Perusahaan mempunyai hak untuk menolak klaim jika alasan tersebut tidak akurat."].
*   AXA Insurance will process and pay claims within a maximum of 14 working days after receiving complete information and documents [73d4417f-b37b-4565-a390-7e1dfdcffcc3, 258:260, "Maksimum hari untuk AXA Insurance memproses dan membayar klaim adalah 14 (empat belas) hari kerja sejak informasi dan dokumen lengkap diterima oleh AXA Insurance, atau dikatakan lain dalam skedul polis."].

For claims up to Rp 5 million, you can submit them through the Emma application. For claims above Rp 5 million, all hardcopy documents must be sent to the TPA [5b04770c-f309-4351-966b-0823d22e86ea, 216:219, "Untuk klaim dengan nominal sampai dengan Rp. 5 juta dapat diajukan melalui aplikasi Emma. Untuk keterangan lebih lanjut silahkan hubungi Customer Care kami di 021-1500 733"].

* ["ask", "What is the age limit for SmartCare Executive?"]

column25: and how about the claim process? is this reimbursement?
column26:
For SmartCare Executive, the claim process can be done through two methods: **cashless** and **reimbursement**.

1. **Cashless Facility**: This option is available if you receive treatment at a hospital or clinic within AXA's Provider Network. If your claim is approved, AXA Insurance will directly pay for your treatment. For inpatient care, AXA Insurance will issue a Letter of Guarantee (LoG) to the network hospital [73d4417f-b37b-4565-a390-7e1dfdcffcc3, 225:233, "If the Insured is entitled to this insurance coverage with the Cashless Facility, AXA Insurance will make advance payment for the Insured's treatment at a Hospital/Clinic within the Provider Network under the following conditions: a. The Insured presents a Participant Card and other forms of identification, and b. Undertakes health services at a Hospital/Clinic within the Provider Network in accordance with their rights. 1.2 Hospitals/Clinics within the Provider Network will carry out standard procedures as agreed with AXA Insurance. 1.3 Specifically for Inpatient Care, if AXA Insurance agrees that the Insured is entitled to receive Cashless Facility services in accordance with their rights, AXA Insurance will issue a Letter of Guarantee to the Hospital/Clinic within the Provider Network."].

2. **Reimbursement**: If the cashless facility is not applicable (e.g., if you choose a non-partner hospital or if the cashless facility is unavailable for certain reasons), you will need to pay for the medical expenses upfront. Afterward, you can submit a claim to AXA Insurance for reimbursement [73d4417f-b37b-4565-a390-7e1dfdcffcc3, 235:238, "The insured can only receive cashless services at partner hospitals. If, for one reason or another, the cashless facility is not applicable at a partner hospital or the insured receives treatment at a non-partner hospital, the claim will be processed based on the insured's reimbursement claim submission."].

**General Claim Procedure:**

* You must submit a written notification to AXA Insurance within 30 days of the disability that incurs claimable expenses [5396244b-d87c-45e8-9f49-ddc116182e93, 347:349, "The Insured must submit written notification to the Insurer within 30 (thirty) days after the disability that incurs claimable expenses occurs"].

* The notification should include full particulars of the event, all original bills and receipts, a complete physician's report stating the diagnosis and commencement date of the disability, and a summary of treatment costs, including medicines and services rendered [5396244b-d87c-45e8-9f49-ddc116182e93, 349:353, "including: 7.10.1 all original bills and receipts; 7.10.2 a complete report from the physician who diagnosed the condition and the commencement date of the disability; and 7.10.3 a summary of the costs of treatment from that physician, including the cost of medicines and services rendered."].
* If the claim documents are received after 30 days, you must provide a written explanation for the delay. AXA Insurance reserves the right to decline a claim if the reason is not considered valid [5396244b-d87c-45e8-9f49-ddc116182e93, 354:357, "If the claim application is received after 30 (thirty) days, the Insured is required to provide a written statement to the Company stating the reason for the late submission. The Company has the right to reject the claim if the reason is inaccurate."].
* AXA Insurance will process and pay claims within a maximum of 14 working days after receiving complete information and documents [73d4417f-b37b-4565-a390-7e1dfdcffcc3, 258:260, "The maximum days for AXA Insurance to process and pay a claim is 14 (fourteen) working days from the date AXA Insurance receives complete information and documents, or as otherwise stated in the policy schedule."].

For claims up to IDR 5 million, you can submit them through the Emma application. For claims above IDR 5 million, all hardcopy documents must be sent to the TPA [5b04770c-f309-4351-966b-0823d22e86ea, 216:219, "Claims up to IDR 5 million can be submitted through the Emma application. For further information, please contact our Customer Care at 021-1500 733"].

* ["ask", "Can I use a cashless facility for overseas treatment?"]

column2: Can I use a cashless facility for overseas treatment?
column3:
No, generally, you cannot use a cashless facility for overseas treatment under the SmartCare Executive policy.

The cashless facility is not applicable for overseas treatment unless it is specifically stated otherwise in your policy schedule [73d4417f-b37b-4565-a390-e7e1dfdcffcc3, 240:244, "Untuk Perawaatan di Luar Negeri Fasilitas Cashless tidak berlaku kecuali dinyatakan lain di dalam skedul polis dan apabila Tertanggung menempati kelas kamar di atas haknya maka toleransi kenaikan Kelas Kamar tidak berlaku."]. Overseas coverage is primarily for emergency treatment, and any approved overseas treatment will be reimbursed [5396244b-d87c-45e8-9f49-ddc116182e93, 75:78, "3.4.1 Pertanggungan di luar negeri hanya untuk Perawatan Darurat"] [5396244b-d87c-45e8-9f49-ddc116182e93, 331:333, "4.18.5 Overseas treatment, where applicable and agreed by the Company, will be reimbursed 100% in accordance with the Schedule of Benefit."].

Follow-up Question(s):
* ["ask", "What are the exclusions for SmartCare Executive?"]
* ["ask", "What is the age limit for SmartCare Executive?"]
* ["ask", "How can I submit a claim for SmartCare Executive?"]
column25: Can I use a cashless facility for overseas treatment?
column26:
No, generally, you cannot use a cashless facility for overseas treatment under the SmartCare Executive policy.

The cashless facility is not applicable for overseas treatment unless specifically stated otherwise in your policy schedule [73d4417f-b37b-4565-a390-e7e1dfdcffcc3, 240:244, "For overseas treatment, the cashless facility does not apply unless otherwise stated in the policy schedule. If the insured occupies a room class above their entitlement, the room class upgrade allowance does not apply."]. Overseas coverage is primarily for emergency treatment, and any approved overseas treatment will be reimbursed [5396244b-d87c-45e8-9f49-ddc116182e93, 75:78, "3.4.1 Overseas coverage for Emergency Treatment only"] [5396244b-d87c-45e8-9f49-ddc116182e93, 331:333, "4.18.5 Overseas treatment, where applicable and agreed by the Company, will be reimbursed 100% in accordance with the Schedule of Benefits."].

* ["ask", "What is the age limit for SmartCare Executive?"]
* ["ask", "How can I submit a claim for SmartCare Executive?"]

column2: So this policy only covers emergency treatment if i'm going overseas? if not emergency the treatment will be not covered?
column3:
Yes, that is correct. The SmartCare Executive policy **only covers emergency treatment if you are going overseas** [5396244b-d87c-45e8-9f49-ddc116182e93, 75:78, "3.4.1 Pertanggungan di luar negeri hanya untuk Perawatan Darurat"].

If the treatment is not an emergency, it will not be covered. Additionally, for emergency treatment overseas, you must be in a fit condition to travel before commencing your journey and must not have traveled with the express purpose of obtaining treatment overseas [5396244b-d87c-45e8-9f49-ddc116182e93, 79:82, "3.4.2. For emergency treatment, the Insured Person must be in fit condition to travel before commencing the journey and must not have travelled with the express purpose of obtaining treatment overseas."].

Follow-up Question(s):
* ["ask", "What are the exclusions for SmartCare Executive?"]
* ["ask", "What is the age limit for SmartCare Executive?"]
* ["ask", "How can I submit a claim for SmartCare Executive?"]

column2: what kind of the emergency treatment? is it only for accident or if i get sick on overseas can be covered?
column3:
For overseas treatment under SmartCare Executive, "emergency treatment" covers both **injuries due to accidents** and **illnesses** that require immediate medical action.

An "Emergency" is defined as a sudden and unexpected occurrence or set of circumstances causing injury or illness that requires immediate medical action [5396244b-d87c-45e8-9f49-ddc116182e93, 90:93, "4.10 Gawat Darurat\nSuatu keadaan yang tiba-tiba dan tanpa diduga atau suatu rangkaian keadaan yang mengakibatkan luka atau penyakit dan yang segera membutuhkan tindakan medis"].

Therefore, if you experience a sudden illness overseas that requires immediate medical attention, it can be covered as emergency treatment, provided you were in a fit condition to travel before your journey and did not travel specifically to seek treatment overseas [5396244b-d87c-45e8-9f49-ddc116182e93, 79:82, "3.4.2. For emergency treatment, the Insured Person must be in fit condition to travel before commencing the journey and must not have travelled with the express purpose of obtaining treatment overseas."].

Follow-up Question(s):
* ["ask", "What are the exclusions for SmartCare Executive?"]
* ["ask", "What is the age limit for SmartCare Executive?"]
* ["ask", "How can I submit a claim for SmartCare Executive?"]

column2: how much the limit that i covered for this emergency ?
column3:
The limit you are covered for emergency treatment overseas under SmartCare Executive depends on the plan you choose. The coverage is subject to the **Annual Limit per Person** of your selected plan.

These limits range from **Rp 100,000,000** for Plan 250 up to **Rp 500,000,000** for Plan 2000 [cd352d52-afe8-4ea8-bbda-eb309bc6bdc0, 131:133, "Batas tahunan per orang Annual limit per person | Rp 100,000,000 | Rp 120,000,000 | Rp 200,000,000 | Rp 250,000,000 | Rp 300,000,000 | Rp 500,000,000"].

* ["ask", "How can I submit a claim for SmartCare Executive?"]
* ["ask", "What is the age limit for SmartCare Executive?"]

column2: Can you please provide more information about the benefits and limits?
column3:
For Smart MediCare Plan 1000, here are the detailed benefits and limits:

*   **Daily Room & Board**: Rp 1,000,000 per day [cd352d52-afe8-4ea8-bbda-eb309bc6bdc0, 78:78, "Rp 1,000,000/hari Rp 1,000,000/day"].
*   **Intensive Care Unit (ICU) Room**: Covered up to a maximum of 30 days [cd352d52-afe8-4ea8-bbda-eb309bc6bdc0, 80:82, "Kamar unit perawatan intensif (ICU) Emergency Room | Maksimum 30 hari Maximum 30 days"].
*   **General Practitioner Visit**: Maximum 1 visit per day [cd352d52-afe8-4ea8-bbda-eb309bc6bdc0, 84:85, "Kunjungan dokter umum General practitioner visit | Maksimum 1 kunjungan/hari Maximum 1 visits/day"].
*   **Specialist Doctor Visit**: Maximum 1 visit per day [cd352d52-afe8-4ea8-bbda-eb309bc6bdc0, 87:88, "Kunjungan dokter spesialis Specialist doctor visit | Maksimum 1 kunjungan/hari Maximum 1 visits/day"].
*   **Operating Theatre**: Covered [cd352d52-afe8-4ea8-bbda-eb309bc6bdc0, 90:91, "Kamar bedah Operating theatre"].
*   **Anaesthetist's Fee**: Covered [cd352d52-afe8-4ea8-bbda-eb309bc6bdc0, 93:94, "Biaya anastesi Anaesthetist's fee"].
*   **Surgeon's Fee**: Maximum per disability [cd352d52-afe8-4ea8-bbda-eb309bc6bdc0, 96:98, "Biaya dokter ahli bedah Surgeon's fee | Maksimum perketidakmampuan Maximum per disability"].
*   **Miscellaneous Hospital Expenses**: Covered [cd352d52-afe8-4ea8-bbda-eb309bc6bdc0, 100:101, "Biaya aneka perawatan Misc hospital expenses"].
*   **Pre-hospitalization Expenses**: 30 days before hospitalization [cd352d52-afe8-4ea8-bbda-eb309bc6bdc0, 103:104, "Biaya sebelum rawat inap Pre-hospitalization expenses | 30 hari sebelum rawat inap 30 days before hospitalization"].
*   **Post-hospitalization Expenses**: 30 days after hospitalization [cd352d52-afe8-4ea8-bbda-eb309bc6bdc0, 106:107, "Biaya sesudah rawat inap Post-hospitalization expenses | 30 hari setelah rawat inap 30 days after hospitalization"].
*   **Emergency Treatment (Accident Only)**: Covered [cd352d52-afe8-4ea8-bbda-eb309bc6bdc0, 109:110, "Rawat jalan darurat Emergency treatment | Hanya untuk kecelakaan For accident"].
*   **Treatment Abroad**: For emergency only [cd352d52-afe8-4ea8-bbda-eb309bc6bdc0, 112:113, "Perawatan di luar negeri Treatment abroad | Hanya untuk keadaan gawat darurat For emergency only"].
*   **Local Ambulance Service**: Rp 500,000 per trip [cd352d52-afe8-4ea8-bbda-eb309bc6bdc0, 117:117, "Rp 500,000"].
*   **Outpatient Care**: Rp 500,000 annually [cd352d52-afe8-4ea8-bbda-eb309bc6bdc0, 121:121, "Rp 500,000"].
*   **Personal Accident Protection**: Rp 3,000,000 annually [cd352d52-afe8-4ea8-bbda-eb309bc6bdc0, 125:125, "Rp 3,000,000"].
*   **Maximum per Disability**: Rp 150,000,000 [cd352d52-afe8-4ea8-bbda-eb309bc6bdc0, 129:129, "Rp 150,000,000"].
*   **Annual Limit per Person**: Rp 300,000,000 [cd352d52-afe8-4ea8-bbda-eb309bc6bdc0, 133:133, "Rp 300,000,000"].

column2: pagi, mau tanya dong kalo asuransi perjalanan ke jerman ada gak
column3:
Ya, AXA Indonesia memiliki produk asuransi perjalanan internasional bernama SmartTravel Internasional yang mencakup perjalanan ke Jerman [fea4bbff-11d4-4ec3-aa68-428a39de4a32, "Area of Travel: Outside of Indonesia (Worldwide)"].

Asuransi SmartTravel Internasional menawarkan beberapa pilihan plan (Platinum, Gold, dan Silver) dengan manfaat yang bervariasi [fea4bbff-11d4-4ec3-aa68-428a39de4a32].

**Ketentuan Usia:**
*   Usia minimum untuk dijamin adalah 1 tahun pada tanggal keberangkatan, dan usia maksimum adalah 85 tahun sebelum tanggal keberangkatan [e25f6b86-7e02-4f53-ba75-4416af2532c2].
*   Untuk usia 65 hingga 75 tahun, manfaat biaya pengobatan dan evakuasi medis darurat/repatriasi dibatasi sebesar 35% dari batas maksimum.
*   Untuk usia 75 hingga 85 tahun, manfaat ini dibatasi sebesar 15% dari batas maksimum [e25f6b86-7e02-4f53-ba75-4416af2532c2].

**Beberapa manfaat utama yang dijamin antara lain:**
*   **Kecelakaan Diri:** Melindungi dari risiko kecelakaan yang menyebabkan kematian atau cacat tetap selama perjalanan [fea4bbff-11d4-4ec3-aa68-428a39de4a32].
*   **Biaya Pengobatan, Gigi, dan Lainnya:** Mengganti biaya pengobatan akibat cedera atau sakit, termasuk biaya perawatan gigi darurat akibat kecelakaan, serta evakuasi medis darurat dan repatriasi [fea4bbff-11d4-4ec3-aa68-428a39de4a32].
*   **Ketidaknyamanan selama Perjalanan:** Melindungi dari keterlambatan atau perubahan perjalanan, pembajakan transportasi umum, hingga perlindungan isi rumah dari kebakaran saat Anda bepergian [fea4bbff-11d4-4ec3-aa68-428a39de4a32].
*   **Bagasi dan Barang Milik Pribadi:** Melindungi dari kehilangan/kerusakan bagasi, keterlambatan bagasi, kehilangan dokumen perjalanan, atau uang selama perjalanan [fea4bbff-11d4-4ec3-aa68-428a39de4a32].
*   **Santunan Tunai Rumah Sakit:** Memberikan santunan harian untuk perawatan di rumah sakit selama di luar negeri [fea4bbff-11d4-4ec3-aa68-428a39de4a32].
*   **Perlindungan Ekstra:** Memberikan perlindungan jika terjadi gangguan akibat tindakan terorisme atau kehilangan pendapatan akibat kecelakaan selama perjalanan [fea4bbff-11d4-4ec3-aa68-428a39de4a32].

**Pengecualian umum meliputi:**
*   Perang, perang saudara, pemberontakan, revolusi, huru-hara, terorisme, pemogokan, dan kerusuhan (kecuali risiko pasif) [fea4bbff-11d4-4ec3-aa68-428a39de4a32].
*   Risiko nuklir [fea4bbff-11d4-4ec3-aa68-428a39de4a32].
*   Percobaan melukai diri sendiri, risiko terkait kehamilan dan melahirkan [fea4bbff-11d4-4ec3-aa68-428a39de4a32].
*   HIV, AIDS, atau penyakit terkait AIDS [fea4bbff-11d4-4ec3-aa68-428a39de4a32].
*   Efek atau pengaruh minuman keras dan obat-obatan terlarang [fea4bbff-11d4-4ec3-aa68-428a39de4a32].
*   Aktivitas berbahaya seperti perlombaan, kompetisi, reli motor, pendakian gunung, pot-holing, aktivitas bawah air, atau terbang sebagai awak pesawat, dan olahraga musim dingin [fea4bbff-11d4-4ec3-aa68-428a39de4a32].
*   Penyakit yang sudah ada sebelumnya (pre-existing disease) [fea4bbff-11d4-4ec3-aa68-428a39de4a32].

Follow-up Question(s):

*   ["ask", "Bagaimana cara mengajukan klaim untuk SmartTravel Internasional?"]
*   ["ask", "Apakah ada batasan durasi perjalanan untuk SmartTravel Internasional?"]
column25: Good morning, I want to ask if there is travel insurance to Germany or not.
column26:
Yes, AXA Indonesia has an international travel insurance product called SmartTravel International, which covers travel to Germany [fea4bbff-11d4-4ec3-aa68-428a39de4a32, "Area of Travel: Outside of Indonesia (Worldwide)"].

SmartTravel International Insurance offers several plan options (Platinum, Gold, and Silver) with varying benefits [fea4bbff-11d4-4ec3-aa68-428a39de4a32].

**Age Requirements:**
* The minimum age for coverage is 1 year on the date of departure, and the maximum age is 85 years before the date of departure [e25f6b86-7e02-4f53-ba75-4416af2532c2].
* For those aged 65 to 75, benefits for medical expenses and emergency medical evacuation/repatriation are limited to 35% of the maximum limit.

* For ages 75 to 85, this benefit is capped at 15% of the maximum limit [e25f6b86-7e02-4f53-ba75-4416af2532c2].

Some of the main benefits covered include:

* Personal Accident: Protects against the risk of accidents that cause death or permanent disability during travel [fea4bbff-11d4-4ec3-aa68-428a39de4a32].
* Medical, Dental, and Other Expenses: Reimburses medical expenses due to injury or illness, including emergency dental care due to accidents, as well as emergency medical evacuation and repatriation [fea4bbff-11d4-4ec3-aa68-428a39de4a32].

* **Travel Inconvenience:** Protects against delays or changes to travel, hijacking of public transportation, and even protection of your home contents from fire while you travel [fea4bbff-11d4-4ec3-aa68-428a39de4a32].
* **Baggage and Personal Belongings:** Protects against loss/damage to baggage, baggage delay, loss of travel documents, or money during travel [fea4bbff-11d4-4ec3-aa68-428a39de4a32].
* **Hospital Cash Benefit:** Provides daily benefits for hospital care while abroad [fea4bbff-11d4-4ec3-aa68-428a39de4a32].
* **Extra Protection:** Provides coverage in the event of disruption due to acts of terrorism or loss of income due to accidents during travel [fea4bbff-11d4-4ec3-aa68-428a39de4a32].

**General exclusions include:**
* War, civil war, rebellion, revolution, riot, terrorism, strikes, and civil commotion (except passive risks) [fea4bbff-11d4-4ec3-aa68-428a39de4a32].
* Nuclear risks [fea4bbff-11d4-4ec3-aa68-428a39de4a32].
* Attempted self-harm, risks related to pregnancy and childbirth [fea4bbff-11d4-4ec3-aa68-428a39de4a32].
* HIV, AIDS, or AIDS-related illnesses [fea4bbff-11d4-4ec3-aa68-428a39de4a32].
* The effects or influence of alcohol and illegal drugs [fea4bbff-11d4-4ec3-aa68-428a39de4a32].
* Hazardous activities such as racing, competitions, motorcycle rallies, mountain climbing, pot-holing, underwater activities, or flying as an airline crew, and winter sports [fea4bbff-11d4-4ec3-aa68-428a39de4a32].
* Pre-existing disease [fea4bbff-11d4-4ec3-aa68-428a39de4a32].

Follow-up Question(s):
* ["ask", "What are the differences between the Platinum, Gold, and Silver plans for SmartTravel International?"]
* ["ask", "How do I file a claim for SmartTravel International?"]
* ["ask", "Is there a travel duration limit for SmartTravel International?"]

column2: if i will go to Australia, which plan do you recommend?
column3:
For your trip to Australia, I recommend the **Platinum Plan** for SmartTravel International.

Here's why:
*   **Comprehensive Coverage:** The Platinum plan offers the highest limits across all main benefits, including Overseas Medical Treatment (IDR 2,000,000,000), Personal Accident (IDR 2,000,000,000), and Emergency Medical Evacuation and Repatriation (IDR 2,000,000,000) [308d0e01-602a-44fd-b855-b702ee2e6dab, 11:18, "IDR 2,000,000,000"]. This provides you with the most extensive financial protection in case of unexpected events during your travel.
*   **Higher Limits for Inconvenience:** It also provides higher coverage for travel inconveniences such as Travel Delay (up to IDR 6,000,000), Travel Cancellation (up to IDR 40,000,000), and Baggage and Personal Effects (up to IDR 30,000,000) [308d0e01-602a-44fd-b855-b702ee2e6dab, 11:18, "IDR 4,000,000/item/set, maks. IDR 30,000,000 (dalam Agregat)"], which can be very helpful when traveling internationally.
*   **Wider Coverage for Specific Benefits:** The Platinum plan generally offers the most robust coverage across all categories, ensuring you are well-protected for various scenarios that might arise during your trip.

Follow-up Question(s):
* ["ask", "What are the premium rates for the Platinum plan for my travel dates?"]
* ["ask", "Can you tell me more about the medical coverage in the Platinum plan?"]
* ["ask", "What are the exclusions for the SmartTravel International Platinum plan?"]

column2: can you explain about the per disability?
column3:
The "Per Disability Limit" in SmartCare Executive refers to the maximum amount that AXA Insurance will pay for expenses incurred for treatment related to a single medical condition (disability) during the insurance period. This limit applies regardless of the type of disability. Once this specific limit for a disability has been reached and paid out, no additional benefits will be paid for that particular disability [5396244b-d87c-45e8-9f49-ddc116182e93, 193:198, "5.13 Batas per Ketidakmampuan\nManfaat yang dibayarkan Perusahaan sehubungan dengan biaya yang timbul untuk Perawatan yang disediakan kepada Tertanggung selama Jangka Waktu Pertanggungan dibatasi per Ketidakmampuan sebagaimana yang tercantum dalam Uraian Manfaat tanpa memandang jenis Ketidakmampuannya dan manfaat yang dibayar sudah termasuk pajak.\nJika Batasan Per Ketidakmampuan telah dibayarkan, maka tidak ada tambahan manfaat yang dibayarkan."].

A "disability" is defined as a medical condition resulting from an injury or illness arising from a single cause. All medical conditions stemming from the same cause, including any complications, are treated as one disability. However, if 60 days pass after the latest discharge date from the hospital or the latest doctor consultation date (whichever is later), any subsequent disability from the same cause will be considered a new disability [5396244b-d87c-45e8-9f49-ddc116182e93, 249:257, "4.7 Ketidakmampuan\n4.7.1 Suatu keadaan medis yang timbul karena suatu luka / cedera tubuh atau suatu Penyakit, yang terjadi karena satu macam penyebab.\n4.7.2 Semua keadaan medis yang timbul karena Penyakit atau Luka Tubuh yang terjadi karena penyebab yang sama, termasuk segala komplikasi yang timbul darinya atau yang terkait erat dengannya dianggap sebagai Satu Ketidakmampuan, kecuali terjadi setelah 60 (enampuluh) hari sejak tanggal keluar Rumah Sakit atau tanggal konsultasi ke Dokter, yang mana yang terakhir, maka Ketidakmampuan yang terjadi selanjutnya akibat penyebab yang sama akan dianggap sebagai Ketidakmampuan yang baru."].

For Plan 1000, the maximum per disability limit is Rp 150,000,000 [cd352d52-afe8-4ea8-bbda-eb309bc6bdc0, 129:129, "Rp 150,000,000"].

Follow-up Question(s):
* ["ask", "What is the overall annual limit?"]
* ["ask", "What are the exclusions for SmartCare Executive?"]
* ["ask", "How can I submit a claim for SmartCare Executive?"]
column25: can you explain about the per disability?
column26:
The "Per Disability Limit" in SmartCare Executive refers to the maximum amount that AXA Insurance will pay for expenses incurred for treatment related to a single medical condition (disability) during the insurance period. This limit applies regardless of the type of disability. Once this specific limit for a disability has been reached and paid out, no additional benefits will be paid for that particular disability [5396244b-d87c-45e8-9f49-ddc116182e93, 193:198, "5.13 Per Disability Limit\nBenefits paid by the Company in respect of costs incurred for Treatment provided to the Insured during the Insurance Period are limited per Disability as stated in the Description of Benefits, regardless of the type of Disability, and the benefits paid are inclusive of tax.\nIf the Per Disability Limit has been paid, no additional benefits are paid."].

A "disability" is defined as a medical condition resulting from an injury or illness arising from a single cause. All medical conditions stemming from the same cause, including any complications, are treated as one disability. However, if 60 days pass after the latest hospital discharge date or the latest doctor consultation date (whichever is later), any subsequent disability from the same cause will be considered a new disability [5396244b-d87c-45e8-9f49-ddc116182e93, 249:257, "4.7 Disability 4.7.1 A medical condition arising from a bodily injury or disease, occurring due to a single cause. 4.7.2 All medical conditions arising from a disease or injury occurring due to the same cause, including any complications arising from it or closely related to it, are considered one disability, unless it occurs after 60 (sixty) days from the date of hospital discharge or the date of consultation with a doctor, whichever is later. In that case, any subsequent disability arising from the same cause will be considered a new disability."].

For Plan 1000, the maximum per disability limit is IDR 150,000,000 [cd352d52-afe8-4ea8-bbda-eb309bc6bdc0, 129:129, "Rp 150,000,000"].

Follow-up Question(s):
* ["ask", "What is the overall annual limit?"]
* ["ask", "What are the exclusions for SmartCare Executive?"]
* ["ask", "How can I submit a claim for SmartCare Executive?"]

column2: saya mau pergi dengan anak saya usia 20 tahun apa bisa saya ambil paket keluarga?
column3:
Untuk SmartTravel Internasional, anak Anda yang berusia 20 tahun dapat dimasukkan dalam paket keluarga jika dia masih berstatus pelajar penuh waktu di institusi pendidikan yang diakui, dengan usia maksimum 25 tahun [e25f6b86-7e02-4f53-ba75-4416af2532c2].

Jika anak Anda memenuhi kriteria tersebut, Anda bisa mengambil paket keluarga.

column25: I want to go with my 20 year old son. Can I take the family package?
column26:
For SmartTravel International, your 20-year-old child can be included in the family package if he or she is still a full-time student at a recognized educational institution, with a maximum age of 25 [e25f6b86-7e02-4f53-ba75-4416af2532c2].

If your child meets these criteria, you can take the family package.

Follow-up Question(s):
* ["ask", "Is your 20-year-old child still a full-time student?"]
* ["ask", "How long will your trip to Germany last?"]

column2: biayanya berapa ya kalo saya beli asuransi perjalanan buat apply visa, rencana pergi 10 november-25 november
column3:
Untuk asuransi perjalanan ke Jerman dengan SmartTravel International dari AXA Indonesia untuk periode 10 November hingga 25 November (total 16 hari), biaya premi akan bervariasi tergantung pada pilihan plan dan jenis perjalanan (individu, pasangan, atau keluarga).

Berikut adalah estimasi biaya premi untuk **individu** dalam mata uang Rupiah (IDR) untuk durasi 16 hari, termasuk biaya materai Rp 10.000 [308d0e01-602a-4fd7-b855-b702ee2e6dab, 195:200, "Biaya Materai : IDR 10.000"]:

*   **Plan Platinum:**
    *   Premi Dasar (1-3 hari): Rp 141.000
    *   Tambahan Premi per Hari: Rp 24.000
    *   Total Premi = Rp 141.000 + (Rp 24.000 x 13 hari) + Rp 10.000 = **Rp 463.000**
*   **Plan Gold:**
    *   Premi Dasar (1-3 hari): Rp 87.000
    *   Tambahan Premi per Hari: Rp 19.000
    *   Total Premi = Rp 87.000 + (Rp 19.000 x 13 hari) + Rp 10.000 = **Rp 344.000**
*   **Plan Silver:**
    *   Premi Dasar (1-3 hari): Rp 62.000
    *   Tambahan Premi per Hari: Rp 16.000
    *   Total Premi = Rp 62.000 + (Rp 16.000 x 13 hari) + Rp 10.000 = **Rp 280.000**

Mohon informasikan jenis plan (Platinum, Gold, atau Silver) dan apakah Anda bepergian sendiri, dengan pasangan, atau keluarga agar saya dapat memberikan perhitungan yang lebih akurat.

Follow-up Question(s):
* ["ask", "Apakah Anda bepergian sendiri, dengan pasangan, atau keluarga?"]
* ["ask", "Apakah Anda memiliki preferensi plan (Platinum, Gold, atau Silver)?"]
* ["ask", "Apakah Anda ingin melihat premi dalam mata uang USD?"]
column7: nilai premi tidak sama dengan website dan hitungan jumlah hari juga tidak sesuai saat di jumlah dengan premi
column25: How much does it cost if I buy travel insurance to apply for a visa, I plan to go November 10-25
column26:
For travel insurance to Germany with SmartTravel International from AXA Indonesia for the period from November 10 to November 25 (a total of 16 days), premiums will vary depending on the plan selected and the type of trip (individual, couple, or family).

The following is the estimated premium cost for **individuals** in Indonesian Rupiah (IDR) for a 16-day period, including a stamp duty of IDR 10,000 [308d0e01-602a-4fd7-b855-b702ee2e6dab, 195:200, "Stamp Duty: IDR 10,000"]:

* Platinum Plan:**
* Basic Premium (1-3 days): IDR 141,000
* Additional Premium per Day: IDR 24,000
* Total Premium = IDR 141,000 + (IDR 24,000 x 13 days) + IDR 10,000 = IDR 463,000
* Gold Plan:**
* Basic Premium (1-3 days): IDR 87,000
* Additional Premium per Day: IDR 19,000
* Total Premium = Rp 87,000 + (Rp 19,000 x 13 days) + Rp 10,000 = **Rp 344,000**
* **Silver Plan:**
* Basic Premium (1-3 days): Rp 62,000
* Additional Premium per Day: Rp 16,000
* Total Premium = Rp 62,000 + (Rp 16,000 x 13 days) + Rp 10,000 = **Rp 280,000**

Please indicate your plan type (Platinum, Gold, or Silver) and whether you are traveling alone, with a partner, or with a family so I can provide a more accurate calculation.

Follow-up Question(s):
* ["ask", "Are you traveling alone, with a partner, or family?"]
* ["ask", "Do you have a plan preference (Platinum, Gold, or Silver)?"]
* ["ask", "Would you like to see premiums in USD?"]
column27: The premium value is not the same as the website and the number of days calculated is also not the same when added to the premium.

column2: berapa limit tanggung jawab pihak ke tiga dalam asuransi smartdrive
column3:
Batas maksimum tanggung jawab hukum pihak ketiga dalam asuransi SmartDrive adalah Rp 50.000.000 per kejadian untuk kendaraan penumpang [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 57:60, "Tanggung Jawab Hukum Pihak ketiga maksimal Rp. 50 juta (Kendaraan Penumpang)"].

Perhitungan premi untuk jaminan ini dilakukan secara progresif:
*   Untuk uang pertanggungan hingga Rp 25.000.000: 1% dari uang pertanggungan.
*   Untuk uang pertanggungan di atas Rp 25.000.000 hingga Rp 50.000.000: 0,5% dari uang pertanggungan [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 61:63, "a. UP* hingga Rp25 juta : 1% dari UP\nb. UP > Rp25 juta s.d. Rp50 juta : 0,5% dari UP"].

Follow-up Question(s):
*   ["ask", "Apa saja yang termasuk dalam jaminan tanggung jawab hukum pihak ketiga?"]
*   ["ask", "Bagaimana cara mengajukan klaim tanggung jawab hukum pihak ketiga?"]
*   ["ask", "Apa saja pengecualian untuk asuransi SmartDrive?"]
column25: What is the limit of third party liability in SmartDrive insurance?
column26:
The maximum third-party liability limit under SmartDrive insurance is IDR 50,000,000 per incident for passenger vehicles [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 57:60, "Maximum Third-Party Liability IDR 50 million (Passenger Vehicles)"].

The premium for this coverage is calculated progressively:
* For coverage up to IDR 25,000,000: 1% of the coverage amount.
* For coverage amounts above IDR 25,000,000 to IDR 50,000,000: 0.5% of the coverage amount [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 61:63, "a. UP* up to IDR 25 million: 1% of the coverage amount\nb. UP > IDR 25 million to IDR 50 million: 0.5% of the coverage amount"].

Follow-up Question(s):
* ["ask", "What is included in third-party liability coverage?"]
* ["ask", "How do I file a third-party liability claim?"]
* ["ask", "What are the exclusions for SmartDrive insurance?"]

column2: Berapa deductible untuk asuransi SmartDrive?
column3:
Deductible atau risiko sendiri untuk asuransi SmartDrive bervariasi tergantung pada jenis klaim:

*   **Kerugian Sebagian**: Rp 300.000 per kejadian [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 124:127, "Kerugian Sebagian : IDR 300,000 / Kejadian"].
*   **Kerugian Total**: Rp 300.000 per kejadian [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 128:130, "Kerugian Total : IDR 300,000 / Kejadian"].
*   **Angin Topan, Badai, Hujan Es, Banjir dan/atau Tanah Longsor**: 10% dari nilai kerugian, minimum Rp 500.000 per kejadian [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 131:135, "Angin Topan, Badai, Hujan Es, Banjir dan/atau Tanah Longsor : 10% dari Nilai Kerugian, Minimal IDR 500,000 / Kejadian"].
*   **Gempa Bumi, Tsunami dan/atau Letusan Gunung Berapi**: 10% dari nilai kerugian, minimum Rp 500.000 per kejadian [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 136:139, "Gempa Bumi, Tsunami dan/atau Letusan Gunung Berapi : 10% dari Nilai Kerugian, Minimal IDR 500,000 / Kejadian"].
*   **Huru Hara**: 10% dari nilai kerugian, minimum Rp 500.000 per kejadian [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 140:142, "Huru Hara : 10% dari Nilai Kerugian, Minimal IDR 500,000 / Kejadian"].
*   **Terorisme dan Sabotase**: 10% dari nilai kerugian, minimum Rp 500.000 per kejadian [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 143:145, "Terorisme dan Sabotase : 10% dari Nilai Kerugian, Minimal IDR 500,000 / Kejadian"].
*   **Kecelakaan Diri, Tanggung Jawab Hukum Terhadap Pihak Ketiga, Tanggung Jawab Hukum Terhadap Penumpang, Santunan Biaya Klaim, New for Old, Biaya Derek, dan Biaya Ambulance**: Nihil (tidak ada deductible) [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 146:154, "Kecelakaan Diri: Nihil\nTanggung Jawab Hukum Terhadap Pihak Ketiga : Nihil\nTanggung Jawab Hukum Terhadap Penumpang : Nihil\nSantunan Biaya Klaim : Nihil\nKehilangan Kunci Kendaraan : 10% dari Nilai Kerugian, Minimal IDR 300,000\nPencurian Oleh Supir : 15% dari Nilai Kerugian\nBengkel Resmi : Nihil\nBiaya Taksi : 2 hari Franchise (Untuk pengerjaan di bengkel sampai dengan 2 hari tidak mendapat penggantian)\nNew for Old, Biaya Derek, Biaya Ambulance : Nihil"].
*   **Kehilangan Kunci Kendaraan**: 10% dari nilai kerugian, minimum Rp 300.000 [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 149:151, "Kehilangan Kunci Kendaraan : 10% dari Nilai Kerugian, Minimal IDR 300,000"].
*   **Pencurian Oleh Supir**: 15% dari nilai kerugian [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 152:153, "Pencurian Oleh Supir : 15% dari Nilai Kerugian"].
*   **Biaya Taksi**: 2 hari *Franchise* (tidak ada penggantian untuk pengerjaan di bengkel sampai dengan 2 hari) [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 154:156, "Biaya Taksi : 2 hari Franchise (Untuk pengerjaan di bengkel sampai dengan 2 hari tidak mendapat penggantian)"].

Follow-up Question(s):
*   ["ask", "Apa saja pengecualian untuk asuransi SmartDrive?"]
*   ["ask", "Bagaimana cara mengajukan klaim asuransi SmartDrive?"]
*   ["ask", "Berapa limit tanggung jawab pihak ketiga dalam asuransi SmartDrive?"]
column25: What is the deductible for SmartDrive insurance?
column26:
The deductible for SmartDrive insurance varies depending on the claim type:

* Partial Loss: IDR 300,000 per incident [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 124:127, "Partial Loss: IDR 300,000 / Incident"].
* Total Loss: IDR 300,000 per incident [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 128:130, "Total Loss: IDR 300,000 / Incident"].

* **Typhoon, Storm, Hail, Flood and/or Landslide**: 10% of the loss value, minimum IDR 500,000 per incident [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 131:135, "Typhoon, Storm, Hail, Flood and/or Landslide: 10% of the loss value, minimum IDR 500,000 / incident"].
* **Earthquake, Tsunami and/or Volcanic Eruption**: 10% of the loss value, minimum IDR 500,000 per incident [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 136:139, "Earthquake, Tsunami and/or Volcanic Eruption: 10% of the Loss Value, Minimum IDR 500,000 / Incident"].
* **Riot**: 10% of the loss value, minimum IDR 500,000 per incident [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 140:142, "Riot: 10% of the Loss Value, Minimum IDR 500,000 / Incident"].
* **Terrorism and Sabotage**: 10% of the loss value, minimum IDR 500,000 per incident [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 143:145, "Terrorism and Sabotage: 10% of the Loss Value, Minimum IDR 500,000 / Incident"].
* **Personal Accident, Third Party Liability, Passenger Liability, Claim Cost Compensation, New for Old, Towing Fee, and Ambulance Fee**: Nil (no deductible) [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 146:154, "Personal Accident: Nil\nThird Party Liability: Nil\nPassenger Liability: Nil\nClaim Cost Compensation: Nil\nLoss of Vehicle Key: 10% of Loss Value, Minimum IDR 300,000\nTheft by Driver: 15% of Loss Value\nAuthorized Workshop: Nil\nTaxi Fee: 2 days Franchise (Work done at the workshop up to 2 days will not be reimbursed)\nNew for Old, Towing Fee, Ambulance Fee: Nil"].

* **Loss of Vehicle Keys**: 10% of the loss value, minimum IDR 300,000 [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 149:151, "Loss of Vehicle Keys: 10% of the Loss Value, Minimum IDR 300,000"].
* **Theft by Driver**: 15% of the loss value [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 152:153, "Theft by Driver: 15% of the Loss Value"].

* Taxi Fee: 2 days *Franchise* (no reimbursement for workshop work up to 2 days) [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 154:156, "Taxi Fee: 2 days Franchise (No reimbursement for workshop work up to 2 days)"].

Follow-up Question(s):
* ["ask", "What are the exclusions for SmartDrive insurance?"]
* ["ask", "How do I file a SmartDrive insurance claim?"]
* ["ask", "What is the third-party liability limit for SmartDrive insurance?"]
