* **Pregnancy and its Complications**: Any condition whatsoever caused by pregnancy including childbirth, abortion, miscarriage from any cause, testing or treatment for impotence, sterility, infertility and all complications arising therefrom [5396244b-d87c-45e8-9f49-ddc116182e93, 423:428, "6.5 Any condition whatsoever caused by pregnancy including childbirth, abortion, miscarriage from any cause, testing or treatment for impotence, sterility, infertility and all complications arising therefrom,"].
* **Contraceptive and Sterilization Methods**: Any condition arising from surgery, mechanical and chemical methods for birth control, sterilization whether castration, tubal ligation, tebectomy, vasectomy [5396244b-d87c-45e8-9f49-ddc116182e93, 430:434, "6.6 Any condition arising from surgery, mechanical and chemical methods for birth control, sterilization whether castration, tubal ligation, tebectomy, vasectomy."].
* **Routine Examination and Non-Medical Treatment**: Routine physical examinations, health check-ups or other tests where there is no objective indication of a normal health disorder or preventive treatment including vaccinations, acupuncture, treatment specifically aimed at weight loss or treatment that is not Medically Necessary [5396244b-d87c-45e8-9f49-ddc116182e93, 436:443, "6.7 Routine physical examinations, health check-ups or other tests where there is no objective indication of a normal health disorder or preventive treatment including vaccinations, acupuncture, treatment specifically aimed at weight loss or treatment that is not Medically Necessary."].
* **Congenital Disorders**: Treatment/medication for Congenital Disorders and/or Physical Disorders due to Birth arising from or resulting from it [5396244b-d87c-45e8-9f49-ddc116182e93, 445:448, "6.8 Treatment/medication for Congenital Disorders and/or Physical Disorders due to Birth arising from or resulting from it."].
* **Non-Hospital Care and Mental Disorders**: Non-Hospital Nursing Care or Ambulatory Care, rest or sanatorium care, care arising from any geriatric, psycho-geriatric or diagnosed emotional, mental disability, mental disorder or psychiatric condition, or mental illness, treatment or care for substance, drug, narcotic, or alcohol abuse or dependence syndrome or addiction [5396244b-d87c-45e8-9f49-ddc116182e93, 450:460, "6.9 Non-Hospital Nursing care or Ambulatory Care, rest or sanitarium care, treatment arising from any geriatric, psycho-geriatric or any diagnosed emotional, mental disability, mental disorder or illness, psychiatric condition, treatment or care or substance, or drug or narcotic or alcohol abuse or dependence syndrome or addiction."].
* **HIV/AIDS**: Disability arising directly or indirectly from Acquired Immuno Deficiency Syndrome (AIDS), any condition related to AIDS or infection by Human Immuno-Deficiency Virus [5396244b-d87c-45e8-9f49-ddc116182e93, 462:465, "6.10 Disability arising directly or indirectly from Acquired Immuno Deficiency Syndrome (AIDS), any condition related to AIDS or infection by Human Immuno-Deficiency Virus."].
* **Suicide and Self-Injury**: Suicide or attempted suicide, self-inflicted injury or attempt to do so, whether consciously or not [5396244b-d87c-45e8-9f49-ddc116182e93, 467:470, "6.11 Suicide or attempted suicide, self-inflicted injury or attempt to do so, whether consciously or not."].

* **Non-Accidental Dental Care**: Dental care or examination or treatment or surgery of teeth, gums, or directly supporting structures and related treatment thereof, except when necessary because of bodily injury resulting from an Accident to the natural teeth requiring the services of a maxillofacial surgeon [5396244b-d87c-45e8-9f49-ddc116182e93, 472:479, "6.12 Dental care or examination or treatment or surgery of teeth, gums, or directly supporting structures and related treatment thereof, except when necessary because of bodily injury resulting from an Accident to the natural teeth requiring the services of a maxillofacial surgeon."].
* **Cosmetic Surgery and Vision Correction**: Cosmetic or plastic surgery, treatment, care and surgery for sex change, circumcision (circumcision) unless medically necessary, eye exam, refractive error of the eye [5396244b-d87c-45e8-9f49-ddc116182e93, 481:485, "6.13 Cosmetic or plastic surgery, treatment, care and surgery for sex change, circumcision (circumcision) unless medically necessary, eye exam, refractive error of the eye."].
* **Assistive Devices and Prostheses**: Any form of provision of assistive devices/tools, including glasses, contact lenses, wheelchairs and other aids such as pacemakers, stands, hearing aids and other aids related to disabilities [5396244b-d87c-45e8-9f49-ddc116182e93, 487:491, "6.14 Any form of provision of assistive devices/tools, including glasses, contact lenses, wheelchairs and other aids such as pacemakers, stands, hearing aids and other aids related to disabilities."].
* **Sexually Transmitted Diseases**: [5396244b-d87c-45e8-9f49-ddc116182e93, 493:494, "6.15 Sexually Transmitted Diseases."].
* **Hospitalization for Diagnosis**: Hospitalization primarily for diagnosis, X-ray examination, general physical examination or check-up [5396244b-d87c-45e8-9f49-ddc116182e93, 496:499, "6.16 Hospitalization primarily for diagnosis, X-ray examination, general physical examination or check-up."].
* **Non-Medical Expenses**: Costs of telephone, television, radio, newspapers, meals for guests and other non-medical items when treated as an Inpatient or Outpatient Surgery [5396244b-d87c-45e8-9f49-ddc116182e93, 501:505, "6.17 Costs of telephone, television, radio, newspapers, meals for guests and other non-medical items when treated as an Inpatient or Outpatient Surgery."].
* **High Risk Activities**: Illness or physical injury resulting from racing of any kind (except on foot), professional sports, parachuting, skydiving, boxing, wrestling, professional scuba-diving, bungee jumping [5396244b-d87c-45e8-9f49-ddc116182e93, 507:511, "6.18 Illness or physical injury resulting from racing of any kind (except on foot), professional sports, parachuting, skydiving, boxing, wrestling, professional scuba-diving, bungee jumping."].
* **Breach of Law**: Any violation or attempted violation of law or resistance to lawful arrest [5396244b-d87c-45e8-9f49-ddc116182e93, 513:515, "6.19 Any violation or attempted violation of law or resistance to lawful arrest."].
* **Non-Commercial Flight**: Flight or other air activity other than as a fare-paying passenger on a fully licensed aircraft operated by a licensed commercial airline or recognized charter company [5396244b-d87c-45e8-9f49-ddc116182e93, 517:521, "6.20 Flight or other air activity other than as a fare-paying passenger on a fully licensed aircraft operated by a licensed commercial airline or recognized charter company."].
* **War and Terrorism**: Treatment arising as a direct or indirect consequence of war, invasion, act of foreign enemy, hostilities or warlike activities, civil war, rebellion, revolution, insurrection, civil commotion (riot) assumed to be part of or leading to an insurrection, military action or usurpation; or any terrorist act [5396244b-d87c-45e8-9f49-ddc116182e93, 523:555, "6.20.1 Treatment arising as a result (whether directly or indirectly) of\n6.20.1.1 war, invasion, act of foreign enemy, hostilities or warlike activities (whether or not war is declared), civil war, rebellion, revolution, general insurrection, civil commotion (riot) assumed to be part of or leading to a rebellion, military force or takeover of power; or\n6.20.1.2 any terrorist act\nfor the purposes of this exception a terrorist act is an act, including but not limited to the use of force or violence, the use of chemical and/or biological agents and/or threats by a person or group whether acting personally or on behalf of or in connection with an organization or government with political, religious, ideological or similar objectives including the aim of influencing a government and/or making society or some of the community feel afraid.\nThis exclusion also excludes any loss, damage, cost or expense directly or indirectly caused by, arising from or related to any effort made to control, prevent, restrain or in any way related to (6.20.1.1) and / or (6.20.1.2) above.\nIf the Insurer states that according to this exclusion a loss, damage, cost or expense is not covered under this insurance, then the burden of proving that it is covered lies with the Insured.\nIn the event that any part of this exclusion is found to be invalid / invalid or unenforceable, the other parts remain valid.\nWar and Civil War Exclusions cannot be applied to passive risks in the case of terrorism, strikes, riots and civil commotion. Passive risk means the Insured is killed or injured because he was accidentally at a location where terrorism or strikes, riots and civil commotion occurred. * **Direct Participation in Riots/Military Duty**: Treatment arising as a result of direct participation in Riots, Strikes, Civil Commotions or while on active duty in the armed forces or police [5396244b-d87c-45e8-9f49-ddc116182e93, 557:561, "6.20.2 Treatment arising as a result of direct participation in riots, strikes, civil commotions or while on active duty in the armed forces or police."].
* **Nuclear Weapons Material**: Treatment arising as a result (either directly or indirectly) of nuclear weapons material or ionizing radiation or radioactive contamination from nuclear materials or waste from the combustion of nuclear fuel [5396244b-d87c-45e8-9f49-ddc116182e93, 563:570, "6.20.3 Treatment arising as a result (either directly or indirectly) of nuclear weapons material or ionizing radiation or radioactive contamination from nuclear materials or waste from the combustion of nuclear fuel. For the purposes of this exception "Combustion" includes the process of nuclear fission occurring continuously."].

* **Living Outside Indonesia**: Those who have resided outside Indonesia continuously for more than three (3) calendar months [5396244b-d87c-45e8-9f49-ddc116182e93, 572:574, "6.21 Those who have resided outside Indonesia continuously for more than three (3) calendar months."].

Follow-up Question(s):
* ["ask", "What benefits does SmartMedicare offer?"]
* ["ask", "How do I file a SmartMedicare claim?"]
* ["ask", "Does SmartMedicare cover pre-existing illnesses?"]

column2: apakah lasik dapat di cover di smart medicare
column3:
Berdasarkan dokumen yang tersedia, lasik (operasi mata dengan laser) tidak dapat dicover di SmartMedicare. Pengecualian ini termasuk dalam daftar pengecualian umum yang menyatakan bahwa polis tidak menanggung perawatan untuk memperbaiki refraksi penglihatan mata seperti rabun dekat atau rabun jauh atau astigmatis, termasuk laser/operasi mata dengan laser (lasik) [2024 ID AFI Maestro Optima Care - RIPLAY Umum_v1.8_clean, 1004:1007, "Perawatan untuk memperbaiki refraksi penglihatan mata seperti rabun dekat atau rabun jauh atau astigmatis; laser/operasi mata dengan laser (lasik);"].

Follow-up Question(s):
*   ["ask", "Apa saja manfaat yang ditawarkan oleh SmartMedicare?"]
*   ["ask", "Apakah SmartMedicare mengcover penyakit pre-eksisting?"]
*   ["ask", "Apa saja pengecualian umum lainnya untuk SmartMedicare?"]
column25: Can Lasik be covered by Smart Medicare?
column26:
Based on available documentation, LASIK (laser eye surgery) is not covered by SmartMedicare. This exclusion is included in the general exclusion list, which states that the policy does not cover treatments to correct refractive errors such as nearsightedness, farsightedness, or astigmatism, including laser/laser eye surgery (LASIK). [2024 ID AFI Maestro Optima Care - RIPLAY Umum_v1.8_clean, 1004:1007, "Treatments to correct refractive errors such as nearsightedness, farsightedness, or astigmatism; laser/laser eye surgery (LASIK);"].

Follow-up Question(s):
* ["ask", "What benefits does SmartMedicare offer?"]
* ["ask", "Does SmartMedicare cover pre-existing conditions?"]
* ["ask", "What are the other general exclusions for SmartMedicare?"]

column2: Bagaimana cara mengajukan klaim untuk SmartDrive?
column3:
Untuk mengajukan klaim Asuransi SmartDrive, Anda perlu mengikuti prosedur berikut:

**Prosedur Klaim:**
1.  **Pemberitahuan Awal**: Setelah mengetahui adanya kerugian atau kerusakan pada kendaraan, Anda wajib memberitahukan Penanggung secara tertulis atau lisan (diikuti dengan pemberitahuan tertulis) paling lambat 5 hari kalender sejak kejadian [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 296:300, "Tertanggung, setelah mengetahui atau seharusnya mengetahui adanya kerugian dan/atau kerusakan atas Kendaraan Bermotor dan/atau kepentingan yang dipertanggungkan, wajib : 1.1. memberitahu Penanggung secara tertulis atau secara lisan yang diikuti dengan tertulis kepada Penanggung selambat-lambatnya 5 (lima) hari kalender sejak terjadinya kerugian dan/atau kerusakan;"].
2.  **Laporan Polisi**:
    *   Untuk kerugian atau kerusakan sebagian akibat pencurian atau melibatkan pihak ketiga, laporkan ke Kepolisian Sektor (Polsek) setempat untuk mendapatkan surat keterangan [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 300:305, "1.2. melaporkan kepada dan mendapat surat keterangan dari serendah-rendahnya Kepolisian Sektor (Polsek) di tempat kejadian, jika terjadi kerugian dan/atau kerusakan sebagian yang disebabkan oleh pencurian atau melibatkan pihak ketiga, yang dapat dijadikan dasar untuk menuntut ganti rugi kepada atau dari pihak ketiga;"].
    *   Untuk kerugian total akibat pencurian, laporkan ke Kepolisian Daerah (Polda) setempat untuk mendapatkan surat keterangan [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 305:307, "1.3. melaporkan kepada dan mendapat surat keterangan dari Kepolisian Daerah (Polda) di tempat kejadian dalam hal kerugian total akibat pencurian."].
3.  **Tuntutan Pihak Ketiga (jika ada)**: Jika Anda dituntut oleh pihak ketiga, Anda harus memberitahukan Penanggung paling lambat 5 hari kalender sejak tuntutan diterima, menyerahkan dokumen tuntutan dan laporan Polsek, serta memberikan surat kuasa kepada Penanggung jika diminta [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 308:317, "Jika Tertanggung dituntut oleh pihak ketiga sehubungan dengan kerugian dan/atau kerusakan yang disebabkan oleh Kendaraan Bermotor, maka Tertanggung wajib: 2.1. memberitahu Penanggung tentang adanya tuntutan tersebut selambat-lambatnya 5 (lima) hari kalender sejak tuntutan tersebut diterima; 2.2. menyerahkan dokumen tuntutan pihak ketiga dan menyerahkan surat laporan Kepolisian Sektor (Polsek) di tempat kejadian; 2.3. memberikan surat kuasa kepada Penanggung untuk mengurus tuntutan ganti rugi dari pihak ketiga, jika Penanggung menghendaki;"].
4.  **Upaya Penyelamatan**: Lakukan segala upaya untuk menjaga, memelihara, dan menyelamatkan kendaraan serta memberikan bantuan penuh kepada Penanggung untuk melakukan penelitian atas kerugian sebelum perbaikan atau penggantian [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 319:326, "Pada waktu terjadi kerugian dan/atau kerusakan, Tertanggung wajib : 3.1. melakukan segala usaha yang patut guna menjaga, memelihara, menyelamatkan Kendaraan Bermotor dan/atau kepentingan yang dipertanggungkan serta mengizinkan pihak lain untuk menyelamatkan Kendaraan Bermotor dan/atau kepentingan tersebut; 3.2. memberikan bantuan dan kesempatan sepenuhnya kepada Penanggung atau Kuasa Penanggung atau pihak lain yang ditunjuk oleh Penanggung untuk melakukan penelitian atas kerugian dan/atau kerusakan yang terjadi atas Kendaraan Bermotor sebelum dilakukan perbaikan atau penggantian;"].

**Dokumen Klaim yang Dibutuhkan:**

**I. Untuk Kerugian Sebagian:**
*   Laporan kerugian termasuk kronologi kejadian [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 339:340, "1. Laporan kerugian termasuk kronologis kejadian."].
*   Fotokopi Polis, Sertifikat, Lampiran/Endosemen [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 341:342, "2.1 Polis, sertifikat, lampiran / endorsemen"].
*   Fotokopi SIM pengemudi saat kejadian, STNK, dan KTP Tertanggung [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 343:344, "2.2 Surat Izin Mengemudi (SIM) milik pengemudi pada saat kejadian, Surat Tanda nomor Kendaraan (STNK), Kartu Tanda Penduduk (KTP) Tertanggung."].

**II. Untuk Kerugian Total:**
*   Laporan kerugian termasuk kronologi kejadian [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 347:348, "1. Laporan kerugian termasuk kronologis kejadian"].
*   Dokumen asli Polis, Sertifikat, Lampiran/Endosemen [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 349:350, "2.1 Polis, sertifikat, lampiran / endorsemen"].
*   Dokumen asli STNK, BPKB, Faktur Pembelian, blanko kuitansi, dan surat penyerahan hak milik yang ditandatangani Tertanggung [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 351:353, "2.2 Surat Tanda Nomor Kendaraan (STNK), Buku Pemilik Kendaraan Bermotor (BPKB), Faktur Pembelian, blanko kwitansi dan surat penyerahan hak milik yang sudah ditanda tangani Tertanggung"].
*   Dokumen lain yang diperlukan sesuai ketentuan untuk kendaraan diplomatik atau badan internasional [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 354:355, "2.3 Dokumen yang diperlukan sesuai ketentuan yang berlaku untuk kendaraan bermotor diplomatik atau badan internasional"].
*   Buku KIR untuk kendaraan yang wajib KIR [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 356:357, "2.4 Buku kir untuk jenis kendaraan yang wajib kir"].
*   Surat keterangan Kepolisian Daerah (untuk kehilangan keseluruhan) [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 358:359, "2.5 Surat keterangan kepolisian daerah, dalam hal kehilangan keseluruhan"].
*   Bukti pemblokiran STNK (untuk kehilangan keseluruhan) [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 360:361, "2.6 Bukti pemblokiran Surat Tanda Nomor Kendaraan (STNK), dalam hal kehilangan keseluruhan."].
*   Fotokopi SIM pengemudi saat kejadian dan KTP Tertanggung [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 362:363, "3. Fotokopi Surat Izin Mengemudi (SIM) milik pengemudi pada saat kejadian, Kartu Tanda Penduduk (KTP) Tertanggung"].

**III. Berlaku untuk Kerugian Sebagian dan Total:**
*   Foto kerusakan dan estimasi biaya perbaikan (jika diminta Penanggung) [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 365:366, "1. Foto kerusakan, estimasi biaya perbaikan, jika diminta oleh Penanggung."].
*   Surat laporan kepolisian setempat (jika melibatkan pihak ketiga atau kehilangan sebagian akibat pencurian) [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 367:368, "2. Surat laporan kepolisian setempat, jika kerugian dan atau kerusakan melibatkan pihak ketiga atau dalam hal kehilangan sebagian akibat pencurian"].
*   Surat tuntutan dari pihak ketiga (jika melibatkan pihak ketiga) [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 369:370, "3. Surat tuntutan dari pihak ketiga jika kerugian dan atau kerusakan melibatkan pihak ketiga"].
*   Dokumen relevan lain yang diminta Penanggung [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 371:372, "Dokumen lain yang relevan yang diminta Penanggung sehubungan dengan penyelesaian klaim"].

Anda dapat melaporkan klaim ke Customer Care Center AXA Insurance di nomor telepon **1500 733** atau melalui email ke customer.general@axa.co.id [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 570:572, "Jika terjadi kerugian, Peserta dapat melaporkan klaimnya ke Customer Care Center AXA Insurance di no. telepon 1500 733; email customer.general@axa.co.id;"].

**Follow-up Question(s):**
*   ["ask", "Apa saja manfaat yang ditawarkan oleh SmartDrive?"]
*   ["ask", "Apa saja persyaratan asuransi SmartDrive?"]
*   ["ask", "Apakah ada diskon premi untuk SmartDrive?"]
column25: How do I file a claim for SmartDrive?
column26:
To file a SmartDrive Insurance claim, you must follow these procedures:

**Claim Procedure:**
1. **Initial Notification**: Upon learning of any loss or damage to your vehicle, you must notify the Insurer in writing or verbally (followed by written notification) no later than 5 calendar days from the incident [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 296:300, "The Insured, upon learning or reasonably ought to have known of any loss and/or damage to the Motor Vehicle and/or insured interest, must: 1.1. notify the Insurer in writing or verbally followed by written notification to the Insurer no later than 5 (five) calendar days from the occurrence of the loss and/or damage;"].

2. **Police Report**:
* For partial loss or damage due to theft or involving a third party, report to the local Police Sector (Polsek) to obtain a certificate [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 300:305, "1.2. report to and obtain a certificate from at least the Police Sector (Polsek) at the scene, if the loss and/or partial damage occurred due to theft or involving a third party, which can be used as a basis for claiming compensation to or from the third party;"].
* For total losses due to theft, report to the local Regional Police (Polda) to obtain a certificate [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 305:307, "1.3. report to and obtain a certificate from the Regional Police (Polda) at the scene in the case of total loss due to theft."].
3. **Third Party Claims (if any)**: If you are sued by a third party, you must notify the Insurer no later than 5 calendar days after the claim is received, submit the claim documents and the Police Sector report, and provide a power of attorney to the Insurer if requested [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 308:317, "If the Insured is sued by a third party in connection with loss and/or damage caused by a Motor Vehicle, the Insured must: 2.1. notify the Insurer of the claim no later than 5 (five) calendar days after the claim is received; 2.2. submit the third party claim documents and submit the Police Sector (Polsek) report at the scene of the incident; 2.3. provide a power of attorney to the Insurer to handle the claim for compensation from the third party, if the Insurer so desires;"].

4. **Rescue Efforts**: Make every effort to safeguard, maintain, and salvage the vehicle and provide full assistance to the Insurer in conducting an investigation into the loss before repair or replacement [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 319:326, "In the event of loss and/or damage, the Insured is obliged to: 3.1. make every reasonable effort to safeguard, maintain, and salvage the Motor Vehicle and/or the insured interest and permit another party to salvage the Motor Vehicle and/or such interest; 3.2. provide full assistance and opportunity to the Insurer or the Insurer's Attorney or another party appointed by the Insurer to conduct an investigation into the loss and/or damage to the Motor Vehicle before repair or replacement is carried out;"].

**Required Claim Documents:**

**I. For Partial Losses:**
* Loss report including chronology of events [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 339:340, "1. Loss report including chronology of events."].
* Photocopies of Policy, Certificate, Attachments/Endorsements [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 341:342, "2.1 Policy, certificate, attachments/endorsements"].
* Photocopies of the driver's license at the time of the incident, the vehicle registration certificate (STNK), and the insured's ID card [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 343:344, "2.2 Driver's license (SIM) at the time of the incident, Vehicle Registration Certificate (STNK), and the insured's ID card (KTP).

**II. For Total Loss:**
* Loss report including chronology of events [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 347:348, "1. Loss report including chronology of events"].

* Original Policy, Certificate, Attachments/Endorsements [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 349:350, "2.1 Policy, certificate, attachments/endorsements"].
* Original Vehicle Registration Certificate (STNK), Vehicle Ownership Certificate (BPKB), Purchase Invoice, receipt form, and ownership transfer letter signed by the Insured [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 351:353, "2.2 Vehicle Registration Certificate (STNK), Vehicle Ownership Certificate (BPKB), Purchase Invoice, receipt form, and ownership transfer letter signed by the Insured"].
* Other documents required in accordance with regulations for diplomatic or international agency vehicles [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 354:355, "2.3 Documents required in accordance with regulations for diplomatic or international agency motor vehicles"].
* Vehicle Inspection Certificate for vehicles requiring a vehicle inspection [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 356:357, "2.4 Vehicle Inspection Certificate for vehicles requiring a vehicle inspection"].
* Regional Police Certificate (for total loss) [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 358:359, "2.5 Regional Police Certificate, in case of total loss"].
* Proof of Vehicle Registration Certificate (STNK) blocking (for total loss) [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 360:361, "2.6 Proof of Vehicle Registration Certificate (STNK) blocking, in case of total loss."].
* Photocopy of the driver's license at the time of the incident and the Insured's ID card [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 362:363, "3. Photocopy of the driver's license (SIM) at the time of the incident, the Insured's ID card (KTP)"].

**III. Applies to Partial and Total Losses:**
* Photos of the damage and estimated repair costs (if requested by the Insurer) [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 365:366, "1. Photos of the damage, estimated repair costs, if requested by the Insurer."].
* Local police report (if a third party is involved or partial loss is due to theft) [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 367:368, "2. Local police report, if the loss and/or damage involves a third party or in the case of partial loss is due to theft"].
* Third-party claim letter (if involving a third party) [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 369:370, "3. Third-party claim letter if loss and/or damage involves a third party"].
* Other relevant documents requested by the Insurer [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 371:372, "Other relevant documents requested by the Insurer in connection with the settlement of the claim"].

You can report a claim to the AXA Insurance Customer Care Center at 1500 733 or by email to customer.general@axa.co.id [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 570:572, "If a loss occurs, participants can report their claim to the AXA Insurance Customer Care Center at 1500 733 or email customer.general@axa.co.id;"].

column26:

column2: apakah bisa claim jika kerusakan hanya 15% di asuransi TLO smartdrive
column3:
Tidak, Anda tidak bisa mengajukan klaim jika kerusakan hanya 15% di asuransi Total Loss Only (TLO) SmartDrive. Jaminan TLO hanya menanggung kerugian total, yaitu jika biaya perbaikan, penggantian, atau pemulihan kendaraan sama dengan atau lebih tinggi dari 75% dari harga sebenarnya kendaraan sesaat sebelum terjadinya kerugian, atau jika kendaraan hilang karena pencurian dan tidak ditemukan dalam waktu 60 hari [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 7a90405a-d05f-4e91-8711-f1a3d682d512].

**Follow-up Question(s):**
*   ["ask", "Apa perbedaan antara jaminan Comprehensive dan TLO di SmartDrive?"]
*   ["ask", "Apakah ada risiko sendiri yang berlaku untuk klaim TLO?"]
*   ["ask", "Bagaimana cara mengajukan klaim di SmartDrive?"]
column25: Can you claim if the damage is only 15% in TLO SmartDrive insurance?
column26:
No, you cannot file a claim if the damage is only 15% with SmartDrive Total Loss Only (TLO) insurance. TLO coverage only covers total losses, that is, if the cost of repairing, replacing, or restoring the vehicle is equal to or greater than 75% of the vehicle's actual value immediately before the loss, or if the vehicle is lost due to theft and not recovered within 60 days [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9, 7a90405a-d05f-4e91-8711-f1a3d682d512].

**Follow-up Question(s):**
* ["ask", "What is the difference between Comprehensive and TLO coverage in SmartDrive?"]
* ["ask", "Is there a deductible that applies to TLO claims?"]
* ["ask", "How do I file a claim in SmartDrive?"]

column2: apabila ada keluarga inti yang masuk ke RS sehingga mengakibatkan tidak jadi melakukan traveling, maka apa saja yang bisa di cover oleh smart travel
column3:
Jika ada keluarga inti yang masuk rumah sakit sehingga Anda tidak jadi melakukan perjalanan, SmartTravel International dapat menanggung kehilangan uang muka atau pembatalan perjalanan. Ini berlaku jika pembatalan terjadi kurang dari 30 hari sebelum tanggal dimulainya perjalanan dan diakibatkan oleh kematian, sakit, atau cedera parah yang dialami Anda atau pasangan, anak, menantu, orang tua, mertua, kakek/nenek, kakek/nenek mertua, cucu, kakak, adik, kakak ipar, adik ipar, atau rekan perjalanan [e25f6b86-7e02-4f53-ba75-4416af2532c2].

Untuk klaim ini, Anda perlu mendapatkan sertifikat kematian atau keterangan tertulis dari dokter yang merawat, yang mengkonfirmasi kelayakan pembatalan perjalanan karena sakit atau cedera [e25f6b86-7e02-4f53-ba75-4416af2532c2].

**Follow-up Question(s):**
*   ["ask", "Siapa saja yang termasuk dalam definisi 'keluarga' untuk SmartTravel International?"]
*   ["ask", "Apa saja dokumen yang diperlukan untuk mengajukan klaim pembatalan perjalanan?"]
*   ["ask", "Apakah ada manfaat lain yang terkait dengan ketidaknyamanan perjalanan di SmartTravel International?"]
column25: If there is a core family member who is admitted to the hospital, which results in not being able to travel, then what can be covered by smart travel?
column26:
If a member of your immediate family is hospitalized and you cannot travel, SmartTravel International can cover the loss of your deposit or trip cancellation. This applies if the cancellation occurs less than 30 days before the start date of your trip and is due to the death, illness, or serious injury of you or your spouse, child, son/daughter-in-law, parent, parent-in-law, grandparent/grandparent-in-law, grandchild, sibling, brother/sister, brother-in-law, sister-in-law, or traveling companion [e25f6b86-7e02-4f53-ba75-4416af2532c2].

To claim this, you will need a death certificate or a written statement from the attending physician confirming the eligibility for trip cancellation due to illness or injury [e25f6b86-7e02-4f53-ba75-4416af2532c2].

**Follow-up Question(s):**
* ["ask", "Who is included in the definition of 'family' for SmartTravel International?"]
* ["ask", "What documents are required to file a trip cancellation claim?"]
* ["ask", "Are there any other benefits related to travel inconvenience on SmartTravel International?"]

column3:
Ya, ada pengecualian terkait jaminan terorisme di asuransi SmartTravel International. Polis tidak akan membayar klaim yang timbul secara langsung maupun tidak langsung, dengan adanya kontribusi yang disebabkan dari atau ada hubungannya dengan nuklir, kejadian kimia, dan biologi [e25f6b86-7e02-4f53-ba75-4416af2532c2].

column25: Are there any exceptions regarding terrorism guarantees?
column26:
Yes, there are exclusions regarding terrorism coverage in SmartTravel International insurance. The policy will not pay claims arising directly or indirectly from, or in connection with, nuclear, chemical, or biological incidents [e25f6b86-7e02-4f53-ba75-4416af2532c2].

column2: Apa saja jenis risiko sendiri lainnya di SmartDrive?
column3:
Selain risiko sendiri untuk kerugian total, berikut adalah jenis risiko sendiri lainnya di SmartDrive:
*   **Kerugian Sebagian**: Rp 300.000 per kejadian [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9].
*   **Angin Topan, Badai, Hujan Es, Banjir dan/atau Tanah Longsor**: 10% dari nilai kerugian, minimal Rp 500.000 per kejadian [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9].
*   **Gempa Bumi, Tsunami dan/atau Letusan Gunung Berapi**: 10% dari nilai kerugian, minimal Rp 500.000 per kejadian [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9].

column25: What are the other types of risks involved in SmartDrive?
column26:
In addition to the risk of total loss, here are other types of risk at SmartDrive:
* Partial Loss**: Rp 300,000 per incident [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9].
* Hurricane, Storm, Hail, Flood, and/or Landslide**: 10% of the loss value, minimum Rp 500,000 per incident [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9].
* Earthquake, Tsunami, and/or Volcanic Eruption**: 10% of the loss value, minimum Rp 500,000 per incident [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9].
* **Riot**: 10% of the loss, minimum Rp 500,000 per incident [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9].
* **Terrorism and Sabotage**: 10% of the loss, minimum Rp 500,000 per incident [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9].
* **Loss of Vehicle Keys**: 10% of the loss, minimum Rp 300,000 [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9].
* **Theft by Driver**: 15% of the loss value [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9].
* **Taxi Fee**: 2 days *franchise* (work at the workshop for up to 2 days will not be reimbursed) [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9].
* **Personal Accident, Third Party Liability, Passenger Liability, Claims Compensation, Authorized Workshop, New for Old, Towing Fee, Ambulance Fee**: Nil [15446b23-2184-4fe1-8295-8f5f5ac054d9].

* ["ask", "What is the maximum age of a vehicle that can be covered by SmartDrive?"]

column2: siang
column3:
Allianz Mobilku offers two types of insurance coverage:
*   **Comprehensive**: This covers losses due to collision, impact, overturning, skidding, falling into, malicious acts, theft, fire, flood, riot, and other related events. It also includes legal liability to third parties, personal accident for the driver and passengers, medical expenses, and taxi allowance during repairs [f571e0bc-cd8d-45f1-ac56-8a8c66684e48, 28:41, "Jaminan asuransi kendaraan terdiri dari: Comprehensive menjamin kerugian akibat tabrakan, benturan, terbalik, tergelincir, perbuatan jahat orang lain, kendaraan hilang, banjir, kerusuhan, huru-hara, kehilangan perlengkapan tambahan, dll."].
*   **Total Loss Only (TLO)**: This covers losses due to total fire, theft, or accidents where the damage is at least 75% of the vehicle's price [f571e0bc-cd8d-45f1-ac56-8a8c66684e48, 41:50, "Total Loss Only (TLO) menjamin kerugian akibat terbakar total, hilang, kecelakaan dengan minimum kerusakan 75% dari harga kendaraan."].

Follow-up Question(s):
*   ["ask", "What are the age limits for vehicles insured under Allianz Mobilku?"]
*   ["ask", "What are the additional benefits available with Allianz Mobilku?"]
*   ["ask", "How can I make a claim for Allianz Mobilku?"]
